description.p: This is a document viewer for the GNOME desktop.
It supports the following document formats: PDF, PS, EPS, XPS, DjVu, TIFF, DVI (with SyncTeX), and Comic Books archives (CBR, CBT, CBZ, CB7).
Hierdie is 'n dokumentbekyker vir die GNOME-werkskerm.
Dit ondersteun die volgende dokumentformate: PDF, PS, EPS, XPS, DjVu, TIFF, DVI (met SyncTeX), en strokiesboekargiewe (CBR, CBT, CBZ, CB7).
Iste ye un visor de documentos ta l'escritorio GNOME
Soporta os siguients formatos de documentos: PDF, PS, EPS, XPS, DjVu, TIFF, DVI (con SyncTeX), y archivos de libros de comic (CBR, CBT, CBZ, CB7).

You like audio books? Then lets get cozy!
Cozy is a modern audio book player. Here are some of the current features:

ul.li: Import all your audiobooks into cozy to browse them comfortably
Listen to your DRM free mp3, m4a (aac, ALAC, ...), flac, ogg audio books
Playback speed control for each book individually
Drag and Drop to import new audiobooks
Sort your audio books by author, reader and name

description.p: Note: If you're from the EU and want to support this project, you can find me on Patreon (link down below). Because of tax reasons I cannot accept payments from the EU except from Germany.

ul.li: Choose between displaying the current chapter or the whole book in the titlebar
Remember playback speed for each book
Press space to play and pause
Lots of work behind the scenes and small bug fixes
Choose between displaying the current chapter or the whole book in the titlebar
Remember playback speed for each book
Press space to play and pause
Lots of work behind the scenes and small bug fixes
Display the progress and remaining time of your books
Support for album art in image files (thanks to oleg-krv)
Fixed mp3 disk number on imports
Some UI tweaks (also thanks to jnbr)

description.p: Albion Online is a sandbox MMORPG set in an open medieval fantasy world. It has a fully player-driven economy; all equipment items are player-crafted. You can freely combine armor pieces and weapons in our unique classless system тАУ you are what you wear. Explore the world and tackle challenging PvE content. Engage other adventurers in small- or large-scale PvP, and conquer territories. Gather. Craft. Trade. Conquer. Leave your mark in the world.

Everything you need to create simple and beautiful presentations with text, images, and shapes. Add some spice to your presentations with a wide variety of background patterns and beautiful color palette.
Features Include:

ul.li: Presentation Browser: Scroll through the presentations you have made and jump right into them with one click!.
Controller Support: If you have a USB or Bluetooth controller, plug it in and control your slides!
Templates, so you can whip up a presentation in a blink of an eye.
You can edit images in your favorite editor, and it will automatically update when saved
Open Spice-Up files from a web browser by drag and drop if the app is not installed!

description.p: Huge Success!

ul.li: Presentations saved can now be viewed from a web browser by drag and drop if Spice-Up is not installed, and even if you're not using elementary OS or Linux

description.p: I'm making a note here...

ul.li: Lots of optimizations have happened, now it loads presentations crazy fast!
The Text Toolbar has been cleaned up to better match the other bars
You can now align text vertically!
Going to and from the Welcome Screen is now animated
Spice-Up is now translated to French and Portuguese!

description.p: This was a triumph!

ul.li: Creating a new presentation now brings up templates you can choose from.
You can now replace images right from Spice-Up.
Making a new slide now picks up the style from your last one.
You can now make Text and Shapes transparent, right from the custom color picker!
Fixed: Double clicking would sometimes unselect the item.
Fixed: The text on the roundness slider was hard to read.
Spice-Up is also now available in Spanish!

description.p: A simple Internet Relay Chat (IRC) client that is designed to integrate seamlessly with GNOME; it features a simple and beautiful interface which allows you to focus on your conversations.

You can use Polari to publicly chat with people in a channel, and to have private one-to-one conversations. Notifications make sure that you never miss an important message тАФ for private conversations, they even allow you to reply instantly without switching back to the application!

Ein einfaches Programm f├╝r Internet Relay Chats (IRC), das sich nahtlos in Gnome einbindet. Es bietet eine schlanke und schicke Oberfl├дche, damit Sie sich auf Ihre Unterhaltungen konzentrieren k├╢nnen.

component.name: Lugaru HD
component.summary: Third person ninja rabbit fighting game

description.p: Lugaru (pronounced Loo-GAH-roo) is a cross-platform third-person action game. The main character, Turner, is an anthropomorphic rebel bunny rabbit with impressive combat skills.

In his quest to find those responsible for slaughtering his village, he uncovers a far-reaching conspiracy involving the corrupt leaders of the rabbit republic and the starving wolves from a nearby den. Turner takes it upon himself to fight against their plot and save his fellow rabbits from slavery.

description.p: Aisleriot тАФ also known as sol or solitaire тАФ is a card game application that features over 80 different solitaire-type card games which are designed to play using a mouse, keyboard, or trackpad.

Aisleriot тАФ sol ржЕржержмрж╛ solitaire ржирж╛ржорз░рзЗржУ ржЬржирж╛ржЬрж╛ржд тАФ ржПржЯрж╛ рждрж╛ржЪ ржкрж╛рждрз░ ржЦрзЗрж▓ ржПржкрзНрж▓рж┐ржХрзЗржЪржи ржпрж┐ рзорзж рз░ ржЕржзрж┐ржХ ржмрж┐ржнрж┐ржирзНржи solitaire-ржзрз░ржг рждрж╛ржЪ ржЦрзЗрж▓рж╕ржорзВрж╣ ржЕржирзНрждрз░рзНржнрзБржХрзНржд ржХрз░рзЗ ржпрж┐рж╕ржорзВрж╣ ржПржЯрж╛ ржорж╛ржЙржЫ, ржХрж┐ржмрз░рзНржб, ржЕржержмрж╛ ржЯрзНрз░рзЗржХржкрзЗржб ржмрзНржпрз▒рж╣рж╛рз░ ржХрз░рж┐ ржЦрзЗрж▓рж┐ржмрж▓рзЗ рз░рзВржкрж╛ржЩрзНржХрж┐рждред
Aisleriot тАФ poznat i kao sol ili solitier тАФ je igra s kartama koja pru┼╛a preko 80 raznih pasijansa za igru mi┼бem, tastaturom ili trakpedom.

L'Aisleriot - tamb├й conegut com a sol o solitari - ├йs una aplicaci├│ de jocs de cartes que cont├й fins a 80 tipus diferents de jocs de cartes semblants al solitari que estan pensats per ser jugats amb un ratol├н, teclat o ratol├н t├аctil.

L'Aisleriot - tamb├й conegut com a sol o solitari - ├йs una aplicaci├│ de jocs de cartes que cont├й fins a 80 tipus diferents de jocs de cartes semblants al solitari que estan pensats per ser jugats amb un ratol├н, teclat o ratol├н t├аctil.
Aisleriot, tak├й zn├бm├╜ jako Solit├йr, je karetn├н hra, kter├б zahrnuje v├нce ne┼╛ 80 r┼пzn├╜ch karetn├нch her pro jednoho hr├б─Нe. Je navr┼╛ena pro hran├н my┼б├н, klavesnic├н a touchpadem.

Aisleriot тАФ ogs├е kendt som sol, solitaire eller kabale тАФ er et kortspilsprogram som tilbyder over 80 forskellige kabaler, dvs. kortspil for en enkelt spiller, som er designet til at blive spillet med mus, tastatur eller pegeplade.

Aisleriot тАУ auch bekannt als ┬╗Sol┬л oder ┬лSolitaire┬л тАУ ist ein Kartenspielprogramm, das mehr als 80 verschiedene Varianten des ┬╗Solitaire┬л Spiels zu bieten hat. Man kann sie mit mit allen Eingabeger├дten spielen.

Aisleriot (tambi├йn conocido como sol o slitario) es una aplicaci├│n de juego de cartas que incluye 80 tipos de solitarios diferentes, dise├▒ados para jugar con el rat├│n, el teclado o un ┬лtrackpad┬╗.
Aisleriot тАФ bakar-jokoa bezala ere ezaguna тАФ 80 bakar-joko mota desberdin baino gehiago eskaintzen dituen karta-jokoen aplikazio bat da sagua, teklatua edo eta trackpad-a erabiliz jokatzeko.

Aisleriot - tunnetaan my├╢s nimell├д sol, solitaire tai pasianssi - on korttipelisovellus, jolla voi pelata yli 80:t├д eri pasianssityyppist├д peli├д hiirt├д, n├дpp├дimist├╢├д tai kosketuslevy├д k├дytt├дen.

Aisleriot тАФ aussi connu sous le nom de sol ou solitaire тАФ est un logiciel de jeu de cartes comportant plus de 80 jeux de cartes de type solitaire con├зus pour ├кtre jou├йs avec une souris, un clavier ou un pav├й tactile.
Aisleriot тАФ cognoss├╗t ancje come solitari тАФ al ├и un z├╗c di cjartis cun plui di 80 diviers z├╗cs di solitaris, pens├вts par jessi zui├вts cun mouse, tastiere o trackpad.

Aisleriot тАФ tam├йn co├▒ecido como sol ou solitario тАФ ├й un aplicativo de xogo de cartas que conta con 80 xogos de cartas tipo solitario diferentes os cales est├бn dese├▒ados para xogar usando un rato, teclado ou ├бrea t├бctil.

Aisleriot тАФ jo┼б poznat kao i pasijans тАФ je aplikacija karta┼бke igra koja pru┼╛a preko 80 razli─Нitih izvedenica pasijans karta┼бkih igra koje su dizajnirane za igranje pomo─Зu mi┼бa, tipkovnice ili dodirne povr┼бine.

Az Aisleriot - ismert m├йg paszi├бnszk├йnt is - egy k├бrtyaj├бt├йk alkalmaz├бs, amely t├╢bb mint 80 k├╝l├╢nb├╢z┼С paszi├бnsz t├нpus├║ k├бrtyaj├бt├йkot tartalmaz, amelyek eg├йr, billenty┼▒zet vagy ├йrint┼Сt├бbla haszn├бlat├бval t├╢rt├йn┼С j├бt├йkhoz lettek tervezve.

Aisleriot тАФ juga dikenal sebagai sol atau solitaire тАФ adalah aplikasi permainan kartu yang memiliki lebih dari 80 permainan kartu bertipe solitaire yang dirancang untuk dimainkan memakai tetikus, papan tik, atau trackpad.
Aisleriot тАФ einnig ├╛ekkt sem sol e├░a solitaire тАФ er spilaforrit sem inniheldur yfir 80 spilakapla, sem h├жgt er a├░ leggja me├░ ├╛v├н a├░ nota m├║sina, lyklabor├░ e├░a snertiplatta.
Aisleriot, noto anche come solitario, ├и un gioco di carte con oltre 80 diversi giochi di solitari pensati per essere giocati con mouse, tastiera o trackpad.

component.summary: Textov├╜ procesor v re┼╛imu na celou obrazovku
Procesador de palabras en pantalla completa
Un semplice elaboratore di testi a schermo intero

description.p: FocusWriter is a simple, distraction-free word processor. It utilizes a hide-away interface that you access by moving your mouse to the edges of the screen, allowing the program to have a familiar look and feel to it while still getting out of the way so that you can immerse yourself in your work.

FocusWriter allows you to customize your environment by creating themes that control the font, colors, and background image to add ambiance. It also features on-the-fly updating statistics, daily goals, multiple open documents, spell-checking, and much more.
Additionally, when you open the program your current work in progress will automatically load and position you where you last left off so that you can immediately jump back in.

FocusWriter is 'n eenvoudige woordverwerker sonder enige afleidings. Dit maak gebruik van 'n wegsteek-koppelvlak wat jy kan gebruik deur jou muis na die kante van die skerm te beweeg en verskaf sodoende 'n bekende en gebruiklike voorkoms en gevoel, terwyl die program uit jou pad bly dat jy jou in jou werk kan verdiep.

FocusWriter laat jou toe om jou omgewing te verpersoonlik. Jy kan tema's gebruik wat die lettertipe, kleure, en agtergrondfoto verander om 'n eie atmosfeer te skep. Die program ondersteun statistiek wat deurlopend opdateer, daaglikse doelwitte, veelvoudige oop dokumente, speltoetsing, en vele meer.
Voorts laai die program die dokument waarmee jy besig was, asook presies waar in die dokument jy besig was, wanneer jy die program oopmaak. So kan jy dadelik aan die werk spring.

FocusWriter je jednoduch├╜, nerozptyluj├нc├н zpracovatel textu. FocusWriter er en enkel tekstbehandler fri for distraherende elementer. Den anvender en brugerflade, der gemmes under arbejde med kan fremkaldes ved at f├╕re musen til sk├жrmens kanter, s├е programmet kan ops├жttes med kendte redskaber, men p├е en m├еde, hvor du kan fordybe dig i dit arbejde.

FocusWriter kan tilpasse arbejdsmilj├╕et ved at arbejde med temaer, der kontrollerer skrifttype, farver og et baggrundsbillede for stemning. Programmet har ogs├е statistik, der opdateres mens du arbejder, daglige m├еl, mulighed for flere ├еbne dokumenter, stavekontrol og meget andet.

FocusWriter ist ein einfaches, ablenkungsfreies Textverarbeitungsprogramm. Die Bedienoberfl├дche ist nur dann sichtbar, wenn man den Mauszeiger an den Rand des Bildschirms bewegt. Auf dieses Weise l├дsst sich das Programm intuitiv benutzen, ohne dass die Programmoberfl├дche ihnen die Sicht auf das versperrt, was eigentlich z├дhlt: Ihre Arbeit.

FocusWriter erlaubt es Ihnen, die Benutzeroberfl├дche anzupassen. indem Sie mittel selbst erstellter Themen die Schriftart, Farben und das Hintergrundbild des Programms einstellen, schaffen Sie ihre eigene Arbeitsatmosph├дre. Weitere Bestandteile sind Echtzeit-Statistiken, Tagesziele, das ├Цffnen mehrerer Dokumente gleichzeitig, Rechtschreibkorrektur und vieles mehr.

FocusWriter estas simpla senmalatentiga tekstoprilaborilo. ─Ьi uzas ka┼Эatan interfacon, kion vi atingas per movi vian muson al la randoj de la ekrano. Tiel la programaro eblas havi kutiman fasadon, dum ankora┼н estas malobstrukci─Эante por ke vi povas ─Йirka┼нi vin en via laboro.

FocusWriter ebligas vin agordi vian verkejon per kreado de etosoj, kiuj agordas la tiparon, kolorojn, kaj fonan bildon por ┼Эan─Эi etoson. ─Ьi anka┼н havas funkciojn por tuje ─Эisdatiganta statistiko, ─Йiutagaj celoj, plure da malfermataj dokumentoj, literumada kontrolo, kaj multe pli.
Plue, kiam vi lan─Йas la programaron, via lasta malpreta verko a┼нtomate ┼Эar─Эas kaj allokas vin, kie vi laste ─Йesis, por ke vi povas da┼нri verki tuj.

FocusWriter es un procesador de palabras simple y sin distractores. ├Йste utiliza una interfaz aislada que puede ser accedida moviendo el rat├│n a las esquinas de la pantalla, permitiendo que el programa tener una apariencia similar a cuando uno se aparta de todo y se puede concentrar s├│lo en su trabajo.

FocusWriter permite personalizar su ambiente creado temas que controlan la fuente, los colores y la imagen de fondo para crear un ambiente. Otras caracter├нsticas son que actualiza en tiempo real estad├нsticas, metas diarias, abre m├║ltiples documentos, verifica ortograf├нa y mucho m├бs.
Adem├бs, cuando se abre el programa, su trabajo actual se cargar├б y la posici├│n en la que dej├│ la ├║ltima vez para que pueda continuar inmediatamente.

FocusWriter on yksinkertainen ja h├дiri├╢tekij├дt├╢n tekstink├дsittelyohjelma. Siin├д on automaattisesti piiloutuva k├дytt├╢liittym├д, johon p├д├дsee siirt├дm├дll├д hiiren n├дyt├╢n laitoihin. FocusWriter est un traitement de texte simple et non intrusif. Il utilise une interface masqu├йe, accessible en d├йpla├зant votre souris vers les coins de l'├йcran, ce qui conf├иre au programme un aspect convivial tout en restant discret afin que vous puissiez vous plonger dans votre travail.

FocusWriter merupakan pengolah kata yang bebas pengalihan dan sederhana. Menggunakan antarmuka yang Anda akses dengan cara menggerakkan mouse ke tepi layar, membuat program ini memilik tampilan yang familiar dan memudahkan Anda untuk menyelam ke dalam pekerjaan Anda.

FocusWriter membuat Anda untuk menciptakan lingkungan Anda sendiri dengan cara membuat tema yang mengatur jenis huruf, warna, dan gambar latar untuk menambah suasana. Program ini juga dilengkapi oleh statistika yang selalu diperbarui setiap saat, tujuan sehari-hari, membuka banyak dokumen sekaligus, pengecekan ejaan, dan masih banyak lagi.
Ditambah lagi, ketika Anda membuka program, pekerjaan Anda yang sedang dikerjaan akan otomatis dimuat dan memulai di mana Anda terakhir meninggalkannya sehingga Anda bisa memulainya lagi lebih cepat.

FocusWriter ├и un elaboratore di testi semplice e senza distrazioni. Impiega un'interfaccia nascosta accessibile muovendo il puntatore del mouse ai lati dello schermo, dando al programma un aspetto familiare, rimanendo semplice e pulito, in modo che tu possa immergerti completamente nel tuo lavoro.

FocusWriter ti consente di personalizzare il tuo ambiente di lavoro attraverso la creazione ti temi con carattere, colori, e immagine di sfondo scelti da te, creando un'atmosfera personale per immergerti nel tuo lavoro. Il programma include anche statistiche in tempo reale, obiettivi giornalieri, pi├╣ documenti aperti contemporaneamente, controllo ortografico, e molto altro.
Inoltre, quando apri il programma il tuo lavoro in corso d'opera si apre automaticamente nella posizione in cui l'avevi lasciato, in modo che possa riprendere immediatamente a lavorarci.

The Freedesktop Platform is a basic runtime for flatpak application that contains the most basic libraries and files needed to run a linux desktop application. It is based on the yocto distribution with the latest version of the freedesktop technologies like X11, Mesa, Wayland, dbus, cairo, gstreamer added. It also contains SDL2.
This is a new stable release based on yocto 2.2. Here are some of the major updates:

Atomic Tanks is a turn based artillery strategy game where opponents take turns to bombard each other with a wide array of different weapons. To make things more interesting, Atomic Tanks also features desctructable landscapes, teleporting, parachutes and different weather conditions.
This SDK extension allows you to build java apps.

component.name: OpenMW
component.summary: Unofficial open source engine re-implementation of the game Morrowind

description.p: OpenMW is a new engine for 2002's Game of the Year, The Elder Scrolls 3: Morrowind.
It aims to be a fully playable (and improved!), open source implementation of the game's engine and functionality (including mods).
You will still need the original game data to play OpenMW.
Working together? Accessing your apps from the road? Showing family videos to your friends? No problem with AnyDesk. And your data stays at home.
AnyDesk is the fastest remote desktop software on the market. It allows for new usage scenarios and applications that have not been possible with current remote desktop software.

component.summary: Chugar a o chuego de puzle Hitori

Xogue ao xogo de crebacabezas Hitori
Jap├бn eredet┼▒ logikai j├бt├йk a sz├бmokkal

description.p: Hitori is a logic game similar to the popular game of Sudoku.

You play the game against the clock, aiming to eliminate all the duplicate numbers in each row and column in the fastest time. Multiple sizes of game board are supported, and you can place markers on cells to help work out the solution. If you get stuck, the game can give you a hint.
Hitori ye un chuego de lochica semellant a o Sudoku.

Puede chugar contra o reloch, prebando d'eliminar totz os numeros duplicaus en cada ringlera y columna lo mas ascape posible. Se suportan quantas grandarias de tablero y puede colocar marcadors en as celdas ta aduyar-le a trobar a soluci├│n. Si tiene problemas, o chuego puede dar-le una pista.

component.summary: Educational typing tutor game starring Tux
Apprenez ├а taper au clavier avec Tux

description.p: TuxTyping is an educational typing tutor for kids starring Tux, the Linux penguin.
This educational game comes with two different games for practicing your typing, and having a great time doing it.

ul.li: Quit anytime with the shortcut Ctrl + Q

TORCS is a highly portable multi platform car racing simulation. It is used as ordinary car racing game, as AI racing game and as research platform.

TORCS features many different cars, tracks, and opponents to race against. You can steer with a joystick, steering wheel, mouse or the keyboard. Graphic features lighting, smoke, skid marks and glowing brake disks. The simulation features a simple damage model, collisions, tire and wheel properties, aerodynamics and much more.
The game play allows different types of races from the simple practice session up to the championship. Enjoy racing against your friends in the split screen mode with up to four human players.
Pithos is a easy to use native Pandora Radio client that is more lightweight than the pandora.com web client and integrates with the desktop.

It supports most functionality of pandora.com such as rating songs, creating/managing stations, quickmix, etc. On top of that it has features such as last.fm scrobbling, media keys, notifications, proxies, and mpris support.
This is a minor release fixing up some bugs:

ul.li: Mediakeys: Handle keyboards with a dedicated pause key
Mediakeys: Fix support on GNOME-Shell 3.26+ and MATE
Notify: Improve behavior on various notification servers

description.p: This is a major release with some useful new plugin additions:

ul.li: Add new plugin that inhibits screensaver/suspend during playback
Add new plugin adding a 10-band equalizer
Add new plugin that automatically normalizes volume between tracks
Add help entry (F1) that opens the wiki
Automatically detect if the user has Pandora One
Improve saving and restoring window position
Improve plugin loading performance and error reporting
Notification Icon: Improve detecting if a tray is available
Notification Icon: Add option to use symbolic icon

description.p: This is a minor release with some bug fixes and minor additions:

ul.li: Add ability to create stations based upon current song/artist
Show useful error on renaming Thumbprint Radio
Show useful error on creating already existing station
Lastfm: Improve preferences and offer to deauthorize account
Mpris: Add extension for ratings and remove legacy interface
Mediakeys: Fix on future versions of GNOME 3.24.2+
Mediakeys: Avoid using keybinder on Wayland (old keybinder would crash)

All content inside Slack is searchable, including files, conversations, and people, so it's easy to stay organized. Integration with several third-party services allows use of their features directly within your Slack discussions.

component.summary: Quassel IRC is a modern, cross-platform, distributed IRC client.

description.p: Quassel IRC is a modern, cross-platform, distributed IRC client based on the Qt framework.

Distributed means that one (or multiple) client(s) can attach to and detach from a central core that stays permanently online -- much like the popular combination of screen and a text-based IRC client such as WeeChat, and similar to (but much more featureful than) so-called BNCs. Re-attaching your client will show your IRC session in the same state as you left it in (plus whatever happened while you were gone), and this even when you re-attach from a different location. In addition, Quassel IRC can be used like a traditional client, with providing both client and core functionality in one binary. This so-called "Monolithic Client" completely hides the distributed nature, so for a purely local installation, Quassel IRC can be setup very easily.

Cross-platform means that Quassel IRC is developed for and tested on Linux┬о, Windows┬о, and MacOS X┬о. It should also run on any other platform that is supported by the Qt library. Third-party mobile clients for Android and iOS also exist.

By modern we mean that Quassel IRC will have all the features you'd expect from an IRC client nowadays. It also innovates in many areas. For example, the GUI features a dockable nicklist and topic bar, or you can arrange your channel and query buffers in default or custom views, which are also dockable. This means that you can arrange your GUI as you please. The architecture allows for other innovations, such as on-demand creation of log files in custom formats from the backlog.

component.name: Skype
component.summary: Call and message skype users, with video chat support

description.p: Skype makes staying in touch incredibly easy and fun! If you have a webcam and a microphone, you can easily make video calls and voice calls to anyone in the world who also has Skype. This appтАЩs features are simple to use and you can stay in touch with people anywhere in world!

This Indicator is written to make KDE Connect usable in desktops without KDE Plasma, such as Ubuntu Unity and Pantheon. It started as an AppIndicator, but you can send files and URLs easily through KDE Connect with kdeconnect-send.
Features:

ul.li: Indicator in the panel which show your devices, with its name, status, and battery;
Menu to request for pairing and unpairing;
Menu to start SFTP and open a file browser;
Menu to ring and find your phone;
From the device name menu you can get encryption information;
From the device status menu item you can open KDE Connect settings;
A small program, kdeconnect-send to help sending files and choosing device;
A .contractor file, so you can send files from any of elementary OS's applications;
A .desktop file, so you can send files from file manager like Thunar;
Python extensions for Nautilus, Nemo and Caja, you can send files directly from them;
Custom device icons for Ubuntu, Gnome and Elementary OS.

description.p: Any desktop that supports KStatusNotifierItem/AppIndicator icons should just work: тАУ Budgie, Cinnamon, LXDE, Pantheon, Unity, and many others. The only major oddball is Gnome where you need an additional Gnome Shell extension for proper support. After changes on KDE Connect this will work only in KDE Connect 1.0.0 and up which can be problematic on Linux distributions released before August 2016.

description.p: Peek makes it easy to create short screencasts of a screen area. It was built for the specific use case of recording screen areas, e.g. for easily showing UI features of your own apps or for showing a bug in bug reports. With Peek you simply place the Peek window over the area you want to record and press "Record". Peek is optimized for generating animated GIFs, but you can also directly record to WebM or MP4 if you prefer.
Features:

ul.li: Select a screen region to record
Save recorded video as an optimized animated GIF
Record directly to WebM or MP4 format
Simple user interface optimized for the task
Works inside a GNOME Shell Wayland session (using XWayland)

description.p: Peek is not a general purpose screencast app with extended features but rather focuses on the single task of creating small, silent screencasts of an area of the screen for creating GIF animations or silent WebM or MP4 videos.

description.p: Quadrapassel is a derivative of a classic Russian falling-block game. Reposition and rotate the blocks as they fall, and attempt to fit them together. When you form a complete horizontal row of blocks, the row will disappear and you score points. The game is over when the blocks get stacked too high. As your score gets higher, you level up and the blocks fall faster.

If you're looking for a challenge, Quadrapassel allows you to increase the initial speed of the blocks, or begin the game with partial blocks on some of the rows. Or, instead of allowing the blocks to fall randomly, it can select blocks that will be hard for you to place.

Quadrapassel je derivat klasi─Нnog ruskom bloka igre. Premjestiti i rotirati blokove kao ┼бto su pad, i poku┼бati ih uklopiti zajedno. Kada se formira kompletan horizontalni red blokova, red ─Зe nestati, a vi bodujete.Igra je gotova kada blokovi se sla┼╛u previsoko. Kao ┼бto je va┼б rezultat biva ve─Зi, ┼бto vi┼бu razinu dost┼╛e blokovi padaju br┼╛e.

Ako ste u potrazi za izazovom, Quadrapassel omogu─Зuje pove─Зanje po─Нetne brzine od blokova, ili po─Нetak igre s djelomi─Нnim blokovima na neki od redova. Ili, umjesto da dopusti da blokovi padaju slu─Нajno, to mo┼╛e odabrati blokove tako da ─Зe biti te┼бko za vas da ih stavite.

El Quadrapassel ├йs un derivat d'un joc rus cl├аssic de caiguda de blocs. Reposicioneu i gireu els blocs tal com van caient i proveu de fer-los encaixar. Quan es forma una fila horitzontal de blocs, aquesta desapareixer├а i aconseguireu punts. El joc s'acaba quan no hi ha espai per ubicar m├йs blocs. A mesura que aconseguiu punts, augmenta el nivell i els blocs cauen m├йs r├аpidament.

Si esteu cercant un repte, el Quadrapassel us permet incrementar la velocitat inicial dels blocs o comen├зar el joc amb blocs parcials en algunes de les files. O tamb├й, en lloc de fer caure blocs de forma aleat├▓ria, el sistema pot seleccionar blocs que ser├а m├йs complicat d'encaixar.

El Quadrapassel ├йs un derivat d'un joc rus cl├аssic de caiguda de blocs. Reposicioneu i gireu el blocs conforme van caient i proveu de fer-los encaixar. Quan es forma una fila horitzontal de blocs, esta desapareixer├а i aconseguireu punts. El joc s'acaba quan no hi ha espai per ubicar m├йs blocs. A mesura que aconseguiu punts, augmenta el nivell i els blocs cauen m├йs r├аpidament.

Si esteu cercant un repte, el Quadrapassel vos permet incrementar la velocitat inicial dels blocs o comen├зar el joc amb blocs parcials en algunes de les files. O tamb├й, en lloc de fer caure blocs de forma aleat├▓ria, el sistema pot seleccionar blocs que ser├а m├йs complicat d'encaixar.

Quadrapassel je odvozen od klasick├й rusk├й hry s padaj├нc├нmi bloky, zn├бme pod n├бzvem Tetris. Padaj├нc├н bloky mus├нte posouvat a ot├б─Нet tak, aby zapadly k ostatn├нm. Kdy┼╛ se v├бm poda┼Щ├н vybudovat ├║plnou vodorovnou ┼Щadu blok┼п, tato ┼Щada zmiz├н a obdr┼╛├нte body. Hra kon─Н├н ve chv├нli, kdy se bloky narovnaj├н na p┼Щ├нli┼б velkou hromadu. Jak v├бm nar┼пst├б sk├│re, dost├бv├бte se do vy┼б┼б├нch ├║rovn├н a bloky padaj├н rychleji.

Pokud m├бte r├бdi v├╜zvy, m┼п┼╛ete si zv├╜┼бit po─Н├бte─Нn├н rychlost blok┼п nebo m┼п┼╛ete za─Н├нt ji┼╛ s n─Ыkolika naskl├бdan├╜mi ne├║pln├╜mi ┼Щadami blok┼п. A nebo si m├нsto toho, aby padaly n├бhodn├й bloky, m┼п┼╛ete zvolit, aby schv├бln─Ы padaly bloky, kter├й bude probl├йm um├нstit.

Quadrapassel er afledt af det klassiske russiske spil med faldende blokke. Omrok├йr og rot├йr blokke mens de falder, og fors├╕g at f├е dem til at passe sammen. N├еr du danner en vandret fuldkommen r├жkke af blokke, vil r├жkken forsvinde og du f├еr points. Spillet slutter n├еr blokkene stables for h├╕jt. Efterh├еnden som du f├еr points, g├еr du op i niveau, og blokkene vil falde hurtigere.

Hvis du er p├е udkig efter en udfordring, lader Quadrapassel dig for├╕ge starthastigheden af blokke, eller starte spillet med blokke allerede i visse r├жkker. Eller frem for at blokkene falder tilf├жldigt, kan den v├жlge blokke som er s├жrligt sv├жre for dig at placere.

Quadrapassel ist ein Derivat des bekannten russischen Spiels mit fallenden Bl├╢cken. Verschieben Sie fallende Bl├╢cke, drehen Sie sie im Fall und versuchen Sie, so viele wie m├╢glich passend ineinander zu legen. Haben Sie eine Reihe geschafft, verschwindet sie und Sie bekommen daf├╝r Punkte gutgeschrieben. Je mehr Punkte Sie haben, desto schneller wird das Spiel. Das Spiel endet, wenn zu viele Bl├╢cke aufeinander liegen und das obere Ende des Spielfeldrands erreicht ist.

Wenn Sie die Herausforderung suchen, dann k├╢nnen Sie die Startgeschwindigkeit erh├╢hen oder das Spiel mit einigen bereits liegenden Bl├╢cken beginnen. Oder Sie lassen zu, dass anstelle von zuf├дlligen Bl├╢cken besonders schwierige Bl├╢cke herunterfallen.

Quadrapassel es un derivado del juego ruso cl├бsico de bloques que caen. Recoloque y rote los bloques seg├║n caen, e intente juntarlos. Cuando forme una fila horizontal completa de bloques, la fila desaparecer├б y conseguir├б puntos. El juego termina cuando la pila de bloques es demasiado alta. A medida que acumula puntos, sube de nivel y los bloques caen m├бs r├бpido.

Si est├б buscando un reto, Quadrapassel le permite aumentar la velocidad inicial de ca├нda de los bloques, o empezar una partida con algunos bloques en algunas filas. Tambi├йn puede, en lugar de permitir que los bloques caigan aleatoriamente, seleccionar los bloques que ser├бn m├бs dif├нciles de colocar.

Erortzen diren blokeen joko errusiar ospetsu batean oinarrituta dago Quadrapassel. Biratu eta kokatu blokeak erortzen ari diren heinean, eta saiatu elkarrekin doi daitezela. Errenkada horizontal bat osatzean errenkada desagertzen da, eta puntuak lortzen dituzu. Blokeak pila batean goraino iristen direnean amaitzen da jokoa. Zenbat eta puntuazio altuagoa eduki, orduan eta altuagoa izango da maila eta blokeak azkarrago eroriko dira.

Erronka bila bazabiltza, Quadrapassel-ek blokeen hasierako abiadura handiagotzea baimentzen dizu, edo errenkada batzuetan bloke zatiekin has dezakezu jokoa. Edo, blokeak ausaz erortzea utzi ordez, blokeak hauta ditzake leku egokietan jartzea zailtzeko.

Quadrapassel on klassisen ven├дl├дisen putoavien palojen pelin johdannainen. M├д├дrit├д palikoiden pudotessa niiden suunta ja asema, ja yrit├д asettaa palikat kiinni toisiinsa. Kun muodostat vaakatasossa palikkarivin, rivi katoaa ja saat pisteit├д. Peli p├д├дttyy, kun palikkapino muodostuu liian korkeaksi. Mit├д enemm├дn saat pisteit├д, sit├д nopeampaa palikat putoavat alas.

Jos etsit haasteita, Quadrapassel sallii muun muassa palikoiden alkunopeuden m├д├дritt├дmisen, tiettyjen palikoiden valmiin asettamisen pelialueelle ja satunnaisten palikoiden sijaan vaikeasti sijoitettavien palikoiden tarjoilun.

Quadrapassel est un d├йriv├й du classique jeu russe de chute de blocs. Repositionnez et faites tourner les blocs pendant qu'ils tombent et essayez de les assembler. Quand vous avez constitu├й une ligne compl├иte de blocs, celle-ci dispara├оt et vous marquez des points. Le jeu se termine lorsque les blocs forment une pile trop haute. Au fur et ├а mesure que votre score augmente, vous augmentez de niveau et les blocs tombent plus rapidement.

Si vous ├кtes ├а la recherche d'un d├йfi, Quadrapassel vous permet d'augmenter la vitesse initiale des blocs, ou de commencer le jeu avec quelques blocs plac├йs dans certaines lignes. Ou alors, au lieu de permettre ├а des blocs al├йatoires de tomber, il peut s├йlectionner des blocs qui seront difficiles ├а placer.

Quadrapassel al ├и un deriv├вt dal classic z├╗c rus dai blocs che a colin. Place e volte i blocs intant che a colin e c├оr di f├вju cumbin├в: cuant che a si forme une rie orizont├вl di blocs, cheste a sparir├а e tu vuadagnar├вs ponts. Plui ponts tu fasis plui tu lar├вs su di nivel e i blocs a colaran plui di corse. Il z├╗c al finis cuant che i blocs a vegnin met├╗ts in pile masse in alt.

Se tu ciris une sfide, Quadrapassel al permet di aument├в la velocit├вt inizi├вl dai blocs o di tac├в une partide cun blocs za pla├з├вts in cualchi rie. Se no, invezit di v├к blocs casu├вi, Quadrapassel al pues selezion├в dai blocs plui dificii di pla├з├в.

Quadrapassel ├й un derivado do xogo cl├бsico ruso de bloques que caen. Reposicione e xire os bloques que caen, e tente po├▒elos xuntos. Ao formar unha li├▒a horizontal completa de bloques, a li├▒a desaparece e ga├▒ar├б puntos. O xogo termina cando a pila de bloques ├й moi alta. A medida que acumula puntos, subir├б de nivel e os bloques caer├бn m├бis r├бpido.

Se est├б a buscar un reto, Quadrapassel permite aumentar a velocidade de inicio dos bloques ou comezar o xogo con bloqueos parciais nalgunhas das li├▒as. Ou, no canto de facer que os bloques caian de forma aleatoria, pode seleccionar bloques que sexan dif├нciles para colocar.

A Quadrapassel a klasszikus orosz Tetris j├бt├йk ├бtirata. Mozgassa ├йs forgassa a hull├│ blokkokat, ├йs pr├│b├бlja meg ├╢sszeilleszteni ┼Сket. Ha kit├╢lt egy v├нzszintes sort blokkokkal, a sor elt┼▒nik ├йs pontokat kap. A j├бt├йk v├йget ├йr, ha a blokkok rak├бsa t├║l magass├б v├бlik. A pontsz├бm n├╢veked├йs├йvel szintet l├йphet, ekkor a blokkok gyorsabban hullanak.

Ha kih├нv├бst keres, a Quadrapassel lehet┼Сv├й teszi a blokkok kezd┼Сsebess├йg├йnek n├╢vel├йs├йt, vagy a j├бt├йk kezd├йs├йt n├йh├бny blokkokkal r├йszleges felt├╢lt├╢tt sorral. Vagy a v├йletlenszer┼▒en hull├│ blokkok helyett v├бlaszthat nehezen elhelyezhet┼Сeket is.

Quadrapassel adalah turunan dari permainan balok jatuh Rusia yang klasik. Geser dan putar balok saat mereka jatuh, dan cobalah mengepaskan mereka satu sama lain. Ketika Anda membentuk suatu baris balok horisontal yang komplit, baris akan menghilang dan Anda memperoleh nilai. Permainan berakhir ketika balok-balok bertumpuk terlalu tinggi. Ketika nilai Anda semakin tinggi, level Anda naik dan balok jatuh lebih cepat.

Bila Anda mencari tantangan, Quadrapassel memungkinkan Anda meningkatkan kecepatan awal balok, atau memulai permainan dengan beberapa baris terisi sebagian oleh balok. Atau sebagai ganti mengijinkan balok jatuh secara acak, ini dapat memilih balok yang akan sulit Anda tempatkan.

Quadrapassel ├и un derivato del classico gioco russo dei blocchi in caduta. Posiziona e ruota i blocchi mentre cadono e cerca di farli combaciare: quando si forma una riga orizzontale di blocchi, questa sparir├а e guadagnerai dei punti. Pi├╣ punti fai, pi├╣ salirai di livello e i blocchi cadranno pi├╣ velocemente. Il gioco termina quando i blocchi si sovrappongono senza essere eliminati.

Se cerchi una sfida, Quadrapassel consente di incrementare la velocit├а iniziale dei blocchi o di iniziare una partita con dei blocchi gi├а posizionati sulla stessa riga. Oppure, invece di avere blocchi casuali, Quadrapassel pu├▓ selezionare dei blocchi pi├╣ difficili da organizzare.

Quadrapassel yra klasikinio rusi┼бko krintan─Нi┼│ blok┼│ ┼╛aidimo variantas. Stumdykite ir sukiokite krintan─Нius blokus bandydami juos sud─Чlioti kartu. Kai suformuojate piln─Е horizontali─Е blok┼│ eilut─Щ, ji pradings ir gausite ta┼бk┼│. ┼╜aidimas baigiamas, kai blokai sukraunami per auk┼бtai. Armagetron is a 3D Tron-inspired game where the player controls a motorcycle that emits a immovable wall behind it. Gameplay consists of 2 of these cycles battling to trap each other to force their opponent to crash into the wall.

Supertuxkart is a free 3D kart racing game, with a focus on having fun over realism. You can play with up to 4 friends on one PC, racing against each other, or try to beat the computer in single-player mode.

See the great lighthouse or drive through the sand and visit the pyramids. Race underground or in space, watching the stars pass by. Or rest under the palm trees on the beach, watching the other karts overtake you. But don't eat the bananas! Watch for bowling balls, plungers, bubble gum and cakes thrown by your opponents.

You can do a single race against other karts, compete in one of several Grand Prix, try to beat the high score in time trials on your own, play battle mode against the computer or your friends, and more!
Fast and secure desktop app, perfectly synced with your mobile phone.

component.name: FileZilla
component.summary: FileZilla Client is a fast and reliable cross-platform FTP, FTPS and SFTP client with lots of useful features and an intuitive graphical user interface.

description.p: FileZilla is a graphical FTP, FTPS and SFTP client. It is platform independent and supports all major desktop operating systems.

ul.li: Supports FTP, FTP over SSL/TLS (FTPS) and SSH File Transfer Protocol (SFTP)
Cross-platform. Runs on Windows, Linux, *BSD, OSX and more
Supports resume and transfer of large files >4GB
Powerful Site Manager and transfer queue
The ability to use Notepad or any other program to edit a file online
HTTP/1.1, SOCKS5 and FTP Proxy support

component.name: Bustle
component.summary: Draw sequence diagrams of D-Bus activity

description.p: Bustle draws sequence diagrams of D-Bus activity. It shows signal emissions, method calls and their corresponding returns, with time stamps for each individual event and the duration of each method call. This can help you check for unwanted D-Bus traffic, and pinpoint why your D-Bus-based application isn't performing as well as you like. It also provides statistics like signal frequencies and average method call times.

component.name: RetroArch
component.summary: Frontend for emulators, game engines and media players.

description.p: RetroArch enables you to run classic games on a wide range of computers and consoles through its slick graphical interface. Settings are also unified so configuration is done once and for all.

gitg is a graphical user interface for git. It aims at being a small, fast and convenient tool to visualize the history of git repositories. Besides visualization, gitg also provides several utilities to manage your repository and commit your work.
Goals

ul.li: Clone local and remote git repositories

description.p: GNOME Dictionary is a simple dictionary application that looks up definitions of words online. Though it looks up English definitions by default, you can easily switch to Spanish or add other online dictionaries using the DICT protocol to suit your needs.

GNOME ржЕржнрж┐ржзрж╛ржи ржПржЯрж╛ рж╕рж╛ржзрж╛рз░ржг ржЕржнрж┐ржзрж╛ржи ржпрж┐ рж╢ржмрзНржжржмрзЛрз░рз░ ржЕрз░рзНрже ржЕржирж▓рж╛ржЗржи рж╕ржирзНржзрж╛ржи ржХрз░рзЗред ржпржжрж┐ржУ ржЗ ржЕржмрж┐ржХрж▓рзНржкржнрж╛рз▒рзЗ ржЗржВрз░рж╛ржЬрзА ржмрж┐рз▒рз░ржгрж╕ржорзВрж╣ рж╕ржирзНржзрж╛ржи ржХрз░рзЗ, ржЖржкрзБржирж┐ ржЖржкрзЛржирж╛рз░ ржкрзНрз░рзЯрзЛржЬржи рж╕рж╛ржкрзЗржХрзНрж╖рзЗ DICT ржкрзНрз░ржЯрзЛржХрж▓ ржмрзНржпрз▒рж╣рж╛рз░ ржХрз░рж┐ рж╕рзНржкрзЗржирж┐ржЪ ржЕржержмрж╛ ржЕржирзНржп ржЕржирж▓рж╛ржЗржи ржЕржнрж┐ржзрж╛ржи рж╕рж╣ржЬрждрзЗ ржпрзЛржЧ ржХрз░рж┐ржм ржкрж╛рз░рж┐ржмред

GNOME ржЕржнрж┐ржзрж╛ржи рж╣рж▓ ржПржХржЯрж┐ рж╕рж╣ржЬ ржЕржнрж┐ржзрж╛ржи ржЕрзНржпрж╛ржкрзНрж▓рж┐ржХрзЗрж╢ржи ржпрж╛ рж╢ржмрзНржжрзЗрж░ ржЕрж░рзНрже ржЕржирж▓рж╛ржЗржирзЗ ржЦрзЛржБржЬрзЗред ржПржЯрж┐ ржбрж┐ржлрж▓рзНржЯ ржнрж╛ржмрзЗ ржЗржВрж░рж╛ржЬрж┐ рж╕ржВржЬрзНржЮрж╛ ржЦрзБржБржЬрж▓рзЗржУ, ржЕрж╛ржкржирж┐ рж╕рж╣ржЬрзЗржЗ рж╕рзНржкрзЗржирзАрзЯрждрзЗ ржкрж╛рж▓рзНржЯрзЗ ржирж┐рждрзЗ ржкрж╛рж░ржмрзЗржи ржмрж╛ ржЕрж╛ржкржирж╛рж░ ржкрзНрж░рзЯрзЛржЬржи ржорждрзЛ DICT ржкрзНрж░рзЛржЯрзЛржХрж▓ ржмрзНржпржмрж╣рж╛рж░ ржХрж░рзЗ ржЕржирзНржп ржЕржирж▓рж╛ржЗржи ржЕржнрж┐ржзрж╛ржи ржмрзНржпржмрж╣рж╛рж░ ржХрж░рждрзЗ ржкрж╛рж░ржмрзЗржиред

GNOME rje─Нnik je jednostavni program rje─Нnik koji gleda definicije rije─Нi na mre┼╛i. Iako tra┼╛i engleske definicije podrazumevano, mo┼╛ete lako prebaciti na ┼бpanski ili dodati druge online rje─Нnike koriste─Зi DICT protokol u skladu sa va┼бim potrebama.

El Diccionari del GNOME ├йs una aplicaci├│ de diccionari senzilla que cerca definicions de paraules en l├нnia. Tot i que per defecte cerca les definicions en angl├иs, podeu canviar f├аcilment al castell├а o altres diccionaris en l├нnia fent servir el protocol DICT per adaptar-se a les vostres necessitats.

El Diccionari del GNOME ├йs una aplicaci├│ de diccionari senzilla que cerca definicions de paraules en l├нnia. Tot i que per defecte cerca les definicions en angl├йs, podeu canviar f├аcilment al castell├а o altres diccionaris en l├нnia fent servir el protocol DICT per adaptar-se a les vostres necessitats.

Slovn├нk GNOME je jednoduch├б slovn├нkov├б aplikace, kter├б vyhled├бv├б on-line definice slov. A─Нkoliv ve v├╜choz├нm stavu vyhled├бv├б definice v angli─Нtin─Ы, m┼п┼╛ete si ji snadno p┼Щepnout na ┼бpan─Ыl┼бtinu nebo p┼Щidat podle sv├╜ch pot┼Щeb jin├╜ slovn├нk on-line pou┼╛├нvaj├нc├н protocol DICT.

Quitament se per defaut, son las definicions anglesas que son recercadas, es f├▓r├зa aisit de causir una autra lenga o d'apondre d'autres diccionaris en linha que se conf├▓rman al protoc├▓l DICT per fin de respondre a v├▓stres pr├▓pris besonhs.

A new stable release of the venerable Dictionary for GNOME. This time it's mostly build fixes to ensure a reliable experience for the fine folks building applications for users; we also have documentation fixes, and better localisation in many languages.
Discover Math with GeoGebra. Solve equations, graph functions, create constructions, analyze data, explore 3D math!

component.name: Mendeley
component.summary: Mendeley is a free reference manager and an academic social network

description.p: With the Mendeley Reference Manager, you can easily organize and search your personal library, annotate documents and cite as you write. Import papers and other documents from your desktop, your existing libraries or websites with ease. Mendeley automatically captures information like authors, title and publisher, which makes organization and browsing easy.

Over 6 million researchers trust Mendeley to share ideas, see whatтАЩs new in their field and discuss important developments. Discover new connections by searching for people on Mendeley and finding researchers with similar interests via Public Groups. You can also follow new people from suggestions in your Mendeley feed.

component.name: Subsurface
component.summary: Manage and display dive computer data

description.p: Subsurface is an opensource diving logbook that runs on Linux, Windows and Mac. With this program, users can keep track of their dives by logging dive locations (with GPS coordinates), weights and exposure protection used, divemasters and dive buddies, etc. Subsurface also enables the users to rate their dives and provide additional dive notes.

Dives can be downloaded from a variety of dive computers, inserted manually or imported from other programs. A wide array of diving statistics and information is calculated and displayed, like the userтАЩs SAC rate, partial pressures of O2, N2 and He, calculated deco information, and many more.

The dive profiles (and the tank pressure curves) can be visualized in a comprehensive and clean way, that provides the user with additional information on relative velocity (and momentary air consumption) during the dive. Subsurface also allows the user to print out a detailed log book that includes dive profiles and other relevant information. The program is localized in about 20 languages and well supported by an active developer community.

component.name: Pingus
component.summary: Free version of Lemmings Puzzle Game

description.p: Pingus is a Puzzle game where you need to save all your little penguins using the capabilities provided to you in the current level.
The basic game idea is to be like Lemmings game. This versions has some other cool stuff like a world map and some very cool secret levels.

component.name: HydraPaper
component.summary: Wallpaper manager with multimonitor support for GNOME

description.p: Hydrapaper lets you set different wallpapers for each of your monitors in the GNOME desktop.
It uses Pillow to create a single image merging all of your chosen wallpapers and setting it as your wallpaper with the "Spanned" option.

ul.li: Added option to temporarely disable paths
Added option to minimize/restore all other windows
Remember previously set wallpapers throughout sessions
Added checks and user friendly error messages for monitors.xml

component.name: Atom
component.summary: A hackable text editor for the 21st Century

description.p: Atom is a text editor that's modern, approachable, yet hackable to the coreтАФa tool you can customize to do anything but also use productively without ever touching a config file.

component.name: darktable
component.summary: Organize and develop images from digital cameras

description.p: darktable manages your digital negatives in a database and lets you view them through a lighttable. It also enables you to develop raw images and enhance them in a darkroom.
Other modes besides lighttable and darkroom are a map for geotagging, tethering, print and a slideshow.
darktable supports most modern camera's raw formats, and does all of its processing at very high precision.
El darktable gestiona els vostres negatius digitals en una base de dades i us permet visualitzar-los en una taula de llum. Tamb├й us permet revelar les imatges raw i millorar-les a la cambra fosca.
Altres modes a m├йs de la taula de llum i cambra fosca, s├│n un mapa per geolocalitzaci├│, tethering (control remot de la c├аmera), impressi├│ i presentaci├│ de diapositives.
El darktable admet la majoria de formats raw de c├аmera moderns, i fa tot el seu processat amb un grau molt alt de precisi├│.
darktable spravuje va┼бe digit├бln├н negativy v datab├бzi, nech├б v├бs je prohl├н┼╛et na prosv─Ыtlovac├нm pultu a vyvol├бvat ve fotokomo┼Щe v─Нetn─Ы dal┼б├нch vylep┼бen├н.
Ostatn├н re┼╛imy krom─Ы prosv─Ыtlovac├нho pultu a fotokomory jsou re┼╛im mapy pro geottaging, re┼╛im vzd├бlen├йho sn├нm├бn├н fotoapar├бtem, re┼╛im tisku a re┼╛im prom├нt├бn├н.
darktable podporuje v─Ыt┼бinu form├бt┼п raw modern├нch fotoapar├бt┼п a jejich zpracov├бn├н prob├нh├б ve vysok├й kvalit─Ы.
darktable h├еndterer dine digitale negativer i en database og lader dig se dem gennem et lysbord. Den lader dig ogs├е fremkalde raw-billeder og forbedre dem i et m├╕rkekammer.
Andre tilstande ud over lysbord og m├╕rkekammer er et kort til geom├жrkning, tethering, udskrifter og et diasshow.
darktable underst├╕tter de fleste moderne kameraers raw-formater og udf├╕rer alle sine bearbejdninger med meget h├╕j pr├жcision.

darktable verwaltet digitale Negative in einer Datenbank und erlaubt es, diese auf einem Leuchttisch zu betrachten. Au├Яerdem k├╢nnen Raw-Bilder in einer Dunkelkammer entwickelt und verbessert werden.
Weitere Modi neben Leuchttisch und Dunkelkammer sind eine Karte f├╝r Geotagging, Tethering, Druck und eine Diashow.
darktable unterst├╝tzt das Raw-Format der meisten modernen Kameras und f├╝hrt seine Berechnungen mit sehr hoher Pr├дzision durch.
darktable maneja sus negativos digitales en una base de datos y le permite verlos mediante el uso de una mesa de luz. Tambi├йn le permite revelar im├бgenes raw y mejorarlas en el cuarto oscuro.
Otros modos adem├бs de la mesa de luz y el cuarto oscuro son el mapa para geo-ubicaci├│n, captura, imprimir y diapositivas.
darktable soporta la mayor├нa de los formatos raw de las c├бmaras modernas, y realiza todo su revelado con un gran nivel de precisi├│n.

darktable g├иre vos n├йgatifs num├йriques dans une base de donn├йes et vous permet de les voir depuis la table lumineuse. Il permet aussi de d├йvelopper et d'am├йliorer les images num├йriques dans la chambre noire.
A part la table lumineuse les autres modules sont la carte pour la g├йolocalisation, la capture, l'impression et le diaporama.
darktable supporte la plupart des formats raw r├йcents, et fait tous ces calculs avec une tr├иs haute pr├йcision.

component.name: Ri-li
component.summary: Kidsgame, drive a toy wood engine

description.p: You drive a toy wood engine in many levels and you must collect all the coaches to win. Full-featured: Colorful animated wood engine, 50 levels, 3 beautiful music tracks and many sound effects.

Ri-li is translated in 19 languages: Arabic, Breton, Chinese, Dutch, English, Esperanto, French, German, Hungarian, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese, Russian, Slovak, Spanish, Swedish and Turkish.

description.p: gedit is the official text editor of the GNOME desktop environment. While aiming at simplicity and ease of use, gedit is a powerful general purpose text editor.
Whether you are writing the next bestseller, programming an innovative application, or simply taking some quick notes, gedit will be a reliable tool to accomplish your task.
Its flexible plugin system allows you to tailor the application to your needs and adapt it to your workflow.
O gedit ye l'editor de textos oficial d'o entorno d'escritorio GNOME. Si bien l'obchectivo ye a simplicidat y facilidat d'emplego, o gedit ye un editor potent de proposito cheneral.

Quan sigas escribindo o siguient best seller, programando una innovadora aplicaci├│n u simplament prenendo bellas anotacions rapidas, o gedit ser├б una ferramienta de confitanza ta realizar a tuya fayena.
O sistema de complementos flexible d'ell te permite meter l'aplicaci├│n seguntes as tuyas necesidatz y adaptar-la a lo tuyo fluxo de treballo.

Read the books you love without having to worry about the different format complexities like epub, pdf, mobi, cbr, etc.
Manage your library by tagging and updating metadata on books, to quickly find books using metadata searching and tag based filtering.
This version supports EPUB, MOBI, PRC, PDF and Comics (CBR and CBZ) formats with support for more formats to follow soon.
Right to Left Reading

ul.li: Support for Right to Left Reading
A shiny new icon and new cover images
Better support for EPUB Table of Contents

description.p: Annotations and Two Page Views
Support mobi format and UX improvements
Preview, transfer and live stream documents for the reMarkable paper tablet

Kobo Deluxe is a retro styled top-down arena shooter with a simple and responsive control system - which you'll need to tackle the tons of enemy ships that shoot at you, chase you, circle around you shooting, or even launch other ships at you, while you're trying to destroy the labyrinth shaped bases.
There are 50 action packed levels with smoothly increasing difficulty, and different combinations of enemies that require different tactics to be dealt with successfully.
Kobo Deluxe features OpenGL acceleration (optional), an intuitive menu driven user interface and joystick support.

Um jogo em tempo real de guerra antiga

description.p: 0 A.D. is a real-time strategy (RTS) game of ancient warfare. It's a historically-based war/economy game that allows players to relive or rewrite the history of twelve ancient civilizations, each depicted at their peak of economic growth and military prowess.

The twelve factions are: Three of the Hellenic States (Athens, Sparta and Macedonia), two of the kingdoms of Alexander the Great's successors (Seleucids and Ptolemaic Egyptians), two Celtic tribes (Britons and Gauls), the Romans, the Persians, the Iberians, the Carthaginians, and the Mauryans. Each civilization is complete with substantially unique artwork, technologies and civilization bonuses.

component.name: Freedoom: Phase 2
component.summary: First-person shooter based on the Doom engine

description.p: Freedoom: Phase 2 is a 32-level game, expanding upon Phase 1 and adding a double-barrelled shotgun and more enemy types, along with even more brutal gameplay to really test your limits.

The Freedoom project aims to produce three base-game data files (IWADs) for Doom-compatible engines. With it comes the capability to also play the wide range of mods created for Doom by a vibrant community. Freedoom: Phase 2 is fully compatible with Doom II and Final Doom mods.

component.name: Ambiance Gtk theme
component.summary: Ambiance Gtk theme used by Ubuntu

description.p: Default Ubuntu theme.
GHex is a hex editor for the GNOME desktop.

GHex can load raw data from binary files and display them for editing in the traditional hex editor view. The display is split in two columns, with hexadecimal values in one column and the ASCII representation in the other. A useful tool for working with raw data.

component.name: Freedesktop.org Software Development Kit version 1.6
component.summary: Tools and headers for developing applications using the freedesktop.org application platform

description.p: The Freedesktop Sdk is the development runtime that you can use to produce applications using the Freedesktop Platform runtime. It contains everything that is in the platform, as well as build and debugging tools and headers for the libraries.
This is a new stable release based on yocto 2.2. Here are some of the major updates:

description.p: A simple application to access, organize and share your documents on GNOME. It is meant to be a simple and elegant replacement for using a file manager to deal with documents. Seamless cloud integration is offered through GNOME Online Accounts.
It lets you:

ul.li: View recent local and online documents
Access your Google, ownCloud or OneDrive content
See new documents shared by friends
Allow opening full featured editor for non-trivial changes

component.name: MOV MetaEdit
component.summary: Embed and edit Universal Ad ID metadata in MOV or MP4 files

description.p: MOV MetaEdit is a tool that supports the embedding and editing of metadata in MOV (Apple QuickTime) or MP4 (ISO/IEC 14496-14 a.k.a. MPEG-4 Part 14) files.
It is currently focused on Universal Ad ID metadata but could be expanded on request.
Sponsored by Ad-ID; designed, led and fully developed by MediaArea.
RSS Guard is simple (yet powerful) feed reader. It is able to fetch the most known feed formats, including RSS/RDF and ATOM. RSS Guard is developed on top of the Qt library.

component.name: Android Studio
component.summary: Integrated development environment for Google's Android platform

description.p: Official Integrated Development Environment (IDE) for developing Android applications. The IDE is based on IntelliJ IDEA, and provides additional features on top of its powerful code editor and developer tools designed to enhance the productivity of the Android application developers:

ul.li: Integration with the Gradle build system.
A unified environment where you can develop for all Android devices.
тАЬInstant RunтАЭ to push changes to your running app without building a new APK.
Code templates and GitHub integration to help you build common app features and import sample code.
Lint tools to catch performance, usability, version compatibility, and other problems.
Built-in support for Google Cloud Platform, making it easy to integrate Google Cloud Messaging and App Engine.

component.name: Chromium B.S.U.
component.summary: Fast paced, arcade-style, top-scrolling space shooter

description.p: You are captain of the cargo ship Chromium B.S.U., responsible for delivering supplies to our troops on the front line. Your ship has a small fleet of robotic fighters which you control from the relative safety of the Chromium vessel. This is an OpenGL-based shoot 'em up game with fine graphics.
Your mission:

ul.li: Do not let ANY enemy ships get past your fighters! Each enemy ship that makes it past the bottom of the screen will attack the Chromium, and you lose a fighter.
Use your fighters as weapons! Crash into enemies to destroy them before they can get past you.
Strategic suicide is a powerful tactic! When the Chromium launches a new fighter, it releases a high energy burst which destroys all enemies in range.

Self-destruct to preserve your ammunition! A double-right-click will cause your current fighter to self-destruct. Before the ship blows up, it ejects its ammunition so that the next fighter can pick it up.

description.p: Iagno is a computer version of the game Reversi, a two-player strategy board game. The game is played with tiles that are dark on one side and light on the other.

The object of Iagno is to flip as many of your opponent's tiles to your color as possible while preventing your opponent from flipping your tiles to his color. This is done by trapping your opponent's tiles between two tiles of your own color.
Jagno je ra─Нunarska verzija igre Reversi, strategija na plo─Нi za dva igra─Нa. Igra se igra sa plo─Нicama koje su tamne sa jedne a svijetle sa druge strane.

Cilj Jagno-a je da se preokrene ┼бto je mogu─Зe vi┼бe protivni─Нkih plo─Нica na svoju boju ako je mogu─Зe dok se istovremeno sprije─Нava protivnik da okrene tvoje plo─Нice na njegovu boju. Ovo se radi tako ┼бto se zarobe protivni─Нke plo─Нice izme─Сu dvije plo─Нice svoje boje.
El Iagno ├йs una versi├│ per ordinador del joc Reversi, un joc de taula d'estrat├иgia per a dos jugadors. El joc es juga amb peces que s├│n negres per una banda i blanques per l'altra.

La finalitat del Iagno ├йs donar la volta a tantes peces del vostre oponent com pugueu mentre eviteu que el vostre oponent volti les vostres. Aix├▓ s'aconsegueix atrapant les peces de l'oponent entre dos peces del vostre color.
L'Iagno ├йs una versi├│ per ordinador del joc Reversi, un joc de taula d'estrat├иgia per a dos jugadors. El joc es juga amb peces que s├│n fosques per una banda i clares per l'altra.

La finalitat del Iagno ├йs donar la volta a tantes peces del vostre oponent com pugueu mentre eviteu que el vostre oponent volti les vostres. Aix├▓ s'aconsegueix atrapant les peces de l'oponent entre dos peces del vostre color.
Iagno je po─Н├нta─Нov├б verze hry Reversi (nebo t├й┼╛ Othello), strategick├й deskov├й hry pro dva hr├б─Нe. Hraje se s kameny, kter├й jsou z jedn├й strany ─Нern├й a z druh├й b├нl├й.

C├нlem hry Iagno je p┼Щeklopit co nejv├нce soupe┼Щov├╜ch kamen┼п na svoji barvu a naopak zabr├бnit soupe┼Щi, aby p┼Щeklopil va┼бe kameny na svoji barvu. Ud─Ыl├бte to tak, ┼╛e uzav┼Щete soupe┼Щovy kameny mezi dva kameny sv├й barvy.
Iagno er en computerudgave af spillet Reversi, et tospillers strategisk br├жtspil. Det spilles med brikker eller felter som er m├╕rke p├е den ene side og lyse p├е den anden.

M├еlet i Iagno er at vende s├е mange som muligt at din modstanders felter til din farve, mens du forhindrer modstanderen i at vende dine til sin egen. Dette g├╕res ved at fange din modstanders felter mellem to felter af din egen farve.

Iagno ist die Rechnerversion des Spiels ┬╗Reversi┬л, einem Strategie-Brettspiel f├╝r zwei Spieler. Das Spiel wird mit Spielsteinen gespielt, die auf einer Seite wei├Я und auf der anderen schwarz sind.

Ziel ist es, bei Iagno so viele der gegnerischen Spielsteine wie m├╢glich auf Ihre Spielfarbe zu drehen und gleichzeitig den Gegner daran zu hindern, das gleiche f├╝r seine Farbe zu tun. Dies erreicht man, indem die gegnerischen Spielsteine zwischen zwei Steinen Ihrer Farbe gefangen werden.
Iagno is a computer version of the game Reversi, a two-player strategy board game. The game is played with tiles that are dark on one side and light on the other.

The object of Iagno is to flip as many of your opponentтАЩs tiles to your colour as possible while preventing your opponent from flipping your tiles to his colour. This is done by trapping your opponentтАЩs tiles between two tiles of your own colour.
Iagno estas komputila versio de la ludo Reverso, du-ludista strategia tabulludo. La ludo estas ludata kun kaheloj kiu estas malhelaj sur unu flanka kaj helaj sur la alia.
Iagno es una versi├│n para ordenador de Reversi, un juego de estrategia con tablero para dos jugadores. Se juega con fichas blancas a un lado del tablero y negras al otro.

El objetivo de Iagno es voltear todas las fichas de su oponente que pueda, evitando que su oponente haga lo mismo con las suyas. Esto se consigue atrapando las fichas del oponente entre dos fichas de su color.
Reversi jokoaren ordenagailuarentzako bertsio bat da Iagno. Bi jokalarientzako estrategiako jokoa da. Jokoa fitxekin jokatzen da, alde batean kolore iluna eta bestean kolore argia dutelarik.

Iagno jokoaren helburua zure aurkariaren fitxak zure kolorera iraultzea da, aurkariak zureak diren fitxak iraultzea saihesten saiatzen zaren bitartean. Aurkariaren fitxak zure koloreko bi fitxen artean atrapatuz lortzen da.

Iagno on tietokoneversio Reversi-pelist├д, joka on kahden pelaajan lautastrategiapeli. Peli├д pelataan tummilla ja vaaleilla laatoilla.

Tavoite on k├д├дnt├д├д mahdollisimman monta vastustajan laattaa, jolloin ne muuttavat v├дri├д, mutta samalla est├д├д vastustajaa k├д├дnt├дm├дst├д sinun laattoja. K├д├дnt├дminen onnistuu, kun saat vastustajan laatat kahden oman laatan v├дliin.
Iagno est une version informatique de Reversi, un jeu de plateau de strat├йgie. Le jeu se joue avec des pions noirs d'un c├┤t├й et blancs de l'autre.

Le principe d'Iagno est de retourner le plus de pions adverses possible tout en emp├кchant votre adversaire de retourner vos pions. Cela se fait en emprisonnant les pions de votre adversaire entre deux pions de votre couleur.
Iagno al je une version par computer dal z├╗c Reversi, un z├╗c di taule di strategjie a doi zuiad├┤rs. Il z├╗c a si f├вs cun tessaris neris suntune bande e blancjis in che altre.

L'obiet├оf di Iagno al ├и chel di ribalt├в il plui pussibil lis tessaris dal aversari tal propri col├┤r, cirint di evit├в che l'aversari al fasedi altretant ribaltant lis t├┤s tal s├┤ col├┤r. Chest al suc├кt brincant lis pedinis dal aversari tra d├┤s dal propri col├┤r.
Iagno ├й unha versi├│n para ordenador de Reversi, un xogo de estratexia con taboleiro para dous xogadores. X├│gase con fichas brancas a un lado do taboleiro e negras ao outro.

description.p: GNOME MPV is a simple GTK+ frontend for mpv, which is a very powerful media player capable of playing virtually all video and audio formats. The design of GNOME MPV is based on GNOME HIG, though it is not dependent on any GNOME libraries. GNOME MPV also offers an option to disable client-side decorations (CSD) for better compatibility with non-GNOME systems.

GNOME MPV ├й um interface simples em GTK+ para mpv, que ├й um poderoso reprodutor multim├йdia capaz de reproduzir praticamente todos os formatos de v├нdeo e ├бudio. description.p: GNOME MPV je jednostavno GTK+ pro─Нelje za mpv, koji je veoma mo─Зan prikaziva─Н sposoban da pusti prakti─Нno sve video i audio formate. Dizajn GNOME MPV-a je baziran na GNOME HIG, ali je nezavistan od bilo koje GNOME biblioteke. GNOME MPV tako─Сe nudi opciju onemogu─Зavanja dekoracija klijenta (CSD) zbog kompatibilnosti s drugim okru┼╛enjima.
Mogu─Зnosti:

Utformningen av GNOME MPV ├дr baserat p├е GNOME HIG, dock ├дr det inte beroende av n├еgra GNOME bibliotek. GNOME MPV erbjuder ├дven som alternativ att inaktivera f├╢nsterdekorationer i klienten (CSD) f├╢r b├дttre kompatibilitet med icke-GNOME system.

description.p: A small application that allows you to monitor the current weather conditions for your city, or anywhere in the world.
It provides access to detailed forecasts, up to 7 days, with hourly details for the current and next day, using various internet services.
It also optionally integrates with the GNOME Shell, allowing you see the current conditions of the most recently searched cities by just typing its name in the Activities Overview.
Una chicota aplicaci├│n que le permite monitorizar l'orache actual en a suya ciudat, u en qualsiquier puesto d'o mundo.
Proporciona acceso a pronosticos actualizaus, dica 7 d├нas, con detalles cada hora ta o d├нa actual y o siguient, usando quantos servicios d'Internet.
Tami├йn s'integra opcionalment con GNOME Shell, permitindo-le veyer as condicions actuals de qualsiquier ciudat buscada recientment simplament escribindo o suyo nombre en a vista d'actividatz.

description.p: HomeBank is a free software (as in "free speech" and also as in "free beer") that will assist you to manage your personal accounting.
It is designed to easy to use and be able to analyse your personal finance in detail using powerful filtering tools and beautiful graphs.
If you are looking for a completely free and easy way to manage your personal accounting then HomeBank should be the software of choice.
Ur meziant digor ha digoust eo HomeBank a roy skoazell deoc'h da vera├▒ ho jederezh personel.
Ergrafet eo bet da veza├▒ aes d'ober ganta├▒ ha da veza├▒ gouest da zielfenna├▒ ho kellido├╣ personel dre ar munud dre arver binvio├╣ sila├▒ kre├▒v ha diervado├╣ brav.
Mard emaoc'h o klask un doare aes ha digoust evit mera├▒ ho jederezh personel e tlefe Homebank beza├▒ ar meziant da zibab.
El HomeBank ├йs un programari lliure que us ajudar├а a gestionar la vostra comptabilitat personal.
S'ha dissenyat per ser f├аcil d'utilitzar i permetre-us analitzar les vostres finances personals en detall utilitzant eines de filtrat potents i gr├аfiques intu├пtives.
Si esteu buscant una manera f├аcil i totalment gratuita de gestionar la vostra comptabilitat personal, el HomeBank ├йs la vostra millor opci├│.
Je navr┼╛en pro snadnou detailn├н anal├╜zu osobn├нch financ├н pomoc├н v├╜konn├╜ch filtra─Нn├нch n├бstroj┼п a p┼Щehledn├╜ch graf┼п.
Homebank er fri software (fri som i fri tale og gratis som i gratis ├╕l) som vil hj├жlpe dig med at administrere dit personlige regnskab
Det er udviklet for at v├жre enkelt at bruge og give dig muligheden for at analysere din personlige ├╕konomi i detaljer ved hj├жlp af kraftige filtreringsv├жrkt├╕jer og flotte grafer.
Hvis du er p├е udkig efter en helt gratis og nem m├еde at administrere din personlige bogf├╕ring p├е, s├е b├╕r HomeBank v├жre valget.
HomeBank ist kostenlose Software, das Sie bei der Verwaltung Ihrer Konten unterst├╝tzt.
Entwickelt f├╝r einfachen Bedienung und ausf├╝hrliche Analyse Ihrer Finanzen mit m├дchtigen Filterwerkzeugen und aussagekr├дftigen Diagrammen.
Wenn Sie eine einfache und kostenlose L├╢sung f├╝r das Verwalten Ihrer Konten suchen, dann sollten Sie die Software "HomeBank" w├дhlen.
HomeBank is a free software (as in "free speech" and also as in "free beer") that will assist you in managing your personal accounting.
It is designed to be easy to use and be able to analyse your personal finance in detail using powerful filtering tools and beautiful graphs.
If you are looking for a completely free and easy way to manage your personal accounting then HomeBank should be your software of choice.
HomeBank es un software libre que le ayudar├б a gestionar su contabilidad personal.
Est├б dise├▒ado para ser f├бcil de utilizar y ser capaz de analizar sus finanzas personales en detalle utilizando potentes herramientas de filtrado y gr├бficos muy intuitivos.
Si est├б usted buscando una manera totalmente f├бcil y gratis de gestionar su contabilidad personal, entonces HomeBank es su software, su mejor elecci├│n.
Homebank software librea da, lagunduko zaituena zure kontularitza pertsonala egiten.
Diseinatuta dago erraz erabiltzeko eta zure kontu pertsonalak xeheki aztertzeko, iragazki indartsuak eta grafiko txukunen bitartez.
Zure kontu pertsonalak maneiatzeko era erraz et erabat askea bilatzen baduzu, Homebank da zure aukerako softwarea.

description.p: GIMP is an acronym for GNU Image Manipulation Program. It is a freely distributed program for such tasks as photo retouching, image composition and image authoring.

It has many capabilities. It can be used as a simple paint program, an expert quality photo retouching program, an online batch processing system, a mass production image renderer, an image format converter, etc.

GIMP is expandable and extensible. It is designed to be augmented with plug-ins and extensions to do just about anything. The advanced scripting interface allows everything from the simplest task to the most complex image manipulation procedures to be easily scripted. GIMP is available for Linux, Microsoft Windows and OS X.
GIMP ye l'acronimo de Programa de Manipulaci├│n d'Imachens de GNU. Se distribui libre y gratuitament ta quefers de retocau de fotos, composici├│n d'imachens y autor├нa d'imachens.

Tien muitas de caracteristicas. Se puet fer servir como un simple programa de dibuixo, un programa de retoque fotografico profesional, un sistema de procesau por lotes, un chenerador d'imachens renderizadas en masa, un convertidor de formato d'imachens, etc.

O GIMP ye ampliable y extensible. Ye disenyau ta poder amillorar-lo con complementos y extensions ta fer quasi qualsiquier coseta. A interficie de programaci├│n abanzada permite fer un script ta qualsiquier coseta, dende un quefer sencillo dica os procedimientos de manipulaci├│n d'imachens mas complexos. O GIMP tami├йn ye disponible ta Microsoft Windows y OS X.

Het biedt vele mogelijkheden. Zo kan het worden gebruikt als eenvoudig tekenprogramma, professioneel fotobewerkingsprogramma, online systeem voor batch-verwerking, programma voor de massaproductie van afbeeldingen, programma voor het omzetten van afbeeldingsformaten, enz.

Met de geavanceerd scripting interface kunt u voor alles, van de eenvoudigste taak tot de meest ingewikkelde beeldbewerkingsprocedure, gemakkelijk een script maken. GIMP is beschikbaar voor Linux, Microsoft Windows and OS X.

FreeFileSync is a folder comparison and synchronization software that creates and manages backup copies of your important files. Instead of copying every file every time, FreeFileSync determines the differences between a source and a target folder and transfers only the minimum amount of data needed.

description.p: A tool to create a bootable live USB drive with an edition of Fedora. Not only can Fedora Media Writer write an image to your flash drive, it can also download it for you. It offers official editions (Server, Workstation), Fedora spins (KDE Plasma Desktop, Xfce Desktop, Cinnamon Desktop,...), and Fedora Labs (Design Suite, Security Lab,...). It provides basic information about each of them to help you make the right choice.
Fedora Media Writer can also write other bootable ISOs loaded from your local disk, but keep in mind that it's only tested with Fedora images.

Una eina per crear una unitat USB aut├▓noma d'arrencada amb una edici├│ de Fedora. Fedora Media Writer no nom├йs pot escriure una imatge en la vostra unitat flash, tamb├й pot baixar-la. Ofereix les edicions oficials (Server i Workstation), els spins de Fedora (KDE Plasma Desktop, Xfce Desktop, Cinnamon Desktop,...), i els laboratoris de Fedora (Design Suite, Security Lab, ...). Proporciona la informaci├│ b├аsica sobre cada un d'ells per ajudar a prendre la decisi├│ correcta.
Fedora Media Writer tamb├й pot escriure altres ISO d'arrencada des del vostre disc local, per├▓ tingueu present que nom├йs s'ha provat amb les imatges de Fedora.

N├бstroj pro vytv├б┼Щen├н ┼╛iv├╜ch USB disk┼п s n─Ыkterou z edic├н Fedory. Nejen, ┼╛e Fedora Media Writer zap├н┼бe obraz na v├б┼б disk, ale tak├й ho pro v├бs st├бhne. Nab├нz├н ofici├бln├н vyd├бn├н (Server, Workstation), Spiny Fedory (KDE Plasma Desktop, Xfce Desktop, Cinnamon Desktop,...) a Fedora Labs (Design Suite, Security Lab,...). Obsahuje z├бkladn├н informace o ka┼╛d├йm z nich, aby pro v├бs bylo sna┼╛┼б├н ud─Ыlat spr├бvnou volbu.
Fedora Media Writer tak├й dok├б┼╛e zapsat jin├й bootovateln├й ISO obrazy z va┼бeho disku, ale m─Ыjte na pam─Ыti, ┼╛e byl testovan├╜ pouze s obrazy Fedory.

Et v├жrkt├╕j til at oprette et opstartsbart live-USB-drev med en udgave af Fedora. Fedora-medieskriver kan ikke blot skrive et aftryk til dit flash-drev, den kan ogs├е downloade det for dig. Den tilbyder officielle udgaver (Server, Workstation), Fedora-spins (KDE Plasma-skrivebord, Xfce-skrivebord, Cinnamon-skrivebord, ...) og Fedora Labs (designpakke, sikkerhedslaboratorie, ...). Den giver grundl├жggende information om hver af dem for at hj├жlpe dig med at tr├жffe det rigtige valg.
Fedora-medieskriver kan ogs├е skrive andre opstartsbare ISO'er indl├жst fra din lokale disk, men husk p├е at den kun er testet med Fedora-aftryk.

Ein Werkzeug, um einen bootf├дhigen Live-USB-Datentr├дger mit einer Ausgabe von Fedora zu erzeugen. Fedora Media Writer kann nicht nur ein Abbild auf einen Flash-Datentr├дger schreiben, sondern auch f├╝r Sie herunterladen. Es werden offizielle Ausgaben angeboten (Server, Workstation), Fedora Spins (KDE Plasma Desktop, Xfce Desktop, Cinnamon Desktop тАж) und Fedora Labs (Design Suite, Security Lab тАж). Grundlegende Informationen zu jeder Ausgabe werden angezeigt, um Ihnen bei der Auswahl zu helfen.
Fedora Media Writer kann au├Яerdem mit bootf├дhigen ISO-Abbildern von Ihrer Festplatte umgehen. Bitte bedenken Sie jedoch, dass das Programm nur mit Fedora-Abbildern getestet wurde.

Una herramienta para crear un USB vivo de arranque con una versi├│n de Fedora. Fedora Media Writer no solamente escribe una imagen en su disco port├бtil, sino que adem├бs puede descargarla si no la tiene. Ofrece las versiones oficiales (Servidor, Estaci├│n de Trabajo), Ediciones especiales (Escritorio KDE Plasma, Escritorio Xfce, Escritorio Cinnamon...), y Fedora Labs (Herramientas de dise├▒o, Laboratorio de Seguridad...). Proporciona informaci├│n b├бsica de cada una de ellas para ayudarle a elegir la m├бs conveniente.
Fedora Media Writer tambi├йn puede escribir otras ISOs de arranque que tenga en su disco duro, pero tenga en cuenta que solo se prueba con im├бgenes de Fedora.

Ohjelma, jolla voi luoda USB-muistilta k├дynnistett├дv├дn Fedoran. Luontity├╢kalu osaa ladata levykuvan ja kirjoittaa sen USB-muistille. Tarjolla ovat viralliset editiot (Server ja Workstation), Fedoran spinit (mm. Xfce-, Cinnamon- ja KDE Plasma -ty├╢p├╢yd├дt) sek├д Fedora Lab -julkaisut (mm. design-ohjelmistot ja turvallisuuslaboratorio). Valinnan avuksi niist├д jokaisesta kerrotaan lyhyesti.
Fedora-median luontity├╢kalulla voi kirjoittaa USB:lle my├╢s muita ISO-tiedostoja, mutta ty├╢kalua on testattu vain Fedoran levykuvilla.

Un outil pour cr├йer une disque USB live avec une version de Fedora. Non seulement Fedora Media Writer peut ├йcrire une image sur votre disque USB, mais il peut aussi la t├йl├йcharger pour vous. Il offre les ├йditions officielles (Server, Workstation), les Fedora Spins (environnements KDE┬аPlasma, Xfce, CinnamonтАж) et les Fedora Labs (Design Suite, Security LabтАж). Il fournit des informations de base sur chacune de ces options pour vous permettre de faire le bon choix.
Fedora Media Writer peut aussi ├йcrire d'autres images ISO amor├зables charg├йes depuis votre disque local, mais sachez bien qu'il n'a ├йt├й test├й qu'avec les images de Fedora.

Un strument par cre├в une unit├вt USB Live inviabile cuntune edizion di Fedora. Scritor Supuarts di Fedora al pues no dome scrivi une imagjin su calvute, al pues ancje discjari├вtile. Al ufr├мs edizions ufici├вi (Servid├┤r,Workstation), Fedora spins (KDE Plasma Desktop, Xfce Desktop, Cinnamon Desktop,...) e Fedora Labs (Design Suite, Security Lab,...). Al furn├мs informazions di base su ogniune di l├┤r par f├вti sielzi ben.
Scrit├┤r Supuarts di Fedora al pues ancje scrivi altris ISO inviabilis, cjariadis sul disc fis loc├вl, ma ten iniments che al ├и st├вt prov├вt dome cun lis imagjins di Fedora.

Alat untuk menciptakan drive USB live yang dapat di-boot dengan suatu edisi Fedora. Fedora Media Writer tidak hanya dapat menulis image ke flash disk Anda, itu juga dapat mengunduhkan untuk Anda. Menawarkan edisi resmi (Server, Workstation), Fedora spins (Desktop KDE Plasma, Desktop Xfce, Desktop Cinnamon, ...), dan Fedora Labs (Design Suite, Security Lab, ...). Menyediakan informasi dasar tentang masing-masing edisi untuk membantu Anda membuat pilihan yang benar.
Fedora Media Writer juga dapat menulis ISO yang dapat di-boot lain dari disk lokal Anda, tapi ingatlah bahwa ini hanya diuji untuk image Fedora.

Uno strumento per creare dispositivi live USB con una edizione di Fedora. Non solo Fedora Media Writer ├и in grado di scrivere immagini su chiavi USB, ma anche di effettuarne il download. Mette a disposizione le edizioni ufficiali (Server, Workstation), le spin di Fedora (KDE Plasma Desktop, Xfce Desktop, Cinnamon Desktop,...), e le edizioni Fedora Labs (Design Suite, Security Lab,...). Fornisce inoltre informazioni di base su ciascuna di esse per aiutarvi a fare la scelta giusta.
Fedora Media Writer pu├▓ inoltre creare altre ISO avviabili da immagini caricate dai dischi locali, ma va tenuto presente che ├и testato solo con le immagini Fedora.

Een hulpmiddel om een opstartbare live-USB-drive te maken met een oplage van Fedora. Fedora mediaschrijver kan niet alleen een image naar je flash drive schrijven, maar kan deze ook voor je downloaden. Het biedt offici├лle edities aan (Server, Workstation), Fedora spins (KDE Plasma Desktop, Xfce Desktop, Cinnamon Desktop,...), en Fedora Labs (Design Suite, Security Lab,...). Het biedt basis informatie over elke editie aan om je de juiste keuze te laten maken.
Fedora mediaschrijver kan ook andere opstartbare ISO's schrijven die geladen zijn vanaf je lokale schijf, maar denk eraan dat dit alleen getest is voor Fedora images.
