Agenda is a simple, slick, speedy and no-nonsense task manager. Use it to keep track of the tasks that matter most.

ul.li: Remembers your list until you clear completed tasks

description.p: I dare you to find an easier, faster, more beautiful task manager for elementary OS.
Edit application entries shown in application menu and their properties.
Features include:

ul.li: Hide and show applications from the application menu
Change application's display name, icon and more

description.p: This release contains many new features and bug fixes as well as added suport for translations:
New features:

ul.li: Added a button to duplicate a specifc application entry
New "Advanced" section: add a new "Uses Notitifications" key

description.p: Fixed:

ul.li: Fixed crashes when saving an entry with an equal sign in it's command line property
Sometimes deleting a local entry would cause it to stay in the sidebar until the next launch
Sometimes creating a new entry caused a crash
The page would not update after saving the entry

description.p: Miscellaneous:

ul.li: Save unsaved entries when quitting the application
Clear the search entry when creating a new application entry

description.p: New features:

ul.li: Added a button to open the entry in a text editor
Added a switch to show hidden entries (disabled by default)

description.p: Miscellaneous:

ul.li: Fixed some applications like Inkscape not saving their name properly
The main window can be now maximized

description.p: Add meson dependency to debian packaging

component.name: Pop Gtk theme
component.summary: Pop Gtk theme used by System76

description.p: An adaptive Gtk+ theme based on the Adapta GTK+ theme..

component.name: PyCharm-Community
component.summary: Pycharm - The most intelligent Python IDE

description.p: PyCharmтАЩs smart code editor provides first-class support for Python, JavaScript, CoffeeScript, TypeScript, CSS, popular template languages and more. Take advantage of language-aware code completion, error detection, and on-the-fly code fixes!
Indexing Performance
Debugger Performance
New Interpreter Settings Screen
Run Python Modules
Code Highlighting: Function Calls and Type Hints

component.name: MediaConch
component.summary: Implementation checker, policy checker, reporter, and fixer

description.p: MediaConch is an implementation checker, policy checker, reporter, and fixer that targets preservation-level audiovisual files
This project is maintained by MediaArea and funded by PREFORMA.

component.name: Poedit
component.summary: GUI editor for GNU gettext .po files

description.p: This program is a GUI frontend to GNU Gettext utilities and a catalogs editor/source code parser. It helps with translating applications into other languages.

Dieses Programm stellt eine grafische Benutzeroberfl├дche f├╝r die Dienstprogramme aus GNU Gettext bereit, sowie einen Katalogeditor und einen Quellcode-Parser. Es hilft beim ├Ьbersetzen von Anwendungen in andere Sprachen.

component.name: KeePassXC
component.summary: Community-driven port of the Windows application тАЬKeePass Password SafeтАЭ

description.p: KeePassXC is an application for people with extremely high demands on secure personal data management. It has a light interface, is cross-platform and published under the terms of the GNU General Public License.
Changes included in this release:

ul.li: Fixes apply button not saving new entries [#1141]
Switch to Consolas font on Windows for password edit [#1229]

description.p: Changes included in this release:

ul.li: Fixed entries with empty URLs being reported to KeePassHTTP clients [#1031]
Fixed YubiKey detection and enabled CLI tool for AppImage binary [#1100]
Improved TOTP compatibility and added new Base32 implementation [#1069]
Fixed error handling when processing invalid cipher stream [#1099]
Fixed double warning display when opening a database [#1037]
Added ability to override QT_PLUGIN_PATH environment variable for AppImages [#1079]
Fixed transform seed not being regenerated when saving the database [#1068]
Fixed only one YubiKey slot being polled [#1048]
Corrected an issue with entry icons while merging [#1008]
Corrected desktop and tray icons in Snap package [#1030]
Fixed screen lock and Google fallback settings [#1029]

description.p: Changes included in this release:

ul.li: Fixed single instance preventing load on occasion [#997]
Keep entry history when merging databases [#970]
Prevent data loss if passwords were mismatched [#1007]
Unlock database dialog window comes to front [#663]

description.p: The Nextcloud desktop client allows you to keep one or more folders full of your photos, videos and documents synchronized with your server. Any file you add, modify or delete in the synced folders on your desktop or laptop will show up, change or disappear on the server and all other connected devices. Thanks to the client, you can work with your files even when you are not online!

component.name: Genius
component.summary: Genius is a general purpose calculator program

ul.li: Arbitrary precision integers, multiple precision floats.
Complex numbers, stored in Cartesian coordinates as usual.
Math-like-looking expressions, tries to be as much a what-you-mean-is-what-Genius-understands, up to a limit of course.
Matrix calculations / Linear Algebra, with many related functions.
Calculus, numerical and even very limited symbolic calculations.
Statistics, all the basic statistical functions.
Numerical equation solving, polynomial roots, etc...
Modular arithmetic, including inversions and modular arithmetic on matrices.
A complete programming language, with automatic typing. In fact large part of Genius standard library is written in GEL.
2D Function line plots, standard 2D graphs of up to 10 functions at once, with possibility to export to EPS or PNG.
Parametric plots, with possibility to export to EPS or PNG.
3D Function surface plots, with possibility to export to EPS or PNG
GUI IDE where you can edit and run/test your programs.
Can output matrices in LaTeX, Troff (eqn) or MathML, this is I think a very cool feature that allows you to copy stuff directly from Genius to a document in LaTeX, troff or MathML.

component.name: QCTools
component.summary: Quality Control Tools for Video Preservation

description.p: QCTools is a software tool that helps users analyze and understand their digitized video files through use of audiovisual analytics and filtering to help users detect corruptions or compromises in the results of analog video digitization or in born-digital video.
Arc-solid is a flat theme for Gtk3.

MyPaint is a fast, free, and easy graphics app for digital painters. It lets you focus on the art you make instead of the program you make it with. You can work on your canvas without clutter, and show the interface only when you need it. MyPaint works best with a graphics tablet.

MyPaintтАЩs brush engine is fast and almost infinitely configurable to simulate many natural media brushes or experimental тАШunrealisticтАЩ ones. It ships with a variety of pre-made brushes by prominent artists, so you donтАЩt have to configure your own if you donтАЩt want to.

component.name: Greybird Gtk theme
component.summary: Greybird Gtk theme used by Xubuntu

description.p: Greybird theme.

component.name: elementary stylesheet
component.summary: The Gtk+ Stylesheet for elementary OS.

description.p: An original Gtk.CSS stylesheet designed specifically for elementary OS and its desktop environment: Pantheon.

Paper is a modern freedesktop icon theme whose design is based around the use of bold colours and simple geometric shapes to compose icons. Each icon has been meticulously designed for pixel-perfect viewing.
MegaGlest is a 3D real-time strategy game (RTS) with medieval and magic character which offers tutorials, scenarios but also customizable single-player and multi-player skirmishes.
Multi-player mode supports cross-platform matches up to 8 players over the Internet or LAN against human opponents, or in cooperation against CPU (A.I.) players of various difficulty levels.
From within the game you can download a lot of additional game data (e.g. other maps) at no cost.

component.name: Breeze Gtk theme
component.summary: Breeze Gtk theme matching the KDE Breeze theme

description.p: Breeze Gtk theme that matches the KDE breeze theme.

component.name: Gydl
component.summary: Download content from sites like YouTube
H├дmta inneh├еll fr├еn webbplatser som YouTube

description.p: Gydl (Graphical youtube-dl) is a tool that enables downloading of content from YouTube and many other sites. It provides a minimal interface based on dialogues, making it quick and easy to download multimedia content.
Because user needs vary, Gydl supports both audio and video downloads. If a selected format is not available at the source, Gydl will attempt to convert it.
Gydl is based upon the popular youtube-dl program, which can be found on GitHub. A big thank you to the developer(s).

Gydl (grafisk youtube-dl) ├дr ett verktyg som m├╢jligg├╢r nedladdning av inneh├еll fr├еn YouTube samt m├еnga andra webbplatser. Det f├╢rser ett simpelt gr├дnssnitt baserat p├е dialoger, vilket g├╢r det snabbt och enkelt att ladda ner multimedia inneh├еll.
Eftersom anv├дndarbehov varierar, st├╢djer Gydl nedladdningar av b├еde ljud och video. Om ett valt format inte ├дr tillg├дngligt hos k├дllan, kommer Gydl att f├╢rs├╢ka konvertera det.
Gydl ├дr baserat p├е det popul├дra youtube-dl programmet, som ni kan hitta p├е GitHub. Ett stort tack till till utvecklarna.

component.name: BlockOut II
component.summary: A free adaptation of the original BlockOut game

description.p: BlockOut II is a game where the player moves and rotate 3D polycubes that are constantly falling with the objective of clearing layers of blocks. It is a free adaptation of the original BlockOut game released in 1989.

component.name: Cockatrice
component.summary: A cross-platform virtual tabletop for multiplayer card games

description.p: Cockatrice is an open-source multi-platform supported program for playing tabletop card games over a network. The program's server design prevents any kind of client modifications to gain an unfair advantage in a game. The client also has a built in single-player mode where you can create decks without being connected to a server.
Xiphos is a program for high-grade Bible study using the modules and underlying engine support of The Sword Project.

ul.li: Fully integrated, tabbed interface with Bible+commentary+dictionary
User content support: hierarchical bookmarks, personal verse annotations, journals, prayer lists

Sword modules provide the widest language coverage of any Bible software anywhere: 400+ Bibles in 150+ languages, with major support for original languages (a dozen each in Hebrew and Greek) plus major support in e.g. English, Russian, German, Portuguese, and French
Power search capability; footnotes and xrefs; detached windows; text-to-speech support
Strong's and morphology support, including pseudo-interlinear display
BibleSync shared multicast navigation in personal or speaker/audience modes
Supports Linux and Windows including active support in IRC and mailing lists

component.name: Riot
component.summary: Create, share, communicate, chat and call securely, and bridge to other apps

description.p: More than group chat: communication

ul.li: Communicate with your team and out of network colleagues more efficiently: use dedicated rooms which persist information from their creation and forever.
Forget group emails: join or create rooms per topic, per team, per eventтАж Decide the level of transparency you want to provide across the organisation or project.
Cut through the noise by creating notifications that are customised by you and for you.
Grab the attention of your colleague by calling out their name and donтАЩt miss a thing with keyword alerts.
Deploy bots for fun or practical use with our integrations store.

component.name: Bluefish
component.summary: Text editor with many web and software development extra's

description.p: Bluefish is a powerful editor targeted towards programmers and web developers, with many options to write websites, scripts and programming code. Bluefish supports many programming and markup languages and has many features, but is still a very fast and lightweight application.
A selection of the features:

ul.li: Well done syntax highlighting which for example supports languages inside languages (e.g. Javascript inside HTML inside PHP)
All kind of powerful editor features like auto indenting and auto completion for many functions and libraries in many programming languages
Support for remote files over ftp, sftp, webdav, etc
Customizable integration of external programs such as lint, make, etc
Snippets plugin to automate often used code

description.p: If you are an occasional coder who is in need for a simple to learn editor, or a heavy coder who dislikes heavy IDE's like eclipse or netbeans, Bluefish is your editor of choice!

Bluefish is een krachtige editor gericht op programmeurs en web-ontwikkelaars, met veel extra's om websites, scripts en code te schrijven. Bluefish ondersteunt vele programmeer- en opmaaktalen, heeft veel mogelijkheden, en is tegelijkertijd een snelle en lichtgewicht applicatie.
Een selectie van de mogelijkheden:

ul.li: Goede syntax-highlighting die binnen in een taal een andere taal ondersteunt (bijv. JavaScript in HTML in PHP)
Allerlei krachtige editoropties zoals automatisch inspringen en automatisch aanvullen van namen van vele functies en uit bibliotheken van veel programmeertalen
Ondersteuning voor bestanden op servers, via ftp, sftp, webdav, et cetera
Configureerbare integratie met externe programmatuur zoals lint, make, etc.
Een "Snippets" plugin om veelgebruikte code te automatiseren
Spellingcontrole die rekening houdt met programmeercode

description.p: Als je af en toe programmeert, en je zoekt een makkelijk te gebruiken editor, of je bent een professionele programmeur die niet van zwaar opgetuigde IDE's als Eclipse of Netbeans houdt, dan is Bluefish de editor voor jou!

Bluefish er eit kraftig skriveprogram retta mot programmerarar og nettutviklarar. Det har mange val for ├е skriva nettstadar, skript og programkode. Bluefish st├╕ttar mange programmerings- og markeringsspr├еk. Det har mange eigenskapar, men er likevel eit s├жrs raskt og lite program.
Eit utval av eigenskapane:

ul.li: Bra utf├╕rt syntaksframheving som til d├╕mes st├╕ttar spr├еk inne i spr├еk (slik som Javascript i HTML i PHP)
Alle slag kraftige skriveprogramseigenskapar som automatiske innrykk og fullf├╕ringar for mange funksjonar og bibliotek i mange programmeringsspr├еk
St├╕ttar fjernfiltilgang over ftp,sftp, webdav, mv.
Kraftig motor for s├╕k og erstatt
Tilpassa integrering av eksterne program som lint, make, o.l.
Tilleggsprogram for kodesnuttar for ├е automatisera ofte nytta kode

description.p: Bluefish tilfredsstiller krava b├еde til hobbyprogrammeraren som treng eit skriveprogram som er lett ├е l├жra og til den profesjonelle utviklaren som misliker tunge integrerte utviklingsmilj├╕ som Eclipse eller Netbeans.

Bluefish to pot─Щ┼╝ny edytor ukierunkowany dla programist├│w i tw├│rc├│w stron internetowych. Posiada wiele opcji do tworzenia stron internetowych, skrypt├│w i kod├│w program├│w. Bluefish obs┼Вuguje wiele j─Щzyk├│w programowania i znacznik├│w oraz posiada mn├│stwo funkcji, zachowuj─Еc przy tym szybko┼Ы─З, lekko┼Ы─З i stabilno┼Ы─З.
Wybrane funkcje:

ul.li: Zaawansowana obs┼Вuga pod┼Ыwietlania sk┼Вadni z funkcj─Е wyr├│┼╝niania kodu w kodzie (np. rozr├│┼╝nianie kodu JavaScript wewn─Еtrz HTML w PHP)
Du┼╝o u┼╝ytecznych funkcji, takich jak automatyczne wci─Щcia oraz zako┼Дczenia wielu funkcji i bibliotek. Bluefish obs┼Вuguje naprawd─Щ wiele j─Щzyk├│w programowania.
Obs┼Вuga zdalnych plik├│w poprzez ftp, sftp, webdav itp.
Konfigurowalna integracja z zewn─Щtrznymi programami takimi jak lint, make itp.
Wtyczka Snipets (Fragmenty) do automatyzacji cz─Щsto u┼╝ywanego kodu

description.p: Je┼╝eli jeste┼Ы osob─Е, kt├│ra rzadko programuje i potrzebuje prostego edytora lub posiadasz du┼╝─Е wiedz─Щ i do┼Ыwiadczenie, ale nie przypad┼Вy Ci do gustu takie ┼Ыrodowiska jak Eclipse czy NetBeans, Bluefish jest w┼Вa┼Ыnie dla Ciebie!

Bluefish ├й um poderoso editor direcionado a programadores e web developers, com muitas op├з├╡es para escrever websites, scripts e c├│digos. Bluefish suporta muitas linguagens de programa├з├гo e markup e t├кm muitos recursos, mas ainda assim ├й um aplicativo bastante r├бpido e leve.
Uma sele├з├гo de recursos:

ul.li: Refinado destaque de sintaxe que, por exemplo, suporta linguagens dentro de linguagens (e.g. Javascript dentro de HTML dentro de PHP)
Todos os tipos de poderosos recursos editoriais como recuo autom├бtico e auto completar para muitas fun├з├╡es e bibliotecas em muitas linguagens de programa├з├гo
Suporta arquivos remotos por ftp, sftp, webdav, etc
Poderoso sistema de busca e substitui├з├гo
Integra├з├гo ajust├бvel de programas externos como lint, make, etc
Plugin Snippets para automatizar c├│digo usado com frequ├кncia
Checagem ortogr├бfica em linha sens├нvel a c├│digo

description.p: Se voc├к ├й um programador casual que precisa de um editor f├бcil de aprender, ou umprogramador avan├зado que n├гo gosta de IDE's pesados como eclipse ou netbeans, Bluefish ├й o editor correto para voc├к!

description.p: gbrainy is a game to train memory, arithmetical and logical capabilities with many sorts of exercises of different difficulty levels.

It should have something for all ages and purposes: kids whose parents want them to develop their capabilities, adults that want to keep their mind in form or just try it out for fun, older people that might need to do some memory exercises, etc.

├Йs ├║til per a totes les edats i prop├▓sits: nens els quals els seus pares volen que desenvolupin les seves habilitats, adults que volen mantenir la seva ment en forma, o simplement per passar-ho b├й, o gent gran que vulgui fer exercicis de mem├▓ria.

Deber├нa tener algo para todas las edades y prop├│sitos: ni├▒os cuyos padres quieren que desarrollen sus capacidades, adultos que quieren mantener su mente en forma o simplemente probarlo por diversi├│n, personas mayores que necesitan hacer m├бs ejercicios de memoria, etc.
gbrainy memoria, aritmetika eta logikako gaitasunak entrenatzeko joko bat da, zailtasun-maila desberdineko ariketa-sorta ugari dituena.

Adin eta helburu guztietarako zerbait eduki beharko luke: guraso askok beren umeek gaitasunak lantzea nahi dute, heldu askok beren burua osasuntsu mantendu nahi dute edo besterik gabe ondo pasa, hirugarren adineko askok memoria lantzeko ariketak egin nahi dituzte...

gbrainy ir atmi┼Жas tren─У┼бanas, aritm─Уtikas un lo─гikas sp─Уju sp─Уle ar daudziem uzdevumiem ar da┼╛─Бd─Бm gr┼лt─лbas pak─Бp─Уm.

description.p: Nautilus, also known as Files, is the default file manager of the GNOME desktop. It provides a simple and integrated way of managing your files and browsing your file system.

Nautilus supports all the basic functions of a file manager and more. It can search and manage your files and folders, both locally and on a network, read and write data to and from removable media, run scripts, and launch applications. It has three views: Icon Grid, Icon List, and Tree List. Its functions can be extended with plugins and scripts.

Nautilus, tami├йn conoixiu como Fichers, ye o chestor de fichers predeterminau d'o escritorio GNOME. Proporciona una traza sencilla y integrada ta chestionar os suyos fichers y explorar o sistema de fichers.

Nautilus suporta todas as funcions basicas d'un chestor de fichers y qualques mas. Puede buscar y chestionar os suyos fichers y carpetas, tanto locals como remotas, leyer y escribir datos de y en dispositivos extra├нbles, executar scripts y lanzar aplicacions. Tiene tres vistas: reixeta d'iconos, lista d'iconos y arbol. Se puede enamplar a suya funcionalidat con scripts y complementos.

On ima tri pogleda: Ikona re┼бetke, ikona popis, i stablo popis. Njegova funkcija mo┼╛e se produ┼╛iti uz dodataka i skripti.

El Nautilus, tamb├й conegut com el Fitxers, ├йs el gestor de fitxers per defecte de l'escriptori GNOME. Permet, d'una forma simple i integrada, la gesti├│ de fitxers i la navegaci├│ pel sistema de fitxers.

Nautilus, som ogs├е kendes som Filer eller Files, er standardfilh├еndteringen for GNOME-skrivebordet. Nautilus tilbyder en simpel og integreret m├еde at gennemse filsystemet p├е og filh├еndtering generelt.

Nautilus underst├╕tter alle de grundl├жggende funktioner til filh├еndtering med mere. Nautilus, auch bekannt als Dateien, ist die mitgelieferte Dateiverwaltung der GNOME Arbeitsumgebung. Es bietet eine einfache und ma├Яgeschneiderte Art Ihre Dateien zu verwalten und Ihr Dateisystem zu durchsuchen.

Nautilus unterst├╝tzt alle grundlegenden Funktionen einer Dateiverwaltung und mehr. Es kann nach lokalen und im Netzwerk gelegenen Dateien und Ordnern suchen und diese verwalten, Daten von entfernbaren Medien lesen und schreiben, Skripte ausf├╝hren und Anwendungen starten. Nautilus, also known as Files, is the default file manager of the GNOME desktop. It provides a simple and integrated way of managing your files and browsing your file system.

Nautilus supports all the basic functions of a file manager and more. It can search and manage your files and folders, both locally and on a network, read and write data to and from removable media, run scripts, and launch applications. It has three views: Icon Grid, Icon List, and Tree List. Its functions can be extended with plugins and scripts.

Nautilus, tambi├йn conocido como Archivos, es el gestor de archivos predeterminado del escritorio GNOME. Proporciona una manera sencilla e integrada para gestionar sus archivos y explorar el sistema de archivos.

Nautilus soporta todas las funciones b├бsicas de un gestor de archivos y algunas m├бs. Puede buscar y gestionar sus archivos y carpeta, tanto locales como remotas, leer y escribir datos de y en dispositivos extra├нbles, ejecutar scripts y lanzar aplicaciones. Tiene tres vistas: rejilla de iconos, lista de iconos y ├бrbol. Se puede ampliar su funcionalidad con scripts y complementos.
Nautilus ehk "Failid" on GNOME t├╢├╢laua vaikimisi failihaldur. See annab failide haldamiseks ja failis├╝steemi sirvimiseks lihtsa ja l├╡imitud liidese.

Nautilus toetab k├╡iki failihalduri p├╡hifunktsioone ning palju enam. See oskab otsida ja hallata nii kohalikke kui v├╡rguressurssidel asuvaid faile, lugeda ja kirjutada andmeid v├дlistele andmekandjatele, k├дivitada skripte ja rakendusi. Sellel on kolm vaadet: ikoonide ruudustik, ikoonide loetelu ja puuvaade. Nautiluse v├╡imalusi saab laiendada pluginate ja skriptidega.

Nautilus, Fitxategiak bezala ere ezaguna, GNOME mahaigaineko fitxategi-kudeatzaile lehenetsia da. Zure fitxategiak kudeatzeko eta baita fitxategi-sistema arakatzeko modu bateratua eta xumea eskatzen du.

Nautilus-ek fitxategi-kudeatzaile baten oinarrizko funtzio guztiak eta gehiago eskaintzen du. Zure fitxategiak eta karpetak bila eta kudea ditzake bai lokalki baita sarean ere. Datuak euskarri aldagarritik irakurri eta idatz ditzake, script-ak exekutatu eta aplikazioak abiarazi. Hiru ikuspegi ditu: ikonoen sareta, ikonoen zerrenda eta zuhaitzaren zerrenda. Bere gaitasunak hedatu daitezke pluginen eta scripten bidez.

Nautilus, yang juga dikenal sebagai Berkas, adalah manajer berkas baku dari desktop GNOME. Ini menyediakan cara terintegrasi dan sederhana untuk pengelolaan berkas-berkas Anda dan meramban sistem berkas Anda.

Nautilus mendukung semua fungsi dasar dari suatu manajer berkas dan lebih. Ini dapat mencari dan mengelola berkas dan folder Anda, lokal dan pada jaringan, membaca dan menulis data ke dan dari media lepas pasang, menjalankan skrip, dan meluncurkan aplikasi. Ini memiilki tiga tilikan, Kisi Ikon, Daftar Ikon, dan Daftar Pohon. Fungsinya bisa diperluas dengan pengaya dan skrip.

Nautilus, noto anche come ┬лFile┬╗, ├и il gestore di file predefinito dell'ambiente grafico GNOME. Fornisce gestione dei file ed esplorazione del file system semplici e integrate.

Supporta tutte le funzionalit├а di base di un gestore di file e molto altro: ├и in grado di eseguire ricerche e gestire file e cartelle (localmente e da remoto), leggere e scrivere da supporti rimovibili, eseguire script e lanciare applicazioni. Dispone di tre diverse tipologie di visualizzazione: come una griglia d'icone, un elenco d'icone e un elenco ad albero. ├И possibile estenderne le funzionalit├а attraverso plugin e script.

component.name: Extreme Tuxracer
component.summary: High speed arctic racing game based on Tux Racer

description.p: Extreme Tux Racer is a downhill racing game starring Tux, the Linux penguin.
Tux must slide on his belly down snow and ice covered hills, collecting herring, and making it to the finish line before the time is up.
ETR is based on PlanetPenguin Racer, which is in turn based on the famous Tux Racer.

description.p: A simple application to access, organize and share your photos on GNOME. It is meant to be a simple and elegant replacement for using a file manager to deal with photos. Seamless cloud integration is offered through GNOME Online Accounts.
It lets you:

ul.li: View recent local and online photos
Access your Facebook or Flickr content
Send photos to remote DLNA renderers
Allow opening full featured editor for more advanced changes

description.p: Una sencilla aplicacio╠Бn ta accedir, organizar y compartir as suyas fotos en GNOME. Ye pensada ta estar un reemplazo sencillo elegant de l'uso d'un chestor de fichers ta chestionar as suyas fotos. S'integra perfectament con a boira por meyo d'as cuentas en li╠Бnea de GNOME.
Le permite:

ul.li: Veyer fotos locals y en linia recients
Accedir a o suyo conteniu de Facebook u Flickr
Ninviar fotos a renderizadores DLNA remotos
Ubrir un editor completo ta cambeos mas abanzaus

description.p: Some discover design tweaks, improved tags support, improved filter popover, updated translations, improved m3u export
The "Discover" section is back! Merged "Add" and "Search" page. New unified library view. Library can now be exported as M3U playlist. And much more..!
Group your stations into collections, Everything is now sortable, Extended search page, Stations can be created and edited, New details sidebar, New selection system

component.name: KDE Application Platform version master
component.summary: Shared libraries used by KDE applications

description.p: A roguelike adventure through dungeons filled with dangerous monsters in a quest to find the mystifyingly fabulous Orb of Zot.
Major bugfixes and updates:

ul.li: Dith shadow mimic of launcher attacks no longer copies the enchant and ego of the launcher.
Monsters lose constriction by Borgnjor's Vile Clutch when they are moved by any means.
Formicids can now manually cancel Dig status, allowing them to use Wu Jian's Wall Jump ability after digging.
Wu Jian's Wall Jump ability now works under silence.
New splash screen art by froggy.
Numlock on Windows systems no longer causes unpredictable repeating movement.
Alt-F4 no longer causes freezing in Tiles on Windows systems.
Resizing the local Tiles window during prompts no longer causes crashes.
SDL 2 contrib updated to 2.0.7, which fixes compilation under Msys2.

description.p: Dith shadow mimics of launcher attacks were giving you all free enchantment and ego damage. That's simply unfair to those poor dungeon monsters, so we had to fix it! The numlock key causing repeating movement was reported by users far and wide, so many thanks to advil for tracking down and fixing that rather difficult bug. Hopefully you enjoy the new splash art by South Korean artist froggy, whose inspirational depiction of Boris and Natasha is a personal favorite.

Videos, also known as Totem, is the official movie player of the GNOME desktop environment. It features a searchable list of local videos, and DVDs, as well as local network video shares (using UPnP/DLNA) and video highlights from a number of web sites.
Totem comes with added functionality such as: subtitle downloader, and support for recording DVDs.

ul.li: Video thumbnailer for the file manager

Video, tako─Сer poznat kao Totem, je slu┼╛beni izvo─Сa─Н filmova GNOME desktop okru┼╛enja. Ima mogu─Зnosti pretra┼╛ivati popis lokalnih videa i DVD-a, kao i dijeljenog videa lokalne mre┼╛e (pomo─Зu UPnP / DLNA) i video zna─Нajnim stvarima iz niza web stranica.
Totem dolazi s dodanim funkcionalnostima kao ┼бto su: titl downloader, i podr┼бku za snimanje DVD-a.

El V├нdeos, tamb├й conegut com a Totem, ├йs el reproductor de pel┬╖l├нcules oficial per a l'entorn d'escriptori GNOME. Permet fer cerques dels v├нdeos locals, i DVD, aix├н com tamb├й de les comparticions de v├нdeo per xarxa (mitjan├зant UPnP/DLNA) i fins i tot de v├нdeos destacats d'un bon nombre de p├аgines web.
El Totem tamb├й ve amb funcionalitats afegides com: baixador de subt├нtols i enregistrament de DVD.

ul.li: Miniaturitzador de v├нdeo per al gestor de fitxers

description.p: El V├нdeos, tamb├й conegut com a Totem, ├йs el reproductor de pel┬╖l├нcules oficial per a l'entorn d'escriptori GNOME. Permet fer cerques dels v├нdeos locals, i DVD, aix├н com tamb├й de les comparticions de v├нdeo per xarxa (mitjan├зant UPnP/DLNA) i fins i tot de v├нdeos destacats d'un bon nombre de p├аgines web.

description.p: Aplikace Videa, zn├бm├б i pod n├бzvem Totem, je ofici├бln├н p┼Щehr├бva─Н film┼п v pracovn├нm prost┼Щed├н GNOME. M┼п┼╛ete vyhled├бvat v seznamech m├нstn├нch vide├н a DVD, stejn─Ы jako vide├н sd├нlen├╜ch p┼Щes m├нstn├н s├н┼е (pomoc├н UPnP/DLNA) a v├╜znamn├╜ch vide├н z n─Ыkter├╜ch web┼п.
P┼Щin├б┼б├н i roz┼бi┼Щuj├нc├н funkce, jako je stahov├бn├н titulk┼п a podpora nahr├бv├бn├н DVD.

ul.li: Vytv├б┼Щen├н n├бhled┼п vide├н pro spr├бvce soubor┼п

description.p: Totem, auch bekannt als Videos, ist die offizielle Filmwiedergabe f├╝r die GNOME Arbeitsumgebung. Es bietet eine durchsuchbare Liste der Videos auf dem lokalen Rechner, auf DVDs und lokalen Netzlaufwerken (├╝ber UPnP/DLNA) sowie die Wiedergabe von Videos einiger Webseiten und Kn├╢pfe zum Spulen und f├╝r die Lautst├дrke sowie Tastatursteuerung.
Totem hat weitere Funktionen, wie z.B. Herunterladen von Untertiteln und Unterst├╝tzung f├╝r DVD-Aufnahme.

ul.li: Anzeige der Eigenschaften in der Dateiverwaltung

description.p: Videoj, konata anka┼н kiel Totem, estas la oficiala filmludilo de GNOME. ─Ьi kapablas ser─Йi kaj listigi lokajn videojn kaj lumdiskojn, kaj aliajn videojn en kaj la loka reto kaj kelkaj retpa─Эoj.
Totem anka┼н havas kromajn kapablojn, kiel el┼Эutado de subteksto, a┼н registrado de lumdiskoj.

V├нdeos, tambi├йn conocido como Totem, es el reproductor de pel├нculas oficial del entorno de escritorio GNOME. Incluye una lista de v├нdeos locales y DVD en la que se puede buscar, as├н como comparticiones de v├нdeos en la red local (usando UpnP/DLNA) y v├нdeos destacados de varias p├бginas web.
Totem incluye funcionalidades adicionales, tales como: descargar subt├нtulos y soporte para grabar DVD.

ul.li: Creador de miniaturas de v├нdeos para el gestor de archivos

description.p: Bideoak, Totem bezala ere ezaguna, GNOME mahaigaineko filmen erreproduzitzaile ofiziala da. Erreprodukzio-zerrenda, pantaila-osoko modua, bilaketa eta bolumenaren kontrola bezalako eginbideak ditu, baita teklatu bidezko nabigazioa ere.
Totem-ek honako funtzionalitateak ditu: azpitituluen deskargatzailea, eta DVDak grabatzeko euskarria.

HexChat is an easy to use yet extensible IRC Client. It allows you to securely join multiple networks and talk to users privately or in channels using a customizable interface. You can even transfer files.
HexChat supports features such as: DCC, SASL, proxies, spellcheck, alerts, logging, custom themes, and Python/Perl scripts.

description.p: Devhelp is an API documentation browser. It provides an easy way to navigate through libraries, search by function, struct, or macro. It provides a tabbed interface and allows to print results.
Devhelp integrates with other applications such as Glade, Anjuta, or Geany.

The GNOME Calendar team is proud to announce the 3.26.2 release of GNOME Calendar, the second stable release of the 3.26 cycle! This release brings many new and updated translations, and fixes for the Flatpak files.

The GNOME Calendar team is proud to announce the 3.26.0 release of GNOME Calendar, the first stable release of the 3.26 cycle! This release brings hundreds of improvements from more than 50 different contributors.

The biggest highlight of this release is the introduction of support for events with recurrences. This was the result of a successfull Google Summer of Code project, and makes managing events that repeat over time much smoother.
This release also brings dozens of corrections from new contributors, and improves the memory consumption of Calendar.
This release also updates many translations.
Thanks to all the contributors that worked on GNOME Calendar!
The GNOME Calendar team is proud to announce the 3.25.90 release of GNOME Calendar, the third release in the next (3.26) unstable series.
This release brings the following new features and improvements:

ul.li: Add the options to add, modify and remove recurrences from events.
Improve Month view by greying out out-of-range days.
Completely move to the Meson build system. This allows building Calendar at least 3x faster.

description.p: This release also updates many translations.
Thanks to all the contributors that worked on GNOME Calendar!

Tux Paint is a free, award-winning drawing program for children ages 3 to 12. Tux Paint is used in schools around the world as a computer literacy drawing activity. It combines an easy-to-use interface, fun sound effects, and an encouraging cartoon mascot who guides children as they use the program.
Kids are presented with a blank canvas and a variety of drawing tools to help them be creative.

description.p: Freeciv is a Free and Open Source empire-building strategy game inspired by the history of human civilization. The game commences in prehistory and your mission is to lead your tribe from the Stone Age to the Space Age...
This client for connecting to network games, or to launch local single-player games, is based on gtk2 widget set.

description.p: Rhythmbox is a music management application, designed to work well under the GNOME desktop. In addition to music stored on your computer, it supports network shares, podcasts, radio streams, portable music devices (including phones), and internet music services such as Last.fm and Magnatune.
Rhythmbox is Free software, based on GTK+ and GStreamer, and is extensible via plugins written in Python or C.

Rhythmbox je aplikacija za upravljanje muzikom, dizajniran da radi dobro na GNOME desktopu. Pored muzike sa─Нuvane na va┼бem ra─Нunaru, ona podr┼╛ava i dijeljenja mre┼╛e, podcaste, radio tokove, prenosive muzi─Нke ure─Сaje (uklju─Нuju─Зi telefone), i internet muzi─Нke servise kao ┼бto su Last.fm i Magnatune.
Rhythmbox je besplatan softver, baziran na GTK+ i GStreamer-u, i mo┼╛e se pro┼бiriti pluginima napisanim u Pythonu ili C-u.

A m├йs de gestionar la m├║sica que teniu al vostre ordinador, ├йs compatible amb la compartici├│ en xarxa, podcasts, flux de r├аdio, dispositius de m├║sica portable (inclosos tel├иfons) i serveis de m├║sica d'Internet com Last.fm o Magnatune.
El Rhythmbox ├йs programari lliure, basat en GTK+ i GStreamer, i ├йs extensible mitjan├зant connectors escrits en Python o C.

Mimo hudby ulo┼╛en├й ve va┼бem po─Н├нta─Нi podporuje tak├й s├н┼еov├й sd├нlen├н, podcasty, vys├нl├бn├н r├бdi├н, p┼Щenosn├й p┼Щehr├бva─Нe (v─Нetn─Ы mobiln├нch telefon┼п) a internetov├й hudebn├н slu┼╛by, jako je Last.fm a Magnatune.
Rhythmbox je svobodn├╜ software pou┼╛├нvaj├нc├н GTK+ a GStreamer a je roz┼бi┼Щiteln├╜ pomoc├н z├бsuvn├╜ch modul┼п psan├╜ch v jazyc├нch Python nebo C.

Ud over musikken p├е din computer, underst├╕tter Rhythmbox netv├жrksdelinger, podcast, radiostr├╕mme, transportable musikafspillere (inklusive telefoner) samt internettjenester s├еsom Last.fm og Magnatune.

component.summary: Una semplice applicazione per prendere note
Um aplicativo simples para tomar notas

description.p: Gnote is a simple note-taking application for GNOME desktop environment. It allows you to capture your ideas, link them together using WikiWiki-style links, group together in notebooks and some extra features for everyday use.
Gnote also supports synchronization to make it possible to use on multiple devices.

Gnote er et enkelt program til at tage noter i GNOME-skrivebordsmilj├╕et. Gnote lader dig skrive dine ideer ned, k├жde dem sammen med henvisninger i stil med WikiWiki, og gruppere noter i notesb├╕ger, og tilbyder nogle yderligere funktioner til hverdagsbrug.

Gnote ist eine einfache Anwendung zum Anlegen von Notizen f├╝r die GNOME Arbeitsumgebung. Es erm├╢glicht Ihre Ideen festzuhalten, sie im Stile eines Wikis zu verkn├╝pfen, in Notizb├╝cher zu gruppieren und enth├дlt einige weitere Funktionen zum allt├дglichen Gebrauch.

Gnote es una aplicaci├│n sencilla para tomar notas del entorno de escritorio GNOME. Le permite anotar las ideas, enlaces que juntos forman un enlace del tipo WikiWiki, agrup├бndolos en cuadernos de notas y algunas caracter├нsticas extras para el uso diario.

Gnote oharrak hartzeko aplikazio bat da GNOME mahaigainerako. Zure burutazioak jaso ditzake, WikiWiki itxurako estekak erabiliz elkarrekin estekatuz, koadernoetan taldekatu eta eguneroko eginbide gehigarriak ditu.

Gnote adalah aplikasi penyimpan catatan sederhana untuk lingkungan desktop GNOME. Ini memungkinkan Anda menangkap ide Anda, menautkan bersama memakai taut bergaya WikiWiki, mengelompokkan dalam buku catatan, dan beberapa fitur ekstra bagi penggunaan sehari-hari.
Gnote juga mendukung penyelarasan yang memungkinkan pemakaian pada beberapa perangkat.

Gnote ├и una semplice applicazione per prendere note per l'ambiente desktop GNOME. Essa consente di catturare le vostre idee, collegarle tra loro usando collegamenti in stile WikiWiki, raggrupparle in blocchi note e altre funzioni aggiuntive per l'uso quotidiano.

Gnote to prosty program do robienia notatek dla ┼Ыrodowiska GNOME. Umo┼╝liwia zapisywanie swoich my┼Ыli, ┼В─Еczenie ich za pomoc─Е odno┼Ыnik├│w w┬аstylu wiki, grupowanie w┬аnotatniki oraz oferuje kilka dodatkowych funkcji.
Program Gnote obs┼Вuguje tak┼╝e synchronizacj─Щ, co umo┼╝liwia jego u┼╝ywanie na wielu urz─Еdzeniach.

O Gnote ├й uma aplica├з├гo para tirar notas para o ambiente GNOME. Permite capturar as suas ideias, ligadas entre si usando o estilo WikiWiki, agrup├б-las em blocos de notas e mais algumas funcionalidades para o dia a dia.
O Gnote tamb├йm suporta sincroniza├з├гo para tornar o uso poss├нvel em m├║ltiplos dispositivos.

Gnote ├й um aplicativo simples para tomar notas no ambiente de ├бrea de trabalho do GNOME. Ele permite que voc├к capture suas ideias, vincule-as usando links no estilo WikiWiki, agrupe-as em cat├бlogos de notas e algumas outras funcionalidades extras de uso di├бrio.
Gnote possui suporte a sincroniza├з├гo para que seja poss├нvel us├б-lo em m├║ltiplos dispositivos.

Program Gnote je enostaven program za zapisovanje opomnikov in sporo─Нilc okolja GNOME. Omogo─Нa hitro zapisovanje zamisli, povezovanje zamisli s pomo─Нjo povezav, zdru┼╛evanje in skupinjenje in druge zanimive mo┼╛nosti.
Gnote podpira tudi usklajevanje, s katerim ga je mogo─Нe uporabljati na ve─Н napravah.

Gnomov bele┼╛nik je jednostavan program za hvatanje bele┼бki za Gnomovo radno okru┼╛enje. Dopu┼бta vam da pribele┼╛ite va┼бe ideje, da ih pove┼╛ete zajedno koriste─Зi vezice VikiViki-stila, da ih grupi┼бete zajedno u bele┼╛nicama i neke posebne funkcije za svakodnevnu upotrebu.
Gnomov bele┼╛nik tako─Сe podr┼╛ava uskla─Сivanje da biste mogli da ga koristite na vi┼бe ure─Сaja.

Gnote ├дr ett enkelt anteckningsprogram f├╢r skrivbordsmilj├╢n GNOME. Det l├еter dig f├еnga dina id├йer, l├дnka samman dem med l├дnkar av WikiWiki-stil, gruppera dem i anteckningsblock samt har n├еgra extra funktioner f├╢r daglig anv├дndning.

component.name: Quetoo
component.summary: A Free, standalone first person shooter video game

description.p: Quetoo is a Free, standalone first person shooter video game based on id Tech2. Our goal is to bring the fun of oldschool deathmatch to a more contemporary platform, and perhaps to a new generation of gamers. Quetoo is multiplayer-only. There is no single-player or offline gameplay mode. If you have no Internet and no friends, Quetoo might not be for you.

Blender provides a broad spectrum of modeling, texturing, lighting, animation and video post-processing functionality in one package. Through its open architecture, Blender provides cross-platform interoperability, extensibility, an incredibly small footprint, and a tightly integrated workflow. Blender is one of the most popular Open Source 3D graphics applications in the world.

Aimed at media professionals and artists world-wide, Blender can be used to create 3D visualizations and still images, as well as broadcast- and cinema-quality videos, while the incorporation of a real-time 3D engine allows for the creation of 3D interactive content for stand-alone playback.

component.name: Tux, of Math Command
component.summary: TuxMath is an arcade game that helps kids practice their math facts

description.p: TuxMath is an educational math tutor for children. It features several different types of gameplay, at a variety of difficulty levels.
TuxMath features head-to-head play over a local network, suitable for school tournaments and similar competitions.

description.p: GNOME Calculator is an application that solves mathematical equations. Though it at first appears to be a simple calculator with only basic arithmetic operations, you can switch into Advanced, Financial, or Programming mode to find a surprising set of capabilities.

The Advanced calculator supports many operations, including: logarithms, factorials, trigonometric and hyperbolic functions, modulus division, complex numbers, random number generation, prime factorization and unit conversions.
Financial mode supports several computations, including periodic interest rate, present and future value, double declining and straight line depreciation, and many others.

Programming mode supports conversion between common bases (binary, octal, decimal, and hexadecimal), boolean algebra, oneтАЩs and twoтАЩs complementation, character to character code conversion, and more.

GNOME kalkulator je aplikacija koja rije┼бava matemati─Нke jedna─Нine.Iako je ispo─Нetka bio jednostavan kalkulator sa osnovnim aritmeti─Нkim operacijama,sada mo┼╛ete prebaciti i na napredni,financijski ili programerski mod i otkrijete mnogobrojne mogu─Зnosti.

Napredni kalkulator podr┼╛ava mnogo operacija uklju─Зuju─Зi:logaritam,faktorijel,trigonometrijske i ihiperbolne funkcije,modul podjela,kompleksne brojeve,biranje nasumi─Нnih brojeva,primarna faktorizacija i pretvara─Н jedinica.
Financijski mod podr┼╛ava nekoliko ra─Нunanja,uklju─Нuju─Зi periodi─Нnu kamatnu stopu,trenutnu i budu─Зu vrijednost,duplo opadanje,pravac amortizacije i mnoge druge.
Programerski mod podr┼╛ava konverziju izme─Сu osnovne baze(binarna,oktalna,decimalna i heksadecimalna),boolovu algebru,jedne i dvije komplementacije,pretvara─Н slovo po slovo i vi┼бe.

La Calculadora del GNOME ├йs una aplicaci├│ per resoldre equacions matem├аtiques. Tot i que a primer cop d'ull pot semblar nom├йs una simple calculadora senzilla, podeu canviar al mode avan├зat, financer o de programaci├│ on descobrireu que pot realitzar una gran quantitat d'operacions.

El mode avan├зat permet moltes operacions, entre les quals: logaritmes, factorials, funcions trigonom├иtriques i hiperb├▓liques, divisi├│ modular, nombres complexes, generaci├│ de nombres aleatoris, factoritzaci├│ a nombres primers i conversi├│ d'unitats.
El mode financer permet realitzar una bona quantitat de c├аlculs, entre els quals: tipus d'inter├иs peri├▓dic, valors presents i futurs, depreciaci├│ doble decreixent i constant i molts altres m├йs.
El mode de programaci├│ permet convertir entre bases habituals (binari, octal, decimal i hexadecimal), ├аlgebra booleana, complement a u o dos, conversi├│ car├аcter a car├аcter i m├йs.

La Calculadora del GNOME ├йs una aplicaci├│ per resoldre equacions matem├аtiques. Tot i que a primer cop d'ull pot par├йixer nom├йs una simple calculadora senzilla, podeu canviar al mode avan├зat, financer o de programaci├│ on descobrireu que pot realitzar una gran quantitat d'operacions.

El mode avan├зat permet moltes operacions, entre les quals: logaritmes, factorials, funcions trigonom├иtriques i hiperb├▓liques, divisi├│ modular, nombres complexes, generaci├│ de nombres aleatoris, factoritzaci├│ a nombres primers i conversi├│ d'unitats.
El mode financer permet realitzar una bona quantitat de c├аlculs, entre els quals: tipus d'inter├йs peri├▓dic, valors presents i futurs, depreciaci├│ doble decreixent i constant i molts altres m├йs.
El mode de programaci├│ permet convertir entre bases habituals (binari, octal, decimal i hexadecimal), ├аlgebra booleana, complement a u o dos, conversi├│ car├аcter a car├аcter i m├йs.

Kalkula─Нka GNOME je aplikace pro ┼Щe┼бen├н matematick├╜ch v├╜po─Нt┼п. A─Нkoliv na prvn├н pohled vypad├б jen jako jednoduch├б kalkula─Нka se z├бkladn├нmi operacemi, d├б se p┼Щepnout do pokro─Нil├йho, finan─Нn├нho nebo program├бtorsk├йho re┼╛imu, ve kter├╜ch najdete p┼Щekvapuj├нc├н mno┼╛stv├н dal┼б├нch funkc├н.

Pokro─Нil├б kalkula─Нka podporuje ┼Щadu operac├н, v─Нetn─Ы: logaritm┼п, faktori├бl┼п, trigonometrick├╜ch a hyperbolick├╜ch funkc├н, d─Ыlen├н se zbytkem, komplexn├нch ─Н├нsel, gener├бtoru n├бhodn├╜ch ─Н├нsel, rozkladu na prvo─Нinitele a p┼Щevodu jednotek.
Finan─Нn├н re┼╛im um├н n─Ыkolik komplexn├нch v├╜po─Нt┼п, v─Нetn─Ы ├║rokov├й sazby za obdob├н, sou─Нasn├й a budouc├н hodnoty, dvojit─Ы degresivn├нho a line├бrn├нho odpisu a mnoho dal┼б├нho.

Program├бtorsk├╜ re┼╛im podporuje p┼Щevod mezi ─Н├нseln├╜mi soustavami (dvojkov├б, osmi─Нkov├б, des├нtkov├б a ┼бetn├бctkov├б), boolovskou algebru, jedni─Нkov├╜ a dvojkov├╜ dopln─Ыk, p┼Щevod znaku na jeho k├│d a dal┼б├н v─Ыci.

GNOME Lommeregner er et program, som kan l├╕se matematiske ligninger. Selvom det ved f├╕rste ├╕jekast ligner en simpel lommeregner med simple aritmetiske operationer, vil du med et skift til avanceret, finans- eller programmeringstilstand finde et imponerende s├жt funktioner.

Den avancerede lommeregner underst├╕tter mange operationer inklusive: Logaritmer, fakulteter, trigonometriske og hyberbolske funktioner, modulusdivision, komplekse tal, en tilf├жldig talgenerator, primtalsfaktorisering og enhedskonvertering.
Finanstilstanden underst├╕tter adskillige udregninger inklusive periodisk renterate, nuv├жrende og fremtidig v├жrdi, dobbelt faldende- og ret linje-afskrivning og mange andre.

Programmeringstilstand underst├╕tter konvertering mellem almindelige grundtal (bin├жr, oktal, decimal og heksadecimal), boolesk algebra, etter- og toer-kompliment, tegn til tegnkode-konvertering med mere.

Der GNOME Taschenrechner ist ein Programm zum L├╢sen von mathematischen Gleichungen. Obwohl er im ersten Eindruck wie ein einfacher Taschenrechner mit nur einfachen arithmetischen Operationen erscheint, kann in einen erweiterten, einen finanztechnischen und einen Programmier-Modus umgeschaltet werden, in denen sich ├╝berraschende F├дhigkeiten befinden.

Der erweiterte Taschenrechner unterst├╝tzt viele Operationen, darunter: Logarithmus, Fakult├дt, trigonometrische und hyperbolische Funktionen, Modulo-Division, Berechnung komplexer Zahlen, Zufallszahlengeneration, Primfaktorzerlegung und Einheitenumrechnungen.

Der finanztechnische Modus unterst├╝tzt verschiedene Berechnungen, darunter periodischer Zinssatz, Barwert und zuk├╝nftigen Zielwert, degressive Doppelratenabschreibung und lineare Abschreibung und vieles mehr.
Der Programmierungsmodus unterst├╝tzt die Umwandlung zwischen weit verbreiteten Zahlensystemen (Bin├дr, Oktal, Dezimal und Hexadezimal), boolesche Algebra, Einer- und Zweierkomplement und weiteres.

GNOME-Kalkulilo estas aplika─╡o kiu solvas matematikajn ekvaciojn. Kvankam unue aperas esti simpla kalkulilo kun nura bazaj aritmetikaj operacioj, vi povas ┼Эalti al altnivela, financa a┼н programara re─Эimo trovi surprizan aron de kapabloj.

La altnivela kalkulilo subtenas multajn operaciojn, inkluzivanta: logaritmoj, factorialsoj, trigonometriaj kaj hiperbolaj funkcioj, modula divido, kompleksaj nombroj, hazarda nombra generacio, priman factorization kaj unuaj konverti─Эoj.
Financa re─Эimo subtenas plurajn komputadojn, inkluzivanta periodan interesan indicon, donacon kaj estontan valoron, duoblo malplii─Эanta kaj rekta linia amortizo kaj multaj aliaj.
Programara re─Эimo subtenas konverti─Эon inter oftaj bazoj (binara, oktala, decimala kaj deksesuma), boolea algebro, unua kaj dua komplementacio, karaktera al karaktera kodo konverti─Эo, kaj pli.

Calculadora de GNOME es una aplicaci├│n que resuelve ecuaciones matem├бticas. A primera vista parece una calculadora sencilla con aplicaciones aritm├йticas b├бsicas, pero puede activar los modos Avanzado, Financiero o Programaci├│n para encontrar un sorprendente conjunto de posibilidades.

La calculadora avanzada soporta muchas operaciones, incluyendo logaritmos, factoriales, funciones trigonom├йtricas e hiperb├│licas, m├│dulo de la divisi├│n, n├║meros complejos, generaci├│n de n├║meros aleatorios, factorizaci├│n en n├║meros primos y conversi├│n de unidades.
El modo financiero soporta varios c├бlculos, incluyendo tasa de inter├йs peri├│dico, valor presente y futuro, doble declinaci├│n y depreciaci├│n lineal y muchas otras

El modo de programaci├│n soporta la conversi├│n entre bases comunes (binaria, octal, decimal y hexadecimal), ├бlgebra booleana, complemento de uno y de dos, conversi├│n de c├│digos car├бcter a car├бcter y m├бs

GNOMEren Kalkulagailuak matematikako ekuazioak ebazteko aplikazio bat da. Nahiz eta hasiera batean kalkulagailu xume bat (oinarrizko eragiketa aritmetikoekin) dirudi arren, Aurreratua, Finantzarioa edo Programazio modura alda zintezke gaitasun multzo harrigarri batekin aurkitzeko.

Kalkulagailu aurreratuak eragiketa mota ugari onartzen ditu, hala nola: logaritmoak, faktorialak, funtzio trigonometrikoak eta hiperbolikoak, zatiketen moduluak, zenbaki konplexuak, ausazko zenbakien sortzailea, zenbaki lehenen faktorizazioa eta unitateen bihurketak.
Modu finantzarioak hainbat kalkulu onartzen ditu, beste batzuen artean: interes-tasa periodikoa, egungo eta etorkizuneko balioa, faktore bikoitzeko amortizazio beherakorra eta amortizazio lineala.

Programazioaren modak ohiko oinarrien (bitarra, zortzitarra, hamartarra eta hamaseitarra) arteko bihurketa, algebra lineala, bat eta biren osagarria, karakterez karaktereko kode bihurketa, eta gehiago onartzen ditu.

Gnomen laskin on sovellus matemaattisten yht├дl├╢iden ratkaisemiseen. Laskin tukee perustilan lis├дksi edistynytt├д tilaa, taloustilaa ja ohjelmointitilaa. Eri tilojen avulla laskin on k├дtev├д apu lukuisissa eri matemaattisissa haasteissa.

Taloustila tukee monenlaisia laskuja, kuten s├д├дnn├╢llinen korkotaso, nykyinen ja tuleva arvo, kahdesti aleneva arvonalennus, tasapoisto ja monia muita.

Ohjelmointitila tukee lukujen muuntamista lukuj├дrjestelmien (bin├д├дri, oktaali, desimaali ja heksadesimaali) v├дlill├д, Boolen algebraa, yhden ja kahden komplementtia, merkin muuntamista merkkikoodiksi ja muuta.

La calculatrice GNOME est une application pour r├йsoudre des ├йquations math├йmatiques. Bien quтАЩelle apparaisse initialement comme une simple calculatrice avec uniquement les op├йrations arithm├йtiques de base, vous pouvez basculer dans les modes Avanc├й, Financier ou Programmation pour d├йcouvrir un nombre surprenant de fonctionnalit├йs.

La calculatrice avanc├йe prend en charge beaucoup dтАЩop├йrations, y compris les logarithmes, les factorielles, les fonctions trigonom├йtriques et hyperboliques, le modulo de division, les nombres complexes, la g├йn├йration de nombres al├йatoires, la factorisation en nombres premiers et la conversion entre unit├йs.
Le mode financier permet plusieurs calculs dont le taux dтАЩint├йr├кt p├йriodique, la valeur pr├йsente et future, lтАЩamortissement d├йgressif et lin├йaire, et dтАЩautres.

Le mode programmation permet la conversion entre des bases usuelles (binaire, octal, d├йcimal et hexad├йcimal), lтАЩalg├иbre de Boole, les compl├йments ├а un et ├а deux, la conversion de code de caract├иre, et dтАЩautres.

Calcoladorie GNOME e je une aplicazion che e risolf ecuazions matematichis. Ancje se in prime batude e semee une semplice calcoladorie adate nome a basil├вrs operazions aritmetichis, al ├и pussibil pass├в ae modalit├вt Avanzade, Finanziarie o Programazion par scuvierzi straordenariis funzionalit├вts.

La calcoladorie Avanzade e supuarte une vore di operazions, includ├╗t: funzions logaritmichis, fatori├вi, trigonometrichis e iperbolichis, divisions modul, numars compl├иs, gjenerazion di numars casu├вi, fatorizazions primis e conversions di unit├вt.
La modalit├вt Finanziarie e supuarte diviers calcui, includ├╗t il tas di inter├иs sul periodi, val├┤r present e fut├╗r, amortament line├вr e a smiezament anu├вl e une vore di altris.

La modalit├вt Programazion e supuarte la conversion tra basis comuns (binarie, ot├вl, decim├вl e esadecim├вl), algjebre booleane, complement a un e a doi, conversion di codi├з caratar a caratar e altri.

'S e pr├▓gram a tha san ├Аireamhair GNOME a dh'fhuasglas co-aontaran matamataigeach. Ged a tha coltas an ├аireamhair sh├мmplidh air aig nach eil ach obrachaidhean ├аireamhach bunasach, gabhaidh leum a ghearradh gun mhodh adhartach, ionmhais no pr├▓gramachaidh le comasan annasach.

Cuiridh an t-├аireamhair adhartach taic ri iomadh obrachadh, a' gabhail a-steach: log-├аireamhan, factarailean, foincseanan triantanach 's os-bhoileach, roinneadh m├▓idealais, ├аireamhan iom-fhillte, gintinn ├аireamh air thuaiream, factarachadh ann am pr├мomh-├аireamhan agus iompachadh aonadan.

Cuiridh am modh ionmhais taic ris caochladh de chunntaidhean, a' gabhail a-steach luadh-r├иidh o ├аm gu ├аm, luach l├аithreach 's ri teachd, d├мmeasadh cr├мonaidh dh├╣bailte 's loidhne d├мrich agus m├▓ran a bharrachd.

Cuiridh am modh pr├▓gramachaidh taic ri iompachadh eadar bunaitean coitcheann (b├мnearaidh, ochdach, deicheach 's sia-dheicheach), ailseabra Booleach, co-shl├аnachadh aon 's d├а, iompachadh o charactar gu caractar agus a bharrachd.

A Calculador ade GNOME ├й un aplicativo que resolve ecuanci├│ns matem├бticas. A├нnda que ao principio poida parecer unha calculadora simple con s├│ operaci├│ns aritm├йticas b├бsicas, pode cambiar o modo a Avanzado, Financeiro ou Programaci├│n para atopar un conxunto sorprendente de capacidades.

GNOME kalkulator je aplikacija koja rje┼бava matemati─Нke jednad┼╛be. Iako se u po─Нetku ─Нini jednostavnim kalkulatorom s osnovnim aritmeti─Нkim operacijama, mo┼╛ete ga prebaciti u Napredni, Financijski ili na─Нin rada Programiranja kako biste prona┼бli iznena─Сuju─Зi skup mogu─Зnosti.

Napredni kalkulator podr┼╛ava mnoge operacije, uklju─Нuju─Зi: logaritme, faktorijele, trigonometrijske i hiperboli─Нke funkcije, module dijeljenja, kompleksne brojeve, generiranje slu─Нajnih brojeva, proste faktore i pretvorba jedinica.
Financijski na─Нin rada podr┼╛ava nekoliko prora─Нuna, uklju─Нuju─Зi periodi─Нnu kamatnu stopu, sada┼бnju i budu─Зu vrijednost, dvostruko opadanje i pravocrtnu deprecijaciju i mnoge druge.

Na─Нin rada programiranja podr┼╛ava pretvorbu izme─Сu zajedni─Нkih baza (binarne, oktalne, decimalne i heksadecimalne), booleova algebra, dopunjavanje jedinica i dvica, znak za znak pretvorbu k├┤dova i jo┼б mnogo toga.

GNOME Kalkulator adalah suatu aplikasi yang memecahkan persamaan matematis. Walaupun awalnya nampak seperti kalkulator sederhana dengan hanya operasi aritmetik dasar, Anda dapat berpindah ke mode Tingkat Lanjut, Keuangan, atau Pemrograman untuk menemukan set kapabilitas yang mengejutkan.

Kalkulator tingkat lanjut mendukung banyak operasi, termasuk: logaritma, faktorial, fungsi trigonometrik dan hiperbolik, pembagian modulus, bilangan kompleks, penjangkitan bilangan acak, faktorisasi prima, dan konversis satuan.
Mode keuangan mendukung beberapa komputasi, termasuk tingkat bunga periodik, present dan future value, depresiasi double declining dan straight line, dan banyak lagi.

Mode pemrograman mendukung konversi antara basis yang umum (biner, oktal, desimal, dan heksadesimal), aljabar boolean, komplemen satu dan dua, konversi kode karakter ke karakter, dan lebih banyak lagi.

La calcolatrice GNOME ├и un'applicazione che risolve equazioni matematiche. Anche se a prima vista sembra una semplice calcolatrice adatta solo a basilari operazioni aritmetiche, ├и possibile selezionare le modalit├а ┬лAvanzata┬╗, ┬лFinanziaria┬╗ o ┬лProgrammazione┬╗ per scoprire sorprendenti funzionalit├а.

La calcolatrice ┬лAvanzata┬╗ supporta molte operazioni, tra cui: funzioni logaritmiche, fattoriali, trigonometriche e iperboliche, divisioni modulo, numeri complessi, generazione di numeri casuali, fattorizzazioni prime e conversioni di unit├а.
La modalit├а ┬лFinanziaria┬╗ supporta diversi calcoli, tra cui il tasso di interesse sul periodo, valore presente e futuro, ammortamento lineare e a dimezzamento annuale, e molti altri.

La modalit├а ┬лProgrammazione┬╗ supporta la conversione tra basi comuni (binaria, ottale, decimale ed esadecimale), algebra booleana, complemento a uno e a due, conversione di codice carattere a carattere e molto altro.

GNOME kalkulator er et program som l├╕ser matematiske likninger. Selv om det kan se ut som en enkel kalkulator med enkle regneoperasjoner kan du bytte til avansert, finansiell eller programmeringsmodus og da finne et overraskende sett med muligheter.

Avansert kalkulator st├╕tter mange operasjoner som f.eks: logaritmer, fakulteter, trigonometriske og hyperbolske funksjoner, modulus divisjon, komplekse tall, generering av tilfeldige tall, faktorisering av primtall og konvertering mellom enheter.
Finansiell modus st├╕tter flere beregninger inkludert periodisk renterate og fremtidig verdi, halvert levetid, line├жr avskriving og mange andre.
Programmeringsmodus st├╕tter konvertering mellom ulike grunntall (bin├жr, oktal, desimal, og heksadesimal), bolsk algebra, ener- og toerkomplementet, konvertering fra tegn til tegnkode og mer.

Gnome Rekenmachine is een toepassing die wiskundige vergelijkingen oplost. Alhoewel het op het eerste gezicht een eenvoudige rekenmachine lijkt met slechts rekenkundige basisoperaties, kunt u omschakelen naar Geavanceerd, Financieel of Programmeren en een verbazende verzameling mogelijkheden vinden.

De geavanceerde rekenmachine ondersteunt vele operaties, waaronder: logaritmes, factorisaties, trigonometrische- en hyperbolische functies, modulodeling, complexe getallen, willekeuriggetal-generatie, priemfactorisatie en eenhedenconversies.
Financi├лle modus ondersteunt diverse berekeningen waaronder periodieke rente, huidige en toekomstige waarde, dubbel afnemende- en lineaire afschrijving en vele andere.
Programmeermodus ondersteunt conversie tussen algemene talstelsels (binair, octaal, decimaal en hexadecimaal), booleaanse algebra, 1- en 2-complement, teken-naar-tekencodeconversie en meer.

La calculadoira GNOME es una aplicacion per res├▓lvre d'eq├╝acions matematicas. Mentre qu'aparesca inicialament coma una simpla calculadoira amb unicament las operacions aritmeticas de basa, pod├иtz bascular dins los m├▓des Avan├зat, Financi├иr o Programacion per descobrir un nombre susprenent de foncionalitats.

La calculadoira avan├зada pren en carga f├▓r├зa operacions, incluses los logaritmes, las factorialas, las foncions trigonometricas e iperbolicas, lo modulo de division, los nombres compl├иxes, la generacion de nombres aleat├▓ris, la factorizacion en nombres primi├иrs e la conversion entre unitats.
Lo m├▓de financi├иr permet mantun calcul dont lo taus d'inter├иs periodic, la valor presenta e futura, l'amortiment degressiu e linear, e d'autres.

Lo m├▓de programacion permet la conversion entre de basas usualas (binari, octal, decimal e exadecimal), l'alg├иbra de Boole, los complements a un e a dos, la conversion de c├▓di de caract├иr, e d'autres.

GNOME Hesap Makinesi matematiksel denklemleri ├з├╢zen bir uygulamad─▒r. Ba┼Яlang─▒├зta yaln─▒zca temel aritmetik i┼Яlemleri yapabilece─Яiniz basit bir hesap makinesi gibi g├╢r├╝nse de, Geli┼Яmi┼Я, Finansal ve Programlama kiplerine ge├зerek, ┼Яa┼Я─▒rt─▒c─▒ ├зe┼Яitli kabiliyetlerini bulabilirsiniz.

Geli┼Яmi┼Я hesap makinesi bir ├зok i┼Яlemi destekler, ├╢rne─Яin: logaritmalar, fakt├╢riyeller, trigonometrik ve hiperbolik fonksiyonlar, mod├╝ler b├╢lme, karma┼Я─▒k say─▒lar, rastgele say─▒ ├╝retimi, asal ├зarpanlara ay─▒rma ve birim d├╢n├╝┼Я├╝mleri.
Finansal kip ├зe┼Яitli hesaplamalar─▒ destekler, ├╢rne─Яin: d├╢nemsel faiz oran─▒, mevcut ve gelecekteki de─Яer, ├зift d├╝┼Я├╝┼Я ve do─Яrusal d├╝┼Я├╝┼Я ve bir├зok benzer hesaplama.

Programlama kipi yayg─▒n say─▒ tabanlar─▒ (ikilik, sekizlik, onluk ve on alt─▒l─▒k) aras─▒nda d├╢n├╝┼Я├╝m, mant─▒ksal cebir, bir ve ikinin t├╝mleyenleri, karakterden karaktere kod d├╢n├╝┼Я├╝m├╝ ve daha fazlas─▒n─▒ destekler.

component.name: Endless Sky
Weltraumspiel
Jeu spatial
component.summary: Jeu d'exploration et de combat dans l'espace

description.p: Explore other star systems. Earn money by trading, carrying passengers, or completing missions. Use your earnings to buy a better ship or to upgrade the weapons and engines on your current one. Blow up pirates. Take sides in a civil war. Or leave human space behind and hope to find some friendly aliens whose culture is more civilized than your own...

Endless Sky is a sandbox-style space exploration game similar to Elite, Escape Velocity, or Star Control. You start out as the captain of a tiny space ship and can choose what to do from there. The game includes a major plot line and many minor missions, but you can choose whether you want to play through the plot or strike out on your own as a merchant or bounty hunter or explorer.
Krita is the full-featured digital art studio.
It is perfect for sketching and painting, and presents an endтАУtoтАУend solution for creating digital painting files from scratch by masters.

Krita is a great choice for creating concept art, comics, textures for rendering and matte paintings. Krita supports many colorspaces like RGB and CMYK at 8 and 16 bits integer channels, as well as 16 and 32 bits floating point channels.
Have fun painting with the advanced brush engines, amazing filters and many handy features that make Krita enormously productive.

description.p: WarMUX is a free and open-source turn-based game and can be played online in public or private mode.
Players can play together each one in the commande of a team in a senario that puts free software mascots in a battle using dynamite, grenades, baseball bats, and bazookas.

component.name: Go For It!
component.summary: A stylish to-do list with built-in productivity timer
Stilingas u┼╛duo─Нi┼│ s─Еra┼бas su ─пtaisytu produktyvumo laikma─Нiu
Een stijlvolle takenlijst met ingebouwde productiviteitstimer

description.p: Go For It! is a simple and stylish productivity app, featuring a to-do list, merged with a timer that keeps your focus on the current task.
To-do lists are stored in the Todo.txt format. This simplifies synchronization with mobile devices and makes it possible to edit tasks using other front-ends.
If you already use Todo.txt, beware of the fact, that Go For It! automatically archives completed tasks to the done list!
Go For It! yra paprasta ir stilinga produktyvumo programa su u┼╛duo─Нi┼│ s─Еra┼бu, sulietu su laikma─Нiu, kuris sutelkia j┼лs┼│ d─Чmes─п ties esama u┼╛duotimi.
U┼╛duotys yra saugomos Todo.txt formatu. Tai supaprastina sinchronizavim─Е su mobiliaisiais ─пrenginiais ir padaro ─пmanom─Е u┼╛duo─Нi┼│ taisym─Е, naudojant kitas naudotojo s─Еsajas.
Jeigu jau naudojate Todo.txt, saugokit─Чs, ┼╛inodami, jog Go For It! automati┼бkai archyvuoja u┼╛baigtas u┼╛duotis ─п atlikt┼│ u┼╛duo─Нi┼│ s─Еra┼б─Е!
Go For It! is een simpele en stijlvolle productiviteit app, met een takenlijst gecombineerd met een timer, die je laat focussen op uw huidige taak.
Takenlijsten worden opgeslagen in het Todo.txt formaat. Dit versimpelt synchronisatie met mobiele apparaten en maakt het mogelijk om taken te bewerken met andere front-ends.
Als u al gebruik maakt van Todo.txt, let op het feit dat Go For It! gedane taken automatisch archiveert naar de lijst van gedane taken.

We're proud to annouce GNOME To Do 3.26, the first release in the 3.26 stable series! This release, thanks to the hard work of a Google Summer of Code student, we have synchronization with Todoist in place.
This release also updates translations, and adds new translations.
Thanks to everyone that contributed to GNOME To Do this cycle!
This is the second unstable release for GNOME 3.26 series. The new changes are:

ul.li: Implementation of the Todoist plugin by Rohit Kaushik.
Complete move to the Meson build system, dramatically reducing the build times by 80% or more.

description.p: This release also updates translations, and adds new translations.

This is the first unstable release for GNOME 3.26 series, and adds many new features and improvements. The major addition was the new Todoist plugin skeleton by Rohit Kaushik, and many other smaller improvements and bugfixes.
This release also updates translations, and adds new translations.
Thanks to all the contributors that worked on GNOME To Do!

description.p: Dconf Editor is a tool to allow direct editing of the dconf configuration database. This is useful when developing applications that use these settings.
Editing your configuration directly is an advanced feature and may cause applications to not work correctly.
L'editor del dconf ├йs una eina per permetre l'edici├│ directa de la configuraci├│ de la base dades del dconf. Aix├▓ ├йs ├║til quan es desenvolupen aplicacions que usen aquestes configuracions.
L'edici├│ directa de la vostra configuraci├│ ├йs una caracter├нstica avan├зada i pot causar que les aplicacions no funcionin correctament.

P┼Щ├нm├й z├бsahy do nastaven├н jsou pokro─Нilou funkc├н a mohou zp┼пsobit, ┼╛e aplikace nebudou spr├бvn─Ы fungovat.
Dconf-redigering er et v├жrkt├╕j der giver mulighed for direkte redigering af dconf-konfigurationsdatabasen. Det er nyttigt ved udvikling af programmer, der bruger disse indstillinger.
Direkte redigering af dine indstillinger er en avanceret funktion og kan f├е programmer til ikke at virke korrekt.
Dconf-Editor ist ein Werkzeug zum direkten Bearbeiten der Dconf-Konfigurationsdatenbank. Dies ist n├╝tzlich beim Entwickeln von Anwendungen, die diese Einstellungen nutzen.
Das direkte Bearbeiten der Konfiguration ist ein Funktionsmerkmal f├╝r fortgeschrittene Anwender und kann daher dazu f├╝hren, dass sich Anwendungen nicht wie erwartet verhalten.
El editor de dconf es una herramienta que permite editar directamente la base de datos de configuraciones. Esto es ├║til al desarrollar aplicaciones que usas estas configuraciones.
Editar su configuraci├│n directamente es una caracter├нstica avanzada que puede hacer que las aplicaciones no funcionen correctamente.
Dconf-en editorea tresna bat da dconf konfigurazioaren datu-basea zuzenean editatzeko. Hau erabilgarria da ezarpen hauek erabiltzen dituzten aplikazioak garatzean.
Zure konfigurazioa zuzenean editatzea eginbide aurreratu bat da, eta aplikazioak ongi ez funtzionatzea eragin dezake.
Dconf-muokkaimen avulla voit muokata suoraan dconf-asetustietokantaa. T├дm├д on erityisesti silloin tarpeen, kun kehit├дt n├дit├д asetuksia k├дytt├дvi├д sovelluksia.
Asetusten muokkaaminen suoraan on edistynyt ominaisuus ja se saattaa aiheuttaa ongelmia sovellusten toimintaan.

La modification directe de la configuration est une fonctionnalit├й avanc├йe et pourrait perturber le bon fonctionnement des applications.

Menyunting konfigurasi Anda secara langsung adalah fitur tingkat lanjut yang mungkin menyebabkan aplikasi tidak dapat berjalan sebagaimana mestinya.

Klavaro is a very flexible touch typing tutor, supporting customizable keyboard layouts. You can edit and save new or unknown keyboard layouts, as the basic course was designed to not depend on specific ones. Also, there are some charts about the learning process, and for advanced users an online ranking scheme, comparing your typing proficiency with others.

Its interface is very simple, without artifacts to distract the user, and some may find this boring, but we think keyboard memorization requires a high level of concentration, and must be done by touch, not visually.

component.name: Teleport
component.summary: Share files over the local network

description.p: Teleport is a fast way to share files over the local network. It's designed to be a replacement for using USB keys or emailing stuff to yourself just to move them on another device on your desk.
This basic initial version sends files chose via the file chooser or drag and drop. The Downloads directory can be set from the menu.
Godot is an advanced, feature-packed, multi-platform 2D and 3D open source game engine.
Create games with ease, using Godot's unique approach to game development.

ul.li: Nodes for all your needs. Godot comes with hundreds of built-in nodes that make game design a breeze. You can also create your own for custom behaviors, editors and much more.
Flexible scene system. Create node compositions with support for instancing and inheritance.
Visual editor with all the tools you need packed into a beautiful and uncluttered context-sensitive UI.
Friendly content creation pipeline for artists, level designers, animators and everything in between.
Persistent live editing where changes are not lost after stopping the game. It even works on mobile devices!
Create your own custom tools with ease using the incredible tool system.

description.p: The Battle for Wesnoth is a turn-based tactical strategy game with a high fantasy theme. Build up a great army, gradually turning raw recruits into hardened veterans. In later games, recall your toughest warriors and form a deadly host whom no one can stand against! Choose units from a large pool of specialists, and hand-pick a force with the right strengths to fight well on different terrains against all manner of opposition.

Wesnoth has many different sagas waiting to be played. Fight to regain the throne of Wesnoth, of which you are the legitimate heir... lead a brutal quest to unite the orcish tribes... vanquish a horde of undead warriors... Guide a band of elvish survivors in an epic quest to find a new home...

There are at least two hundred unit types, sixteen races, six major factions, and hundreds of years of history. The world of Wesnoth is absolutely huge and only limited by your creativity. You can also challenge up to eight friendsтАФor strangersтАФand fight in epic multiplayer fantasy battles.

component.name: M.A.R.S. - A ridiculous shooter
component.summary: 2D space shooter with awesome visual effects

description.p: M.A.R.S. - a ridiculous shooter is a 2D space shooter with awesome visual effects and attractive physics. Players can battle each other or computer controlled enemies in exciting game modes.

In the year 3547, civilizations all over the galaxy have settled their own planets, living in peace and harmony with its environment. But outside the contemplative habitats, the GREAT WAR is raging. As a famous fighter on your way to never ending honor and prosperity, you have to protect your planet from the oncoming doom of your jealous neighbours!

description.p: A simple application for debugging the message bus system D-Bus. D-Feet can be used to inspect D-Bus interfaces of running programs and invoke methods on those interfaces.
Jednostavna aplikacija za otklanjanje gre┼бaka u sistemu poruks D-Bus. D-Feet mo┼╛e da se koristi za inspekciju D-BUS interfejss za pokrenutih programa i pozove metode na tim interfejsima.
Jednoduch├б aplikace slou┼╛├нc├н k lad─Ыn├н syst├йmov├й sb─Ыrnice zpr├бv D-Bus. D-Feet se pou┼╛├нv├б ke sledov├бn├н rozhran├н D-Bus u b─Ы┼╛├нc├нch aplikac├н a k vol├бn├н metod t─Ыchto rozhran├н.
Et simpelt program til fejls├╕gning af meddelelsesbussystemet D-Bus. D-Feet kan bruges til inspicere D-Bus gr├жnseflader af k├╕rende programmer og kalde metoder hos disse gr├жnseflader.

Eine einfache Anwendung zur Fehlerdiagnose von D-Bus, einer Software zur Interprozesskommunikation (IPC). D-Feet kann zur Untersuchung von D-Bus-Schnittstellen laufender Programme verwendet werden und Methoden dieser Schnittstellen aufrufen.

Una sencilla aplicaci├│n para depurar el bus de mensajes del sistema D-Bus. D-Feet se puede usar para inspeccionar interfaces D-Bus de programas en ejecuci├│n y para invocar m├йtodos en esas interfaces.
Yksinkertainen sovellus D-Bus-viestiv├дyl├дj├дrjestelm├дn vianj├дljitykseen. D-Feeti├д voi k├дytt├д├д k├дynniss├д olevian ohjelmien D-Bus-liittymien tutkimiseen kutsumalla eri menetelmi├д.

Une application simple pour d├йboguer le bus de message syst├иme D-Bus. D-Feet peut ├кtre utilis├й pour inspecter les interfaces D-Bus des programmes en cours dтАЩex├йcution et pour appeler les m├йthodes sur ces interfaces.

Une semplice aplicazion par f├в il debug dal bus dai messa├зs di sisteme D-Bus. D-Feet al pues jessi dopr├вt par ispezion├в lis interfacis D-Bus dai programs in esecuzion e invoc├в metodis su ch├кs interfacis.
Un aplicativo sinxelo para depurar o bus de mensaxes do sistema D-Bus. D-Feet pode usarse para inspeccionar interfaces de D-Bus dos programas en execuci├│n e invocar m├йtodos nesas interfaces.

Egy egyszer┼▒ alkalmaz├бs a D-Bus ├╝zenetbusz-rendszer hibakeres├йs├йhez. A D-Feet haszn├бlhat├│ a fut├│ programok D-Bus csatol├│inak megfigyel├йs├йhez ├йs met├│dusok megh├нv├бs├бhoz azokon a csatol├│kon.

Suatu aplikasi sederhana untuk mengawakutu sistem bus pesan D-Bus. D-Feet dapat dipakai untuk memeriksa antar muka D-Bus dari program-program yang berjalan dan memanggil metode-metode pada antar muka tersebut.

Una aplicacion simpla per desbugar lo bus de messatge sist├иma D-Bus. D-Feet p├▓t ├иsser utilizat per inspectar las interf├аcias D-Bus dels programas en cors dтАЩexecucion e per apelar los met├▓des sus aquestas interf├аcias.

Prosty program do debugowania systemowej magistrali komunikat├│w D-Bus. Program D-Feet mo┼╝e by─З u┼╝ywany do badania interfejs├│w D-Bus uruchomionych program├│w i┬аwywo┼Вywania metod na tych interfejsach.

Uma aplica├з├гo simples para depura├з├гo do sistema de barramento de mensagens D-Bus. D-Feet pode ser usado para inspecionar interfaces D-Bus de programas em execu├з├гo e chamar m├йtodos naquelas interfaces.

Um aplicativo simples para depura├з├гo do sistema de barramento de mensagens D-Bus. D-Feet pode ser usado para inspecionar interfaces D-Bus de programas em execu├з├гo e chamar m├йtodos naquelas interfaces.
Enostaven program za razhro┼б─Нevanje sporo─Нil sistema vodila D-Bus. Program D-Feet je mogo─Нe uporabiti za nadzor vmesnikov D-Bus zagnanih programov in za upravljanje.

Jednostavan program za pro─Нi┼б─Зavanje sistema sabirnice poruka D-sabirnice. D-stopa mo┼╛e biti upotrebljena za proveru su─Нelja D-sabirnice pokrenutih programa i za prizivanje postupaka na tim su─Нeljima.
Ett enkelt program f├╢r att fels├╢ka meddelandebussystemet D-Bus. D-Feet kan anv├дndas f├╢r att inspektera D-Bus-gr├дnssnitt f├╢r k├╢rande program och anropa metoder p├е dessa gr├дnssnitt.

─░leti veriyolu sistemi D-Bus'da hata ay─▒klama i├зin basit bir uygulama. D-Feet; ├зal─▒┼Яmakta olan programlar─▒n D-Bus arabirimlerini incelemek ve bu arabirimler ├╝zerindeki y├╢ntemleri ├зal─▒┼Яt─▒rmak i├зin kullan─▒l─▒r.
