description.p: Glade is a RAD tool to enable quick & easy development of user interfaces for the GTK+ 3 toolkit and the GNOME desktop environment.

The user interfaces designed in Glade are saved as XML and these can be loaded by applications dynamically as needed by using GtkBuilder or used directly to define a new GtkWidget derived object class using GTK+ new template feature.
By using GtkBuilder, Glade XML files can be used in numerous programming languages including C, C++, C#, Vala, Java, Perl, Python, and others.

Korisni─Нka su─Нelja dizajnirana u Glade su spremljene kao XML i to mogu aplikacije opteretiti dinami─Нki kako je potrebno pomo─Зu GtkBuilder ili izravno koristiti za definiranje nove GtkWidget izvedeni objekt klase pomo─Зu GTK + nove zna─Нajke predlo┼бka .
Kori┼бtenjem GtkBuilder , Glade XML datoteke mogu se koristiti u mnogim programskim jezicima, uklju─Нuju─Зi C, C ++, C #, Vala, Java, Perl, Python, i drugima .
El Glade ├йs una eina RAD que facilita el desenvolupament d'interf├нcies d'usuari per al joc d'eines GTK+3 i l'entorn d'escriptori GNOME.

Les interf├нcies d'usuari dissenyades al Glade es desen en format XML que les aplicacions poden carregar de forma din├аmica utilitzant el GtkBuilder o b├й utilitzades directament per definir una classe d'objecte derivat de GtkWidget utilitzant la caracter├нstica nova de plantilla de la GTK+.
En utilitzar el GtkBuilder, els fitxers XML del Glade es poden fer servir en molts llenguatges de programaci├│ entre els quals: C, C++, C#, Vala, Java, Perl, Python i d'altres
El Glade ├йs una eina RAD que facilita el desenvolupament d'interf├нcies d'usuari per al joc d'eines GTK+3 i l'entorn d'escriptori GNOME.

Les interf├нcies d'usuari dissenyades al Glade es guarden en format XML que les aplicacions poden carregar de forma din├аmica utilitzant el GtkBuilder o b├й utilitzades directament per definir una classe d'objecte derivat de GtkWidget utilitzant la caracter├нstica nova de plantilla de la GTK+.
En utilitzar el GtkBuilder, els fitxers XML del Glade es poden fer servir en molts llenguatges de programaci├│ entre els quals: C, C++, C#, Vala, Java, Perl, Python i d'altres
Glade je n├бstroj pro rychl├╜ v├╜voj aplikac├н (RAD), kter├╜ v├бm umo┼╛n├н rychle a snadno vytvo┼Щit u┼╛ivatelsk├й rozhran├н pro platformu GTK+ 3 a pracovn├н prost┼Щed├н GNOME.

U┼╛ivatelsk├б rozhran├н navr┼╛en├б v Glade se ukl├бdaj├н jako XML a mohou pak b├╜t dynamicky na─Нtena aplikac├н podle pot┼Щeby pomoc├н GtkBuilder nebo pou┼╛ita p┼Щ├нmo k definici nov├йho t┼Щ├нdy objektu odvozen├й od GtkWidget za pomoc├н podpory nov├╜ch ┼бablon GTK+.
D├нky pou┼╛it├н GtkBuilder mohou b├╜t soubory XML z Glade vyu┼╛ity v ┼Щad─Ы programovac├нch jazyk┼п, v─Нetn─Ы C, C++, C#, Vala, Java, Perl, Python a dal┼б├нch.
Glade er et RAD-v├жrkt├╕j til hurtig og nem udvikling af brugergr├жnseflader til GTK+ 3-v├жrkt├╕jskassen og GNOME-skrivebordsmilj├╕et.

Brugergr├жnsefladerne, som designes i Glade, gemmes som XML og kan efter behov indl├жses af programmer dynamisk ved hj├жlp af GtkBuilder, eller bruges direkte til at definere en ny GtkWidget-afledt objektklasse ved hj├жlp af GTK+-funktionen ny skabelon.
Ved hj├жlp af GtkBuilder kan Glade-XML-filer bruges i mange programmeringssprog, heriblandt C, C++, C#, Vala, Java, Perl, Python med flere.
Glade ist eine schnelle Anwendungsentwicklung (RAD tool) zur schnellen und einfachen Entwicklung von Benutzerschnittstellen f├╝r GTK+ 3 und die GNOME Arbeitsumgebung.

Die in Glade entworfenen Benutzerschnittstellen werden als XML gespeichert. Diese k├╢nnen von Anwendungen mit Hilfe von GtkBuilder dynamisch nach Bedarf geladen werden, oder direkt verwendet werden, um ein neue von GtkWidget abgeleitete Objektklasse mit Hilfe der neuen GTK+ Vorlagenfunktion zu definieren.
Durch die Verwendung von GtkBuilder k├╢nnen Glade XML-Dateien in verschiedenen Programmiersprachen wie z.B. C, C++, C#, Vala, Java, Perl, Python und anderen verwendet werden.
Glade es una herramienta RAD (Desarrollo r├бpido de aplicaciones) para crear y desarrollar f├бcilmente interfaces de usuario para el kit de herramientas GTK+ 3 en el entorno de escritorio GNOME.

Las interfaces de usuarios dise├▒adas en Glade se guardan como archivos XML y las aplicaciones pueden cargarlos din├бmicamente cuando los necesitan usando GtkBuilder o pueden usarlas directamente para definir un objeto GtkWidget nuevo usando la caracter├нstica de plantilla nueva de GTK+.
Usando GtkBuilder, los archivos XML de Glade se pueden usar en numerosos lenguajes de programaci├│n, incluyendo C, C++, C#, Vala, Java, Perl, Python, y otros.
Glade est un outil RAD (Rapid Application Development) qui permet le d├йveloppement rapide et facile d'interfaces utilisateur pour la bo├оte ├а outils GTK+ 3 et l'environnement de bureau GNOME.

Les interfaces utilisateur con├зues dans Glade sont enregistr├йes en XML. Ces fichiers peuvent ├кtre charg├йs de fa├зon dynamique selon les besoins gr├вce ├а GtkBuider, ou ├кtre utilis├йes directement pour d├йfinir une nouvelle classe objet d├йriv├йe de GtkWidget gr├вce ├а la nouvelle fonctionnalit├й de mod├иle GTK+.
Gr├вce ├а GtkBuilder, les fichiers XML de Glade peuvent ├кtre utilis├йs dans de nombreux langages de programmation incluant C, C++, C#, Vala, Java, Perl, Python et autres.
Glade ├й unha ferramenta RAD para activar o desenvolvemento r├бpido e doado de interfaces de usuario para o conxunto de ferramentas GTK+3 e o ambiente de escritorio GNOME.

As interfaces de usuario dese├▒adas por Glade g├бrdanse en XML e os aplicativos poden lelas dinamicamente tan pronto as precisen as precisen usando GtkBuilder ou usadas directamente para definir un novo GtkWidget derivado da clase de obxecto usando a nova caracter├нstica de plantillas GTK+.
Usando GtkBuilder, os ficheiros XML de Glade poden usarse en varios linguaxes de programaci├│n entre os que est├бn C, C++, C#, Java, Perl e Python.
A Glade egy RAD eszk├╢z, amely lehet┼Сv├й teszi felhaszn├бl├│i fel├╝letek gyors ├йs egyszer┼▒ fejleszt├йs├йt a GTK+ 3 eszk├╢zk├йszlethez ├йs a GNOME asztali k├╢rnyezethez.

A Glade-ben tervezett felhaszn├бl├│i fel├╝letek XML-k├йnt ker├╝lnek ment├йsre, ├йs ezek dinamikusan t├╢lthet┼Сk be az alkalmaz├бsokban a GtkBuilder haszn├бlat├бval, vagy felhaszn├бlhat├│k ├║j, a GtkWidgetb┼Сl sz├бrmaztatott objektumoszt├бly k├╢zvetlen defini├бl├бs├бra a GTK+ ├║j sablon funkci├│j├бnak seg├нts├йg├йvel.
A GtkBuilder haszn├бlat├бval a Glade XML f├бjlok sz├бmos programoz├бsi nyelvben haszn├бlhat├│k, mint a C, C++, C#, Vala, Java, Perl, Python ├йs m├бsok.
Glade adalah suatu alat RAD yang memungkinkan pengembangan antar muka pengguna yang cepat & mudah bagi toolkit GTK+ 3 dan lingkungan desktop GNOME.

Antar muka pengguna yang dirancang dalam Glade disimpan sebagai XML dan ini dapat dimuat oleh aplikasi secara dinamis seperlunya dengan memakai GtkBuilder atau dipakai secara langsung untuk mendefinisikan suatu kelas objek baru turunan GtkWidget memakai fitur templat baru GTK+.
Dengan memakai GtkBuilder, berkas XML Glade dapat dipakai dalam berbagai bahasa pemrograman termasuk C, C++, C#, Vala, Java, Perl, Python, dan lainnya.
Glade ├и uno strumento RAD che consente uno sviluppo rapido e semplice di interfacce utente per il toolkit GTK+ 3 e per l'ambiente desktop GNOME.

Le interfacce utente create con Glade vengono salvate nel formato XML e possono essere caricate dalle applicazioni in modo dinamico in base alle necessita usando GtkBuilder o usate direttamente per definire una nuova classe di oggetti derivata GtkWidget usando la funzionalit├а dei nuovi modelli GTK+.
Usando GtkBuilder, i file XML di Glade possono essere usati in numerosi linguaggi di programmazione inclusi C, C++, c#, Vala, Java, Perl, Python e altri.

Glade es un aisina RAD (Rapid Aplicacion Development) que permet lo d├йveloppement rapide e facile d'interf├аcias utilizaire per la b├│stia a aisinas GTK+ 3 e l'environnement de bur├иu GNOME.

Dzi─Щki mechanizmowi GtkBuilder, pliki XML programu Glade mog─Е by─З u┼╝ywane w┬аwielu j─Щzykach programowania, w┬аtym C, C++, C#, Vala, Java, Perl, Python i┬аinnych.
O Glade ├й uma ferramenta RAD (Desenvolvimento R├бpido de Aplica├з├╡es) que permite desenvolver r├бpida & facilmente ambientes de utilizador para o GTK+3 e ambiente de trabalho do GNOME

Os ambientes desenhados no Glade s├гo gravados como XML e podem ser carregadas dinamicamente por aplica├з├╡es quando necess├бrio usando o Gtkbuilder, ou diretamente para definir uma nova classe de objeto derivada de Gtkwidget, usando a nova funcionalidade de modelos do GTK+.
Ao usar o Gtkbuilder,os ficheiros XML do Glade podem ser utilizados em in├║meras linguagens de programa├з├гo, incluindo C, C++, C#, Vala, Java, Perl, Python e outras.

O Glade ├й uma ferramenta RAD (desenvolvimento r├бpido de aplicativos) que permite o desenvolvimento ├бgil & f├бcil de interfaces gr├бficas para o kit de ferramentas GTK+ 3 e para o ambiente de ├бrea de trabalho GNOME.

As interfaces gr├бficas projetadas no Glade s├гo salvas como XML e estes arquivos podem ser carregados dinamicamente por aplicativos ├а medida que necessitam usar o GtkBuilder ou usados diretamente para definir uma nova classe de objeto derivada de GtkWidget usando o recurso de novo modelo do GTK+.
Ao usar o GtkBuilder, os arquivos XML do Glade podem ser usados em diversas linguagens de programa├з├гo, incluindo: C, C++, C#, Vala, Java, Perl, Python, entre outras.
Glade je n├бstroj pre r├╜chly v├╜voj aplik├бci├н, ktor├╜ umo┼╛┼Иuje r├╜chlo a jednoducho vyv├нja┼е pou┼╛├нvate─╛sk├й rozhrania pre sadu n├бstrojov GTK+ 3 a pracovn├й prostredie GNOME.

Pomocou prvku GtkBuilder, XML s├║bory programu Glade m├┤┼╛u by┼е pou┼╛it├й v mnoh├╜ch programovac├нch jazykoch vr├бtane jazykov C, C++, C#, Vala, Java, Perl, Python, a in├╜ch.

Glejd je RAD alat za uklju─Нivanje brzog i lakog razvoja korisni─Нkih su─Нelja za komplet alata GTK+ 3 i za Gnomovo okru┼╛enje radne povr┼бi.

Glade ├дr ett RAD-verktyg f├╢r snabb och enkel utveckling av anv├дndargr├дnssnitt f├╢r GTK+ 3-verktygsl├еdan och GNOMEs skrivbordsmilj├╢.

Anv├дndargr├дnssnitten byggda i Glade sparas som XML och kan l├дsas in av program dynamiskt efter behov genom att anv├дnda GtkBuilder, eller anv├дndas direkt f├╢r att definiera en ny objektklass ├дrvd fr├еn GtkWidget genom att anv├дnda GTK+ nya mallegenskap.
Genom att anv├дnda GtkBuilder kan Glade XML-filer anv├дndas i flertalet programmeringsspr├еk som C, C++, C#, Vala, Java, Perl, Python och andra.

description.p: Geary is an email application built around conversations, for the GNOME 3 desktop. It allows you to read, find and send email with a straightforward, modern interface.
Conversations allow you to read a complete discussion without having to find and click from message to message.
GearyтАЩs features include:

ul.li: Shows related messages together in conversations
Fast, full text and keyword search
Full-featured HTML and plain text message composer
Compatible with GMail, Yahoo! Mail, Outlook.com and other IMAP servers

description.p: Geary es una aplicaci├│n de correo-e pensada para las conversaciones, para el escritorio GNOME 3. Le permite leer, buscar y enviar correos con una interfaz sencilla y moderna.

description.p: Geary adalah aplikasi surel yang dibangun di sekitar percakapan, bagi desktop GNOME 3. Memungkinkan Anda membaca, mencari, dan mengirim surel dengan antar muka yang modern, mudah.

Le conversazioni permettono di leggere un'intera discussione senza dover cercare e fare clic su ogni messaggio.

description.p: Bug fixes included in this release:

ul.li: Parts of multipart/digest message do not expand when clicked upon. Bug 788637.
Geary does not unlock keyring at start. Bug 784300.
Syntax error in IMAP greeting from AliYun IMAP server. Bug 781488.
Message body text caret (cursor) not initially visible. Bug 788797.
Losing focus when clicking in empty part of the composer. Bug 779369.
Line breaks lost when selecting and replying to certain messages. Bug 781178.
Always display an in-window app-menu under Unity. Bug 770618.
Crash in SoupCacheInputStream when cancelling a message load. Bug 778720.
Do not show Labels on sidebar if no label is present. Bug 754802.
Unable to use Ctrl+C shortcut to copy e-mail subject; must use context menu instead. Bug 788494.
After clicking on mailto link in Geary, the body in the composer is not writable. Bug 771504.
Editing message does not support RTL. Bug 713607.

description.p: Enhancements included in this release:

ul.li: Insert images inline when composing rich text messages

Choose multiple spell-checker languages when composing messages
Support message archiving for Yahoo! Mail and Outlook.com
Improved interface when moving and labelling conversations
Automatically unfold starred messages in a conversation
Numerous bug fixes and minor user interface improvements

description.p: Each square piece has a number on each side. Position the pieces on the left side of the board so that the same numbers are next to each other. If the numbers don't match, you can't put the piece there. Move quickly: you're being timed!
You can make the game easier or harder by changing the size of the board.

Cada quadrau d'a pieza tiene un numero de cara. Coloque as piezas a la cucha d'o tablero ta que os numeros iguals s├нan chuntos. Si os numeros no coinciden, no podr├б meter ast├н a pieza. Se mueva rapidament, se le ye cronometrando!
Puede fer que o chuego s├нa mas facil u mas dificil cambiando a grandaria d'o tablero.

Svaki kvadratni komadi─З ima broj na svakoj strani. Postavite komadi─З na lijevoj strani plo─Нe tako da su isti brojevi jedan pored drugog. Ako se brojevi ne podudaraju, ne mo┼╛ete postaviti komadi─З tamo. Brzo pomjerite: isti─Нe vam vrijeme!
Mo┼╛ete u─Нiniti igricu lak┼бom ili te┼╛om, promjenom veli─Нine plo─Нe.

component.name: DOSBox
component.summary: x86/DOS emulator with sound and graphics

description.p: DOSBox is a DOS-emulator using SDL for easy portability to different platforms. DOSBox has already been ported to several different platforms, such as Windows, BeOS, Linux, Mac OS X...

DOSBox emulates a 286/386 realmode CPU, Directory FileSystem/XMS/EMS, a SoundBlaster card for excellent sound compatibility with older games... You can "re-live" the good old days with the help of DOSBox, it can run plenty of the old classics that don't run on your new computer!
This version of DOSBox is sandboxed. You have to copy your DOS files to your Documents directory and mount them using a mount command in DOSBox.
Mint-Y-Darker theme

component.name: Google Play Music Desktop Player
component.summary: Run Google Play Music as a standalone desktop app

description.p: Run Google Play Music as a standalone desktop app. Never again will you have to hunt through your tabs to pause your music, or stop listening to your favourite song because Chrome is guzzling up all your RAM..
No affiliation with Google. Google Play is a trademark of Google Inc.

component.name: GNU Octave
component.summary: Interactive programming environment for numerical computations

description.p: GNU Octave is a high-level interpreted language, primarily intended for numerical computations. It provides capabilities for the numerical solution of linear and nonlinear problems, and for performing other numerical experiments. It also provides extensive graphics capabilities for data visualization and manipulation. Octave is normally used through its interactive command line interface, but it can also be used to write non-interactive programs. The Octave language is quite similar to Matlab so that most programs are easily portable.

Octave has extensive tools for solving common numerical linear algebra problems, finding the roots of nonlinear equations, integrating ordinary functions, manipulating polynomials, and integrating ordinary differential and differential-algebraic equations. It is easily extensible and customizable via user-defined functions written in Octave's own language, or using dynamically loaded modules written in C++, C, Fortran, or other languages.

Snes9x is a portable, freeware Super Nintendo Entertainment System (SNES) emulator. It basically allows you to play most games designed for the SNES and Super Famicom Nintendo game systems on your PC or Workstation; which includes some real gems that were only ever released in Japan.

component.name: AstroMenace
component.summary: Hardcore 3D space shooter with spaceship upgrade possibilities

description.p: AstroMenace is an astonishing hardcore scroll-shooter where brave space warriors may find a great opportunity to hone their combat skills. Gather money during the battle to spend them on turning your spaceship into an ultimate weapon of mass destruction and give hell to swarms of adversaries. Enjoy the wonderfully crafted 3d graphics and high-quality special effects along with a detailed difficulty adjustment and a handy interface of AstroMenace.
Features:

ul.li: 19 unique weapons with the easy drag-and-drop weapon mount mode
15 missions with 100+ unique enemies and 40+ space objects
Simulative and arcade ship control mode

component.name: OpenRA
component.summary: Reimagining of early Westwood real-time strategy games

description.p: OpenRA is a project that recreates and modernizes the classic Command & Conquer real time strategy games. We have developed a flexible open source game engine (the OpenRA engine) that provides a common platform for rebuilding and reimagining classic 2D and 2.5D RTS games (the OpenRA mods).
The OpenRA mods include new features and gameplay improvements that bring them into the modern era:

ul.li: A choice between тАЬright clickтАЭ and classic тАЬleft clickтАЭ control schemes
Overhauled sidebar interfaces for managing production
Support for game replays and an observer interface designed for streaming games online
The тАЬfog of warтАЭ that obscures the battlefield outside your units' line of sight
Civilian structures that can be captured to provide benefits
Units gain experience as they fight and improve when they earn new ranks

description.p: OpenRA is 100% free, and comes bundled with three distinct mods. When you run a mod for the first time the game can automatically download the original game assets, or you can use the original game disks.

ul.li: Search for podcasts and subscribe directly from the app
Filter episodes by their duration and release date

component.name: Frozen Bubble
component.summary: An addictive game about frozen bubbles

description.p: Frozen Bubble is a free and open source game in which you throw colorful bubbles and build groups to destroy them.
You can play this game locally or over the Internet. It also contains a level editor for you to create your own games.

The ARK Desktop Wallet is natively built for all major Operating Systems. Our full HD wallet meets the top security standards in the industry and supports the Ledger Nano S secure hardware wallet. ARK wallets connect to fully synced network peers removing the need to download the full blockchain. With the ARK wallet you are up and running as soon as itтАЩs installed, no more syncing! And, with 8 second block times you can actually see your transactions occur in real time! No more checking in every 30 minutes to see if your transactions were confirmed.

description.p: Audacity┬о is a free, easy-to-use, multi-track audio editor and recorder for Windows, Mac OS X, GNU/Linux and other operating systems. The interface is translated into many languages.
You can use Audacity to:

ul.li: Convert tapes and records into digital recordings or CDs
Edit WAV, AIFF, FLAC, MP2, MP3 or Ogg Vorbis sound files
Cut, copy, splice or mix sounds together
Change the speed or pitch of a recording
Apply a wide range of other effects to audio recordings

description.p: LBRY is a free, open, and community-run digital marketplace.
You own your data. You control the network. Indeed, you are the network.
Hollywood films, college lessons, amazing streamers and more are on the first media network ruled by you.

component.name: DV Analyzer
component.summary: Analyze DV streams and report errors

description.p: DV Analyzer is a technical quality control and reporting tool that examines DV streams in order to report errors in the tape-to-file transfer process, such as video error concealment information, invalid audio samples, timecode inconsistency, inconsistent use of arbitrary bits in video DIF blocks, and DIF structural problems. DV Analyzer also reports on patterns within DV streams such as changes in DV time code, changes in recording date and time markers, first and last frame markers within individual recordings, and more.
Initially funded, designed and led by AVPreserve; developed by MediaArea.
Arc-Darker-solid is a flat theme for Gtk3.
A Material Design theme for GNOME/GTK+ based desktop environments
Ring is a secure, distributed communication software and a SIP client.
An Open Source vector graphics editor, with capabilities similar to Illustrator, CorelDraw, or Xara X, using the W3C standard Scalable Vector Graphics (SVG) file format.

Inkscape supports many advanced SVG features (markers, clones, alpha blending, etc.) and great care is taken in designing a streamlined interface. It is very easy to edit nodes, perform complex path operations, trace bitmaps and much more. We also aim to maintain a thriving user and developer community by using open, community-oriented development.

Een open source vectorafbeeldingprogramma met vergelijkbare mogelijkheden als Illustrator, CorelDraw, of Xara X gebruik makend van het standaard W3C Scalable Vector Graphics (SVG) bestandsformaat.

Inkscape ondersteunt veel geavanceerde SVG features (markeringen, klonen, alfa blending, etc.). Veel zorg ging naar het ontwerp van een gestroomlijnde interface. Het is zeer eenvoudig om knooppunten te bewerken, complexe padoperaties uit te voeren, bitmaps over te trekken, ... We beogen een actieve gebruikers- en ontwikkelgemeenschap door middel van open, gemeenschapsgerichte ontwikkeling.

component.name: FreeDM
component.summary: Deathmatch game based on the Doom engine

description.p: FreeDM is a fast-paced set of levels designed for multiplayer deathmatches, part of the Freedoom project. Challenge your friends to the most torturous test of their abilities as you navigate through 32 levels stalking and hunting them.

The Freedoom project aims to produce three base-game data files (IWADs) for Doom-compatible engines. With it comes the capability to also play the wide range of mods created for Doom by a vibrant community. FreeDM is fully compatible with Doom II mods.

component.name: Dippi
component.summary: Calculate display info like DPI and aspect ratio

description.p: Analyze any display. Input a few simple details and figure out the aspect ratio, DPI, and other details of a particular display. Great for deciding which laptop or external monitor to purchase, and if it would be considered HiDPI.
Handy features:

ul.li: Find out if a display is a good choice based on its size and resolution
Differentiates between laptops and desktop displays
Stupid simple: all in a cute li'l window

description.p: Based on the expertise of Cassidy James Blaede and the actual logic System76 uses to determine screen size and resolution combinations.
Tells you if a displayтАШs density is:
Special thanks:

ul.li: Micah Ilbery for the shiny icons!
Daniel For├й for his apps to use as code examples
David Jordan for helping determine DPI ranges

description.p: Under the hood changes:

ul.li: Include success icon as a fallback for other icon sets

description.p: Changes:

ul.li: Tweaked DPI ranges for internal displays to be a tiny more strict for the тАЬidealтАЭ range

description.p: Fixes:

ul.li: Allow all languages to be translated

description.p: And more! Read the recent blog post at goo.gl/tKwkq4

ul.li: Cleaned up design by moving display details to below the analysis

component.name: Betaflight Configurator
component.summary: Crossplatform configuration tool for the Betaflight flight control system

description.p: Betaflight Configurator is a crossplatform configuration tool for the Betaflight flight control system. It allows you to configure the Betaflight software running on any supported Betaflight target, as well as updating the firmware. Various types of aircraft are supported by the tool and by Betaflight, e.g. quadcopters, hexacopters, octocopters and fixed-wing aircraft.

This configurator is the only configurator with support for Betaflight specific features. It will likely require that you run the latest firmware on the flight controller. If you are experiencing any problems please make sure you are running the latest firmware version.

component.name: FFmpeg extension
component.summary: Add support for aac, mpeg4 and h264

description.p: Code is the editor that works for you. It auto-saves your files, meaning they're always up-to-date. Plus it remembers your tabs so you never lose your spot, even in between sessions.

Make it yours. Code is written from the ground up to be extensible. Keep things super lightweight and simple, or install extensions to turn Code into a full-blown IDE; it's your choice. And with a handful of useful preferences, you can tweak the behavior and interface to your liking.
It's elementary. Code is made to be the perfect editor for elementary, meaning it closely follows the high standards of design, speed, and consistency. It's sexy, but not distracting.

Works with your language. Whether you're crafting code in Vala, scripting with PHP, or marking things up in HTML, Code has you covered. Experience full syntax highlighting with nearly all programming, scripting, and markup languages.
Other syntax-highlighted languages: Bash, C, C#, C++. Cmake, CSS, .Desktop, Diff, Fortran, Gettext, ini, Java, JavaScript, LaTex, Lua, Makefile, Objective C, Pascal, Perl, Python, Ruby, XML.

Initial Flathub release

component.name: Minetest

description.p: Minetest is an infinite-world block sandbox game and game engine.
Players can create and destroy various types of blocks in a three-dimensional open world. This allows forming structures in every possible creation, on multiplayer servers or in singleplayer.
Minetest is designed to be simple, stable, and portable. It is lightweight enough to run on fairly old hardware.
Minetest has many features, including:

ul.li: Ability to walk around, dig, and build in a near-infinite voxel world
Crafting of items from raw materials
Fast and able to run on old and slow hardware
A simple modding API that supports many additions and modifications to the game
Multiplayer support via servers hosted by users

component.project_license: LGPL-2.1+ and CC-BY-SA-3.0 and MIT and Apache-2.0

component.name: Freedoom: Phase 1
component.summary: First-person shooter based on the Doom engine

description.p: Freedoom: Phase 1 contains four chapters, nine levels each, to provide a smoothly-paced first person action game. In it is a wide variety of mazes and enemies to fight and challenge your reflexes.

The Freedoom project aims to produce three base-game data files (IWADs) for Doom-compatible engines. With it comes the capability to also play the wide range of mods created for Doom by a vibrant community. Freedoom: Phase 1 is fully compatible with The Ultimate Doom mods.

component.name: GNOME Software Development Kit version 3.24
component.summary: Tools and headers for developing applications using the GNOME application platform

component.name: GNOME Software Development Kit version 3.26
component.summary: Tools and headers for developing applications using the GNOME application platform

component.name: NumptyPhysics
component.summary: A crayon-drawing based physics puzzle game

description.p: Harness gravity with your crayon and set about creating blocks, ramps, levers, pulleys and whatever else you fancy to get the little red thing to the little yellow thing.

description.p: Pitivi is a video editor that aims to appeal to hobbyists and professionals alike, with a strong focus on efficiency, quality and usability. It integrates well with other applications and sports a beautiful user interface designed to be powerful yet easy to learn.

With a non-modal editing workflow, a framerate-independent and playhead-centric timeline, Pitivi allows you quickly and accurately trim, split and review your scenes. Pitivi's ripple and roll editing features allow spending more time on storytelling and less time on "pushing clips around".
Some other features include:

ul.li: Accepts any file formats supported by the GStreamer multimedia framework
Can animate hundreds of special effects and filters with keyframable properties
Ability to set custom aspect ratios, framerates and rendering presets
Easy to use crossfades and SMPTE transitions
Multihead-friendly with detachable user interface components

description.p: Pitivi je video editor koji ima za cilj da se svidii hobistima i profesionalcima podjednako, s jakim naglaskom na u─Нinkovitosti kvalitete i upotrebljivosti. On se integrira s drugim aplikacijama i kao sportski lijepo korisni─Нko su─Нelje dizajnirano da bude mo─Зno, ali jednostavno za nau─Нiti.

Uz ne-modalnog tijeka rada za ure─Сivanje, framerate neovisan i playhead-centric timelajnom, Pitivi omogu─Зuje brzo i precizno podrezivanje, podjelu i pregledavanje svoje scene. Pitivi je talasanje, zamotavanje i ure─Сivanje zna─Нajki koje omogu─Зuju tro┼бenje vi┼бe vremena na pripovijedanje i manje vremena na "guranje isje─Нaka oko".
Neke druge zna─Нajke uklju─Нuju:

ul.li: Prihva─Зa sve formate datoteka koje podr┼╛avaju multimedijske okviru GStreamer
Mo┼╛e animirati stotine specijalnih efekata i filtera s keyframable svojstvima
Sposobnost za postavljanje obi─Нaja i aspekata omjera, framerata i pru┼╛anje postavki
Jednostavan za kori┼бtenje crossfades i SMPTE prijelaza
Multi prijateljski s odvojivim korisni─Нkim su─Нeljima komponenti

description.p: Pitivi ├йs un editor de v├нdeo que vol ser atractiu per aficionats i professionals, amb un fort ├иmfasis en efici├иncia, qualitat i usabilitat. S'integra b├й amb altres aplicacions i llueix una interf├нcie d'usuari dissenyada per ser potent per├▓ f├аcil d'aprendre.

Amb un flux de treball d'edici├│ no modal, una freq├╝├иncia de fotogrames independent i una l├нnia de temps, Pitivi us permet retallar, dividir i revisar les vostres pel┬╖l├нcules r├аpidament. Les caracter├нstiques d'edici├│ i despla├зament permeten invertir m├йs temps en explicar la hist├▓ria i menys en moure seq├╝├иncies amunt i avall.

description.p: Pitivi je videoeditor, kter├╜ si klade za c├нl oslovit fandy i profesion├бly a kter├╜ klade velk├╜ d┼пraz na efektivitu, kvalitu a pou┼╛itelnost. Je dob┼Щe integrov├бn s dal┼б├нmi aplikacemi a p┼Щedv├бd├н p─Ыkn├й u┼╛ivatelsk├й rozhran├н navr┼╛en├й s d┼пrazem na snadn├й osvojen├н.

description.p: Pitivi er et program til redigering af videoer, som fors├╕ger at appellere til b├еde amat├╕rer og professionelle. Der er stort fokus p├е effektivitet, kvalitet og brugbarhed. Pitivi integrerer godt med andre programmer og har en flot brugergr├жnseflade, som er designet til at v├жre funktionsrigt og dog let at l├жre.

Med en ikke-modal redigeringsarbejdsgang, en billedfrekvens-uafh├жngig og afspilningsmark├╕r-centreret tidslinje giver Pitivi dig mulighed for at trimme, opdele og gennemse dine scener. Pitivis redigeringsfunktioner тАЬrippleтАЭ og тАЬrollтАЭ lader dig bruge mere tid p├е historiefort├жlling og mindre tid p├е at flytte rundt p├е klip.
Andre funktioner inkluderer:

ul.li: Accepterer ethvert filformat, som underst├╕ttes af GStreamer-multimedierammen
Kan animere hundredvis af specialeffekter og filtre med n├╕glebilledegenskaber
Mulighed for at tilpasse h├╕jde-/breddeforhold, billedfrekvens og forudindstilling af gengivelse
Glidende overgange og SMPTE-overgange der er nemme at bruge
Nem at bruge p├е flere sk├жrme med brugergr├жnsefladekomponenter der kan l├╕srives

description.p: Pitivi ist ein Videoeditor, der das Ziel hat, sowohl f├╝r Amateure als auch f├╝r Experten attraktiv zu sein und dabei eine starke Ausrichtung auf Effizienz, Qualit├дt und Benutzerfreundlichkeit hat. Pitivi f├╝gt sich problemlos in andere Anwendungen ein und kann sich mit seiner ansprechenden Benutzeroberfl├дche, die so entworfen wurde, dass sie zugleich m├дchtig und dennoch einfach zu erlernen ist, sehen lassen.

Mit einem nichtmodalen Bearbeitungs-Arbeitsfluss, einer Bildwiederholraten-unabh├дngigen und Suchleisten-zentrischen Zeitleiste erlaubt es Pitivi Ihnen, Ihre Szenen schnell und genau zu trimmen, zu splitten und durchzusehen. Pitivis Bearbeitungsfunktionen ┬╗L├╢schen und L├╝cke schlie├Яen┬л (engl. ripple edit) und ┬╗Rollen┬л (engl. roll edit) erlauben es, mehr Zeit f├╝r das Geschichtenerz├дhlen zu verwenden und weniger Zeit f├╝r das ┬╗Clip-Schubsen┬л aufzuwenden.
Weitere Funktionen:

ul.li: Arbeitet mit allen Dateiformaten, die vom GStreamer Multimedia-Framework unterst├╝tzt werden
Kann hunderte von Spezialeffekten und Filter mit schl├╝sselbildbezogenen Eigenschaften animieren
Die M├╢glichkeit, benutzerdefinierte Seitenverh├дltnisse, Bildwiederholraten und Erstellungs-Voreinstellungen einzustellen

description.p: Pitivi es un editor de v├нdeo que pretende atraer a aficionados y profesionales por igual, orientado a la usabilidad, la eficiencia y la calidad. Se integra bien con otras aplicaciones y tiene una bonita interfaz dise├▒ada para ser potente y f├бcil de usar.

Con un flujo de trabajo de edici├│n no modal, una tasa de fotogramas independiente y una l├нnea de tiempo centrada, Pitivi le permite recortar, dividir y revisar sus pel├нculas r├бpidamente. Las caracter├нsticas de edici├│n de remolino y de desplazamiento permiten invertir m├бs tiempo en contar la historia y menos en recortar los v├нdeos.
Entre otras caracter├нsticas se incluyen:

ul.li: Acepta cualquier formato de archivo soportado por el entorno de trabajo multimedia GStreamer
Puede animar cientos de efectos especiales y filtros con fotogramas clave
Posibilidad de establecer relaciones de aspecto personalizadas, y configuraciones predefinidas de tasas de fotogramas y renderizado
Posibilidad de usar fundidos y transiciones SMPTE
Adaptado para varias pantallas con componentes de la interfaz de usuario desacoplables

description.p: Pitivi zaleentzako nahiz profesionalentzako bideo-editore bat da, eta eraginkortasuna, kalitatea eta erabilgarritasuna lehenesten ditu. Ondo integratzen da beste aplikazioekin; eta erabiltzaile-interfaze polita dauka, ahaltsua eta ikasteko erraza izateko diseinatua.

Pitivi-n, ediziorako lan-fuxua ez-modala da, eta denbora-lerroa, berriz, fotograma-abiadurarekiko independentea eta erreprodukzio-puntuan zentratua; hala, Pitivi-rekin, bizkor eta zehazki moztu, zatitu eta berrikus daitezke eszenak. Mozketak egitean sekuentziak egokitzeko Pitivi-k dituen "ripple" eta "roll" edizio-tresnei esker, denbora gehiago emango duzu istorioak kontatzen eta gutxiago sekuentziak eskuz moldatzen.
Ezaugarri hauek ere baditu, besteak beste:

ul.li: GStreamer multimedia-sistemak onartzen duen edozein fitxategi-formatu onartzen du

Aukera ematen du aspektu-erlazio pertsonalizatuak, fotograma-abiadurak eta errendatze lehenetsiak ezartzeko
Erraz egiten dira nahaste gurutzatuak eta SMPTE trantsizioak
Aldi berean pantaila bat baino gehiagotan erabiltzeko egokia da, erabiltzaile-interfazearen osagaiak desuztartzen baitzaizkio

description.p: Pitivi adalah penyunting video yang bertujuan menarik para penggemar maupun profesional, dengan fokus yang kuat pada efisiensi, kualitas, dan kegunaan. Ini terintegrasi secara baik dengan aplikasi lain dan menyajikan antarmuka pengguna yang indah, yang dirancang untuk kuat namun mudah dipelajari.

Dengan alur kerja penyuntingan non-modal, lini masa yang bebas laju bingkai dan berpusat playhead, Pitivi memungkinkan Anda dengan cepat dan akurat memangkas, memecah, dan meninjau skenario Anda. Fitur penyuntingan 'ripple and roll' Pitivi memungkinkan lebih banyak waktu untuk bercerita dan sedikit waktu untuk "menggeser-geser klip".
Fitur lain termasuk:

ul.li: Menerima sebarang format berkas yang didukung oleh framework multimedia GStreamer
Dapat menganimasikan ratusan efek khusus dan menyaring dengan properti yang dapat di-keyframe-kan
Kemampuan menata rasio aspek, laju bingkai, dan perenderan ubahan
Transisi SMPTE dan pudar silang yang mudah dipakai
Mendukung tampilan ganda dengan komponen antarmuka pengguna yang dapat dilepas

Com boa integra├з├гo com outras aplica├з├╡es, o Pitivi ostenta um ambiente gr├бfico bonito, projetado para ser poderoso e de f├бcil aprendizagem.

Arc-Dark-solid is a flat theme for Gtk3.
Tiled is a general purpose 2D level editor with powerful tile map editing features. ItтАЩs built to be easy to use and is suitable for many type of games.
The Tiled map format is supported by a large amount of game engines and libraries. In addition, Tiled supports plugins to read and write map formats other than its own map format.

component.name: Viber
component.summary: We connect people, no matter who they are or where they are from.

description.p: Send free messages and make free calls to other Viber users on any device and network, in any country! Viber syncs your contacts and messages with your mobile device.

description.p: Builder is an actively developed Integrated Development Environment for GNOME. It combines integrated support for essential GNOME technologies such as GTK+, GLib, and GNOME APIs with features that any developer will appreciate, like syntax highlighting and snippets.
You can rely on predictable releases of Builder with each new release of GNOME every six months.
Features:

ul.li: Built in syntax highlighting for many languages
Integration with Autotools, Cargo, CMake, Meson, Make, and PHPize
Clang based auto-completion, semantic highlighting, and diagnostics
Python based auto-completion, semantic highlighting, and diagnostics
Auto indentation support for C, Python, Vala, and XML
HTML, Markdown, and reStructuredText, and Sphinx live preview
An integrated software profiler for native applications
An integrated debugger for native applications
Support for building with jhbuild and flatpak runtimes

description.p: Builder merupakan Integrated Development Environment yang aktif dikembangkan untuk GNOME. Ini menggabungkan dukungan terintegrasi untuk teknologi GNOME yang penting seperti GTK+, GLib, dan API GNOME dengan fitur yang setiap pengembang akan mengapresiasi, seperti sintaks dan potongan.
Anda dapat mengandalkan rilis berkala Builder dengan setiap rilis baru GNOME setiap enam bulan.
Fitur:

ul.li: Penyorotan sintaks bawaan untuk banyak bahasa
Integrasi dengan Autotools, Cargo, CMake, Meson, Make, dan PHPize
Pelengkapan otomatis, penyorotan semantik, dan diagnostik berbasis Clang
Pelengkapan otomatis, penyorotan semantik, dan diagnostik berbasis Python
Pelengkapan otomatis dan diagnostik berbasis Vala
Dukungan indentasi otomatis untuk C, Python, Vala, dan XML
Pratinjau langsung HTML, Markdown, dan reStructuredText, dan Sphinx
Profiler perangkat lunak terpadu untuk aplikasi native
Dukungan untuk membangun dengan jhbuild dan flatpak runtimes

description.p: Builder ├и un IDE per GNOME in continua evoluzione. Racchiude il supporto per le tecnologie GNOME essenziali come GTK+, GLib e le API di GNOME oltre a molte funzionalit├а apprezzate dagli sviluppatori (evidenziazione della sintassi e snippet).
Una nuova versione di Builder viene rilasciata assieme a GNOME ogni sei mesi.
Caratteristiche:

ul.li: Evidenziazione della sintassi per molti linguaggi di programmazione
Integrazione con autotools, Cargo, CMake, Meson, Make a PHPize
Completamento automatico, evidenziazione semantica e diagnostica basati su clang
Completamento automatico, evidenziazione semantica e diagnostica basati su Python
Completamento automatico e diagnostica basati su Vala
Rientro automatico del codice per C, Python, Vala e XML
Anteprime per HTML, Markdown, reStructuredText e Sphinx
Un profiler integrato per applicazioni native
Un debugger integrato per applicazioni native
Supporto per la compilazione con jhbuild e flatpack

description.p: Builder es un environament de desvolopament per GNOME activament desvolopat. Combina una presa en carga integrada per las tecnologias GNOME essencialas talas coma GTK+, GLib e las API GNOME amb de foncionalitats qu'agradar├а a tot desvolopaire, coma la coloracion sintaxica e los extraits de c├▓di.

description.p: This new release of Builder contains a number of bug fixes found during the 3.26 cycle. It is recommended that you update.

ul.li: Meson plugin no longer uses the legacy "mesonintrospect" utility.
Block selection in the terminal has been restored.
The flatpak exporter now properly determines the target application binary from the manifest.

description.p: This new release of Builder contains a number of bug fixes found during the 3.26 cycle.

ul.li: Various improvements to for developing against the host system when running Builder from a flatpak.
Builder will set more fallback environment variable when running under flatpak to ensure subprocesses have a predictable environment.
Various fixes to the shortcut engine and how key-press are captured.
Fixes for invalid cast in LSP format provider.
Various correctness and memory leak fixes.
Symbol tree will try additional symbol resolvers if the first one returned with an empty set.

description.p: This new release of Builder contains a number of bug fixes found during the 3.26 cycle.

ul.li: Remove the related GPLv3+ section from LGPLv3+ COPYING.
Additional protection against spurious build notifications.
Be more defensive against spellcheck race conditions.
Ensure indenter can be properly disabled and re-enabled.
Improved translation of build paths provided by the build system.
With modern Clang versions, try harder to keep processing after include failures.
Load additional style schemes from .local/share/gtksourceview-3.0 when running under flatpak.
Ensure the search bar is above the floating minimap.
Avoid double free when failing to load a git repository.
Copyright snippets now prefer to use ┬й over (C).
Fix an off-by-one when jumping to todo line number.

description.p: The Eye of GNOME is the official image viewer for the GNOME desktop. It integrates with the GTK+ look and feel of GNOME, and supports many image formats for viewing single images or images in a collection.

The Eye of GNOME also allows to view the images in a fullscreen slideshow mode or set an image as the desktop wallpaper. It reads the camera tags to automatically rotate your images in the correct portrait or landscape orientation.
O Visor d'imachens ye o visor d'imachens oficial ta o escritorio GNOME. S'integra con l'aspecto de GTK+ y de GNOME y suporta muitos formatos d'imachen ta veyer imachens solas u coleccions d'imachens.

O Visor d'imachens tami├йn le permite veyer imachens en modo de presentaci├│n a pantalla completa u configurar una imachen como fondo d'o escritorio. Leye as etiquetas d'a camera ta rotar as imachens automaticament, amostrando-las con a orientaci├│n correcta.

Eye of GNOME, GNOME masa├╝st├╝n├╝n resmi resim g├╢r├╝nt├╝leyicisidir. GNOMEтАЩun GTK+ g├╢rselli─Яiyle ayn─▒ hissi verir ve tek tek ya da koleksiyon halinde resim g├╢r├╝nt├╝lemede bir├зok g├╢r├╝nt├╝ bi├зimini destekler.

description.p: Maps gives you quick access to maps all across the world. It allows you to quickly find the place youтАЩre looking for by searching for a city or street, or locate a place to meet a friend.
Maps uses the collaborative OpenStreetMap database, made by hundreds of thousands of people across the globe.
You can even search for specific types of locations, such as тАЬPubs near Main Street, BostonтАЭ or тАЬHotels near Alexanderplatz, BerlinтАЭ.
Padkaart gee vinnige toegang tot padkaarte van regoor die w├кreld. Dit laat mens toe om vinnig 'n gewenste plek te vind deur te soek vir 'n stad of 'n straat, of om 'n ontmoetingspunt op te spoor.
Padkaart gebruik die gesamentlike OpenStreetMap-databasis, geskep deur honderde duisende mense regoor die w├кreld.
Mapas te ofreix un acceso rapido a mapas de tot o mundo. Te permite trobar puestos rapidament mirando por ciudat u por carrera, u mirar un puesto ta trobar-te con un amigo.
Os mapas fan servir a base de datos colaborativa OpenStreetMap, feita por cients de mils de personas de tot o mundo.
Tami├йn puede buscar por tipos d'ubicacions especificos como тАЬTabiernas am├бn d'o Paseyo d'a Independencia, ZaragozaтАЭu тАЬHotels am├бn d'a Plaza d'o Torico, TeruelтАЭ.

Karte vam daju brz pristup kartama cijelog svijeta.Omogu─Зava vam da brzo na─Сete mjesto koje tra┼╛ite , tra┼╛e─Зi grad ili ulicu , ili da prona─Сe mjesto da sretnete priajtelja.

component.name: Steam
component.summary: Manage and play games distributed by Steam

description.p: Steam is a popular platform for buying, downloading, and playing video games, and chatting with other players.

Many games require an online purchase, but some popular games, such as Team Fortress 2, are free to play. When searching in the store, be sure to narrow results by the Linux / SteamOS operating system. Not all Linux games are compatible with your system, so make sure you check the requirements before purchasing games.

LibreOffice is a powerful office suite. Its clean interface and feature-rich tools help you unleash your creativity and enhance your productivity. LibreOffice includes several applications that make it the most powerful Free and Open Source office suite on the market: Writer (word processing), Calc (spreadsheets), Impress (presentations), Draw (vector graphics and flowcharts), Base (databases), and Math (formula editing).
LibreOffice supports opening and saving into a wide variety of formats, so you can easily share documents with users of other popular office suites without worrying about compatibility.

description.p: Meld is a visual diff and merge tool targeted at developers. Meld helps you compare files, directories, and version controlled projects. It provides two- and three-way comparison of both files and directories, and supports many version control systems including Git, Mercurial, Bazaar and Subversion.
Meld helps you review code changes, understand patches, and makes enormous merge conflicts slightly less painful.

Meld je alat za vizuelne razlike i spajanje koji cilja na programere. On vam poma┼╛e pri usporedbi datoteka, direktorija i projekata za kontrolu verzija. Pru┼╛a dvosmjernu i trosmjernu usporedbu sa datotekama i direktorijima, te podr┼╛ava mnoge sisteme kontrolnih verzija uklju─Нuju─Зi i Git, Mercurial, Bazaar i Subversion.
Meld vam poma┼╛e pregledati promjene kodova, razumijevanje zakrpi i ─Нini brojne konflikte kod spajanja manje bolnim.

El Meld ├йs una eina visual per a veure difer├иncies i fer fusions pensat per a desenvolupadors. El Meld us permet comparar fitxers, directoris i projectes amb control de versions. Ofereix comparacions entre dos i tres fitxers i/o directoris, a m├йs a m├йs de visualitzar molts sistemes de control de versi├│ incloent Git, Mercurial, Bazaar i Subversion.
El Meld us ajuda a revisar els canvis de codi, entendre els peda├зos, i fer que els enormes conflictes quan es fusionen fitxers siguin menys dif├нcils de solucionar.

El Meld vos ajuda a revisar els canvis de codi, entendre els peda├зos, i fer que els enormes conflictes quan es fusionen fitxers siguen menys dif├нcils de solucionar.

Meld je vizu├бln├н n├бstroj pro pr├бci s rozd├нly (diff) a slu─Нov├бn├н (merge). M├н┼Щ├н na v├╜voj├б┼Щe, kter├╜m pom├бh├б porovn├бvat soubory, slo┼╛ky a projekty pou┼╛├нvaj├нc├н spr├бvu verz├н. Der er to- og trevejssammenligning af b├еde filer og mapper, og mange versionsstyringssystemer, bl.a. Git, Mercurial, Bazaar og Subversion, er underst├╕ttede.

Meld es una herramienta para ver diferencias y mezclar archivos orientada a desarrolladores. Meld le ayuda a comparar archivos, carpetas y proyectos con control de versiones. component.name: PulseEffects
Pulse Efekti
component.summary: Zvukov├й efekty pro programy vyu┼╛├нvaj├нc├н PulseAudio
Efeitos de ├Бudio para Programas que Utilizam Pulseaudio

description.p: PulseEffects is an advanced audio manipulation tools. It includes an equalizer, limiter, compressor and a reverberation tool, just to mention a few. To complement this there is also a built in spectrum analyzer.

Because PulseEffects uses the default PulseAudio sound server it will work with most, if not all, applications you use. All supported applications are presented in the main window, where each can be enabled individually.

Besides manipulating sound output, PulseEffects is able to apply effects to an input device, such as a microphone. This is, for example, useful in audio recording, but it also works well during voice conversations.
When PulseEffects is launched it will conveniently remember the configuration used in the last session. It is also possible to save all the current settings as profiles.

PulseEffects je pokro─Нil├╜m n├бstrojem pro zach├бzen├н se zvukem. Obsahuje mimo jin├й n├бstroj ekvaliz├йru, omezova─Нe (limiter), kompresoru a dozvuku. Na dopln─Ыn├н je tak├й vestav─Ыn analyz├бtor spektra.

Proto┼╛e PulseEffects pou┼╛├нv├б v├╜choz├н zvukov├╜ server PulseAudio, bude pracovat s v─Ыt┼бinou, pokud u┼╛ ne se v┼бemi v├бmi pou┼╛├нvan├╜mi programy. V┼бechny podporovan├й programy jsou uk├бz├бny v hlavn├нm okn─Ы, v n─Ыm┼╛ je mo┼╛n├й kter├╜koli z nich ru─Нn─Ы povolit.

Vedle pr├бce se zvukov├╜m v├╜stupem dok├б┼╛e PulseEffects efekty pou┼╛├нt i na vstupn├н za┼Щ├нzen├н, jako je mikrofon. To je u┼╛ite─Нn├й mimo jin├й p┼Щi nahr├бv├бn├н zvuku, pracuje to ale dob┼Щe b─Ыhem hlasov├╜ch hovor┼п.
Kdy┼╛ je PulseEffects spu┼бt─Ыn, zapamatuje si p┼Щ├нhodn─Ы nastaven├н pou┼╛├нvan├й p┼Щi posledn├нm sezen├н. Je mo┼╛n├й i ulo┼╛en├н v┼бech nyn─Ыj┼б├нch nastaven├н jako profil┼п.
PulseEffects ist ein Audio-Manipulations-Tool. Es hat einen Equalizer, Limiter, Kompressor, Hall und ein Spektrumanalysator.

Da PulseEffects den standard PulseAudio Sound Server benutzt, funktioniert es mit so ziemlich allen Anwendungen. Alle unterst├╝tzten Anwendungen werden im Hauptfenster angezeigt, wo alle individuell ein-/ausgeschaltet werden k├╢nnen.
Neben der Sound Manipulation des Ausgangs, kann PulseEffects auch Effekte auf Eingabeger├дte, z.B. Mikrofone, anwenden. Dies ist sinnvoll f├╝r z.B. Audioaufnahmen oder VOIP Anwendungen.
Wenn PulseEffects startet, stellt es die Konfiguration der letzten Sitzung wieder her. Es ist auch m├╢glich, die aktuellen Einstellungen als Profil / Preset in einer Datei zu speichern.
PulseEffects est un outil avanc├й de manipulation audio. Il inclut, entre autres, un ├йgaliseur, limiteur, compresseur et effet de r├йverb├йration. Aussi pr├йsent est un analyseur de fr├йquences.

Parce que PulseEffects utilise le serveur PulseAudio par d├йfaut, cet outil fonctionne avec la grande majorit├й des applications. Les applications compatibles sont pr├йsent├йes dans la fen├кtre principale, o├╣ vous pouvez les activer manuellement.

En plus de la manipulation de la sortie audio, PulseEffects peut aussi manipuler l'entr├йe audio, depuis par exemple un microphone; ce qui est utile pour l'enregistrement audio ou pour une conversation.
PuseEffets se rappelle de la configuration utilis├йe lors du lancement pr├йc├йdent. Il est aussi possible de sauvegarder tous les param├иtres dans des profils personnalis├йs.
Pulse Efekti je napredan alat za manipulaciju zvukom. Uklju─Нuje ekvalizator, grani─Нnik, kompresor i alat odjeka, i druge alate. Jo┼б sadr┼╛i i ugra─Сeni analizator spektra.

Zato jer Pulse Efekti koriste zadani PulseAudio zvu─Нni poslu┼╛itelj radit ─Зe s ve─Зinom, ako ne i sa svim aplikacijama koje koristite. Sve podr┼╛ane aplikacije su prikazane u glavnom prozoru, gdje se svaka pojedina─Нno mo┼╛e omogu─Зiti.
Osim manipuliranja izlaza zvuka, Pulse Efekti mogu primijeniti efekte i na ulazni ure─Сaj, poput mikrofona. To je na primjer, korisno pri snimanju zvuka, ali isto tako radi i tijekom razgovora.
Kada je Pulse Efekti pokrenut, upotrijebit ─Зe pode┼бavanja od pro┼бlog puta. Jo┼б je mogu─Зe spremiti sve trenutne postavke kao predlo┼бke.

PulseEffects ├й uma ferramenta avan├зada de edi├з├гo de ├бudio. Ele inclui equalizador, limitador, compressor e um plugin de reverbera├з├гo. Estas ferramentas s├гo complementadas por um analisador de espectro.

Como o PulseEffects usa o servidor de ├бudio padr├гo PulseAudio ele ir├б funcionar com a maioria das aplica├з├╡es que voc├к usa, sen├гo todas. Todos os aplicativos suportados est├гo presentes na janela principal, onde cada uma pode ser habilitada individualmente.

Al├йm de manipular sa├нda de som o PulseEffects tamb├йm ├й capaz de aplicar efeitos em dispositivos de entrada, como um microfone. Isto ├й ├║til, por exemplo, em grava├з├гo de ├бudio mas tamb├йm funciona em conversas.
Quando inicializado, o PulseEffects ir├б convenientemente lembrar das configura├з├╡es utilizadas na ├║ltima sess├гo. Tamb├йm ├й poss├нvel salvar todas as configura├з├╡es como perfis.

PulseEffects ├дr ett avancerat verktyg f├╢r manipulation av ljud. Det inneh├еller en ljudutj├дmnare (equalizer), ljudbegr├дnsare (limiter), kompressor och ett efterklangsverktyg (eko), f├╢r att bara n├дmna n├еgra f├е. D├дr finns ├дven en inbyggd frekvensanalysator som kompletterar dessa.

Eftersom PulseEffects anv├дnder sig av standard PulseAudio som ljudserver st├╢djer den de flesta, om inte alla, program du anv├дnder. Alla applikationer som st├╢ds presenteras i huvudf├╢nstret, d├дr var och en kan aktiveras individuellt.

F├╢rutom att manipulera dina programs ljud kan PulseEffects till├дmpa effekter p├е en ing├еngsenhet, s├еsom en mikrofon. Detta ├дr exempelvis anv├дndbart vid ljudinspelning, men det fungerar ├дven bra under r├╢stsamtal.
N├дr PulseEffects startas kommer det ih├еg konfigurationen som anv├дndes under den senaste sessionen. Det ├дr ocks├е m├╢jligt att spara alla aktuella inst├дllningar som profiler.

component.name: AVI MetaEdit
component.summary: Embed, validate, and export AVI files metadata

description.p: AVI MetaEdit is a tool that supports embedding, validating, and exporting of metadata in AVI files.
This tool can also enforce file structure and metadata recommendations and specifications from U.S. National Archives, Microsoft, and IBM.
Initially funded by NARA (National Archives and Records Administration) supported by the FADGI; designed and led by AVPreserve; developed by MediaArea.

component.name: Tux Football
component.summary: A great 2D soccer (sometimes called football) game

description.p: It's bringing old style gameplay from DOS times back to the desktop with up to date graphics! It's gameplay is similar to old classics such as Amco's Kick Off and Sensible Software's Sensible Soccer.

The gameplay is designed to be quick, responsive and fun. You are always in control of the player closest to the ball. The ball is controlled via two different kick buttons - one for pass, and one for shoot. Aftertouch can be applied to shots by quickly pressing and holding the direction you want the ball to bend towards. Pushing in the opposite direction to what you kicked the ball makes it raise into the air, pushing in the same direction as the ball makes it dip towards the ground.

component.name: OTPClient
component.summary: GTK+ application for managing TOTP and HOTP tokens with built-in encryption.

description.p: Easy to use GTK+ application for securely managing TOTP and HOTP tokens. The content is encrypted on the disk using AES256-GCM and the master password is derived using PBKDF2 with 100k iterations and SHA512 as hash algorithm. It's also possible to import encrypted backups from andOTP and Authenticator+.

https://github.com/paolostivanin/OTPClient/releases/tag/v1.0.6

PPSSPP is a PSP emulator that can run games full HD resolution. It can even upscale textures that would otherwise be too blurry as they were made for the small screen of the original PSP.

1.5 has support for Vulkan, the new faster way to draw graphics. Supported on many modern Android devices, and if enabled (change Backend in Graphics settings) you will see a massive speed boost. PPSSPP 1.5 also has the usual assortment of fixes:

ul.li: Full Vulkan support, also for Android now. Very fast on supported devices. (#10033, #10049)
Smarter graphics state management, reduced CPU consumption on all backends (#9899)
Android: Support for Arabic and other scripts we couldn't support before
Geometry problems fixed in Medal of Honor
Software rendering improvements, speed and accuracy
Hardware tesselation of PSP Beziers and Splines (used by a few games)
Android "Sustained performance mode" to avoid thermal throttling (#9901)

Engineered and optimized to work reliably
Up to 500 video participants and 10,000 viewers

component.name: SparkleShare
component.summary: Self hosted, instant, secure file sync

description.p: SparkleShare creates a special folder on your computer. You can add remotely hosted folders (or "projects") to this folder. These projects will be automatically kept in sync with both the host and all of your peers when someone adds, removes or edits a file.

SparkleShare was made to cover certain use cases, but doesn't handle every scenario well. To help you decide if SparkleShare is right for you, here's a few examples of what it does well and less well:
Great:

ul.li: Frequently changing project files, like text, office documents, and images
Tracking and syncing files edited by multiple people
Reverting a file to any point in its history
Preventing spying on your files on the server using encryption

description.p: Not so great:

ul.li: Storing your photo or music collection
Large binary files that change often, like video editing projects

description.p: Have fun!

component.name: Vocal
component.summary: A Great Podcast Client for the Modern Free Desktop

description.p: Vocal is the best way to find interesting new podcasts, maintain a growing library, and enjoy audio and video shows that automatically get updated with new content.
Features include:

ul.li: Built-in iTunes podcast store browsing and search

description.p: Grab some hot chocolate and curl up with a nice podcast this winter season, it's time for a new Vocal release! This time around, enjoy a ton of stability and performance enhancements, full HiDPI support, and other bug fixes to make your experience as enjoyable as possible.

ul.li: Added HiDPI support for all images so everything looks nice and sharp no matter how fancy your display is.
Fixed an issue where Vocal would not show you the time elapsed or remaining in an episode immediately after relaunching the app.
Reduced the animation time for switching between different views so that it feels extra snappy.
Gave the search results view a shave and a haircut. Two bits.
Fixed a few issues where Vocal would be grouchy about showing certain episode descriptions.
When importing several podcasts the progress bar now stays one size so you can actually judge the progress correctly.
You can now drag and drop items in the play queue to rearrange their order.
Lots more checking to make sure that things exist so it won't crash nearly as much (hopefully never).

description.p: Vocal's most exciting release yet, featuring full iTunes directory and search support, improved performance, a redesigned podcast view, and tons of other great improvements.

description.p: GnuCash is a program for personal and small-business financial-accounting.

Designed to be easy to use, yet powerful and flexible, GnuCash allows you to track bank accounts, stocks, income and expenses. As quick and intuitive to use as a checkbook register, it is based on professional accounting principles like double-entry accounting to ensure balanced books and accurate reports.
With GnuCash you can (but are not limited to):

ul.li: Keep track of your day to day personal income and expenses
Manage your stock, bond and mutual fund accounts with ease
Keep your small business' accounting up to date
Create accurate reports and graphs from your financial data
Set up scheduled transactions to avoid repeated data entry
Perform financial calculations, such as a loan repayment

Dissenyat per ser f├аcil d'usar, per├▓ tot i aix├н potent i flexible, el GnuCash us permet fer un seguiment de comptes bancaris, accions, ingressos i despeses. description.p: GnuCash ├и un programma per la contibilit├а personale e di piccole imprese.

Progettato per essere di semplice utilizzo, ma comunque potente e flessibile, GnuCash permette di tenere traccia dei conti bancari, delle azioni, delle entrate e delle uscite. Intuitivo nell'utilizzo come il libretto degli assegni, si basa sui principi fondamentali della contabilit├а per garantire il bilancio dei conti e l'accuratezza dei resoconti.
Con GnuCash ├и possibile:

ul.li: tenere traccia dei propri movimenti finanziari quotidiani in entrata ed in uscita;
gestire con facilit├а i propri conti per i fondi comuni, per gli investimenti e per le azioni;
mantenere aggiornata la contabilit├а della propria attivit├а;
creare dei resoconti e dei grafici accurati dai propri dati finanziari;
impostare delle transazioni pianifiacte per evitare l'immissione ripetitiva dei dati;
importazione dei formati QIF/OFX/HBCI e ricerca della corrispondenza delle transazioni;
effettuare dei calcoli finanziari, quali la restituzione di un prestito.

description.p: GnuCash рд╣реА рдЦрд╛рдЬрдЧреА рдЖрдгрд┐ рд▓реНрд╣рд╛рди-рд╡реНрдпрд╡рд╕рд╛рдп рдЕрд░реНрдерд┐рдХ рдЦрд╛рддреНрдпрд╛рдЦрд╛рддреАрд░ рдХрд╛рд░реНрдпрд╛рд╡рд│ рдЖрд╕рд╛.

рд╡рд╛рдкрд░рдкрд╛рдХ рд╕реЛрдкреЗ, рддрд░реАрдп рд╢рдХреНрддрд┐рдорд╛рди рдЖрдгрд┐ рд▓рд╡рдЪрд┐рдХ рдЕрд╢реЗ рддрдпрд╛рд░ рдХреЗрд▓реНрд▓реЗ, GnuCash рддреБрдордХрд╛ рдмрдБрдХ рдЦрд╛рддреА, рд╕реНрдЯреЙрдХ, рдЙрддреНрдкрдиреНрди рдЖрдгрд┐ рдЦрд░реНрдЪ рд╣рд╛рдЪреЗрд░ рд▓рдХреНрд╖ рджрд╡рд░реВрдВрдХ рджрд┐рддрд╛. рдЪреЗрдХрдмреБрдХ рдиреЛрдВрджрд╡рд╣реА рдореНрд╣рдг рд╡рд╛рдкрд░рдкрд╛рдХ рддреЗ рд╕реЛрдкреЗ рдЖрд╕рд╛ рдЖрдгрд┐ рдбрдмрд▓ рдПрдВрдЯреНрд░реА рдЕрдХреМрдиреНрдЯрд┐рдВрдЧрд╕рд╛рд░рдХрд┐рд▓реНрдпрд╛ рд╡реНрдпрд╛рд╡рд╕рд╛рдпрд┐рдХ рдЕрдХреМрдиреНрдЯрд┐рдВрдЧ рддрддреНрддреНрд╡рд╛рдВрдЪреЗрд░ рддреЗ рдЖрджрд╛рд░рд┐рдд рдЖрд╕рд╛ рдЬрд╛рдХрд╛рд▓рд╛рдЧреВрди рд╕рдорддреЛрд▓ рд╣рд┐рд╢реЛрдм рдЖрдгрд┐ рдЕрдЪреВрдХ рдЕрд╣рд╡рд╛рд▓ рд╣рд╛рдВрдЪреА рдЦрд╛рддреНрд░реА рдореЗрд│рдЯрд╛.

description.p: GnuCash ek kariavoll khasgi ani lhan-ud'degachea vrutachea hixobachi

Sompeponnim vaprunk ankhlea, torui bollixtt ani bagovpi, GnuCash bank khatim, santthe, zodd ani khorch topasunk porvangi dita. Rokddem ani somzupi vaprunk ek chekpustokachea nondpott'tte sarkhi, ti vevsaik hixobachea totvancher adarit asa zoxe porim doddttea nondnnechea hixob zulloilelim pustokam ani binchukiche vakeanchi khatri korunk
GnuCasha vorvim tujean (punn hachea porian moriadit)

ul.li: Tujea dispott'ttea khasgi zodd ani khorchacho hixob dhor
Tuje santthe, homipotram ani mutual nidhichim khatim sompeponnim hatall
Tuje lhan vepari hixob aichea tarkhent dovor
Binchukiche vake ani alekh tujea arthik mhaite pasun roch
Tharavik vevhar bosoi portun portun mhaitechi nond tallunk
Arthik gonnit kor zoxe porim ek rinnachem feddop koxem

рдбрд┐рдЬрд╝рд╛рдпрд┐рди рдХрд░рдиреК рдЖрдореБрдд рдпреБрде рдИрд╕рддреЗрдорд╛рд▓ рдХрд░реБрди рдЖрд╕рд╛рди рдЧрдЫрд╝реК, рддреЛрддреК рдЧрдЫрд╝реК рддрд╛рдХрддрд╡рд░ рддреК рд▓рдЪрдХрджрд╛рд░ рдЖрд╕реБрди,GnuCash рдЫреБ рддреЛрд╣рдпреК рдИрдЬрд╛рдЬрд╝рдд рджрд┐рд╡рд╛рди рдЯрд░реЗрдХ рдХрд░рдирд╕ рдордирдЬрд╝ рдмреЗрдирдХ рдПрдХрд╛рд╡реБрдирдЯ, рд╕рд┐рдЯрд╛рдХ,рдИрдирдХрдо рддреК рдЦрд░реКрдЪ

ul.li: рдЦрдпрд╛рд▓ рдереКрдпрд┐рд╡ рдкрдирдиреКрди рджреЛрд╣ рджреКрд╢ рдХреКрди рдЬрд╝реКрддреА рдЖрдорджрди рддреК рдЦрд░рдЪрд╕
рдкрдиреКрди рд╕рд┐рдЯрд╛рдХ, рдмрд╛рдирдб рддреК рдордпреВрдЪрд╡рд▓ рдлрдирдб рдПрдХрд╛рд╡рдирдЯрди рдХреКрд░рд┐рд╡ рдордиреЗрдЬ рдЖрд╕реКрдиреА рд╕рд╛рди

description.p: GnuCash is boekhoudsoftware voor thuis en voor kleine ondernemingen.

GnuCash stelt u in staat om heel eenvoudig bankrekeningen, beleggingen, inkomsten en uitgaven bij te houden, zonder in te leveren op kracht of flexibiliteit. Net zo snel en intu├пtief te gebruiken als een dagboek, maar gestoeld op boekhoudkundige principes om te zorgen voor een sluitende boekhouding en accurate rapporten.
Met GnuCash kunt u (maar bent u niet beperkt tot):

ul.li: uw persoonlijke inkomsten en uitgaven van dag tot dag volgen
uw aandelen, obligaties en beleggingsfondsen eenvoudig beheren
de boekhouding van uw kleine onderneming bijhouden
accurate rapporten en grafieken maken van uw financi├лle gegevens
vaste journaalposten instellen om te voorkomen dat telkens dezelfde gegevens moeten worden ingevoerd
QIF-, OFX- en HCBI-bestanden importeren en koppelen aan bestaande boekingen
financi├лle berekeningen maken, zoals de annu├пtaire aflossing van een lening

description.p: O GnuCash ├й um programa para contabilidade pessoal e de pequenos neg├│cios.

Desenhado para ser f├бcil de usar mas tamb├йm poderoso e flex├нvel, o GnuCash permite-lhe controlar contas banc├бrias, ac├з├╡es, receitas e despesas. T├гo f├бcil e intuitivo de usar como uma folha de livro de cheques, ├й baseado em princ├нpios contabil├нsticos profissionais, tais como a contabilidade de dupla entrada, para garantir livros saldados e relat├│rios precisos.
Com o GnuCash pode(sem estar limitado a):

ul.li: seguir diariamente as suas receitas e despesas pessoais
fazer a gest├гo de ac├з├╡es, obriga├з├╡es e fundos facilmente
manter a sua contabilidade de neg├│cios actualizada
criar relat├│rios e gr├бficos precisos dos seus dados financeiros
preparar transac├з├╡es agendadas para evitar inserir dados repetidos
Realize c├бlculos financeiros, tais como o pagamento de um empr├йstimo

description.p: This release fixes a serious bug in version 2.0.0, which could cause all ingredients to lose their amounts when editing a recipe.
We also fixed an issue where ingredients without amount would always get displayed with an errant '1' as amount.

ul.li: Allow recipes to have long names
New recipes: Tzatziki, Soy Chicken, Rice Maize Apple Cake
New and updated translations: Czech, German

description.p: This release adds new features.

Unit conversion support has landed. There are new settings, volume-unit and weight-unit, which can be set to 'locale' (the default), 'metric' or 'imperial' to control how units are displayed. We are also formatting numbers in a human-friendly way and separate them into multiple units where appropriate. This work was done by Outreachy intern Paxana Amanda Xander.
Support for sharing shopping lists to the Todoist mobile app has landed. This work was done by Summer of Code intern Ekta Nandwani.

ul.li: New recipes: Colita con Chimichurri, F├еrik├еl, Marinade, Chicken gravy, Rouladen, Okonomiyaki, various juices, Boef Bourguignon, Grilled salad, Midsummer nights dream, Sous vide, Struwen
The list of ingredients has been revised and expanded
New and updated translations: Catalan, Croatian, Czech, Finnish, German, Indonesian, Polish, Spanish

description.p: A quick follow-up release to fix some issues.

ul.li: Avoid a crash when editing ingredients
Use better glyphs as markers in instructions

description.p: A Material Design theme for GNOME/GTK+ based desktop environments

component.name: KDE Software Development Kit version master
component.summary: Tools and headers for developing applications using the KDE application platform

component.name: BWF MetaEdit
component.summary: Embed, validate, and export BWF files metadata

description.p: BWF MetaEdit was developed by the Federal Agencies Digitization Guidelines Initiative (FADGI) supported by AudioVisual Preservation Solutions.

This tool permits embedding, editing, and exporting of metadata in Broadcast WAVE Format (BWF) files. This tool can also enforce metadata guidelines developed by the Federal Agencies Audio-Visual Working Group, as well as recommendations and specifications from the European Broadcasting Union (EBU), Microsoft, and IBM.

description.p: BitTorrent is a peer-to-peer file-sharing protocol that is commonly used to distribute large amounts of data between multiple users.
Transmission is a BitTorrent client with an easy-to-use frontend on top a cross-platform backend. Native frontends are available for OS X and Windows, as well as command line and web frontends.
Notable features of Transmission include support for Local Peer Discovery, encryption, DHT, ┬╡TP, PEX and Magnet Link.
Fix CVE-2018-5702 security vulnerability (see https://bugs.chromium.org/p/project-zero/issues/detail?id=1447 and https://github.com/transmission/transmission/pull/468 for more details).
Fix File тЖТ Open URI.

xmoto is a side-scrolling 2D motocross platform game where the objective is to collect all the floating items in the level and proceed to the checkered finishing ball. The motocross bike that the player rides in xmoto has a lot of bounce, and the if the player hits their head on any solid object the level has to be restarted.

There are hundreds of levels available in xmoto, both included in the initial install, and downloadable from the internet. There is also the ability to challenge fastest times with other players from around the world. and saved ghost data to visually see the runs of other players through the levels.

description.p: Vim is an advanced text editor that seeks to provide the power of the de-facto Unix editor 'Vi', with a more complete feature set. It's useful whether you're already using vi or using a different editor.

Vim is a highly configurable text editor built to enable efficient text editing. Vim is often called a "programmer's editor," and so useful for programming that many consider it an entire IDE. It is not just for programmers, though. Vim is perfect for all kinds of text editing, from composing email to editing configuration files.

description.p: MediaInfo is a convenient unified display of the most relevant technical and tag data for video and audio files.
The MediaInfo data display includes :

ul.li: Container: format, profile, commercial name of the format, duration, overall bit rate, writing application and library, title, author, director, album, track number, date, duration...
Video: format, codec id, aspect, frame rate, bit rate, color space, chroma subsampling, bit depth, scan type, scan order...
Audio: format, codec id, sample rate, channels, bit depth, language, bit rate...
Text: format, codec id, language of subtitle...
Chapters: count of chapters, list of chapters...

description.p: MediaInfo analyticals include :

ul.li: Container: MPEG-4, QuickTime, Matroska, AVI, MPEG-PS (including unprotected DVD), MPEG-TS (including unprotected Blu-ray), MXF, GXF, LXF, WMV, FLV, Real...
Tags: Id3v1, Id3v2, Vorbis comments, APE tags...
Video: MPEG-1/2 Video, H.263, MPEG-4 Visual (including DivX, XviD), H.264/AVC, Dirac...
Audio: MPEG Audio (including MP3), AC3, DTS, AAC, Dolby E, AES3, FLAC...
Subtitles: CEA-608, CEA-708, DTVCC, SCTE-20, SCTE-128, ATSC/53, CDP, DVB Subtitle, Teletext, SRT, SSA, ASS, SAMI...

Signal is a Free and Open Source instant messenger allowing you to communicate with complete privacy. The messages are end-to-end encrypted and the server does not store any of your data.

component.name: OpenArena
component.summary: Free and open source first-person shooter

description.p: OpenArena is a free and open source first-person shooter game based heavily on the Quake III Arena-style deathmatch. Score frags to win the game using a balanced set of weapons each designed for different situations. Guns include a chaingun, rocket launcher, shotgun, and railgun.

OpenArena's style of play is very fast and requires skill to be played successfully online. Gameplay modes include Deathmatch, Team Deathmatch, Tournament, Capture the Flag, Elimination, CTF Elimination, Last Man Standing and Double Domination.
Arc is a flat theme for Gtk3.

component.name: Tremulous
component.summary: Aliens vs Humans, First Person Shooter game with elements of Real Time Strategy

description.p: Tremulous is a free, open source game that blends a team based FPS with elements of an RTS.
Players can choose from 2 unique races, aliens and humans. Players on both teams are able to build working structures in-game like an RTS.

Sorting documents is a machine's job. Paperwork is an easy-to-use application which allows you to find in all your documents when you need them. Type a few keywords in the search bar and the list of papers will shrink to only the relevant content.
This is where the magic happens: Paperwork uses automatically optical character recognition (OCR) to convert your papers into searchable documents.
Main features are:

ul.li: Automatic guessing of the labels to apply on new documents

description.p: Trier les documents est un travail de machine. Paperwork est une application qui vous permet de trouver tout vos documents, quand vous en avez besoin. Tapez quelques mots-cl├йs et la liste des papiers se r├йduira au contenu pertinent.
L├а o├╣ la magie se produit : Paperwork utilise automatiquement la reconnaissance optique de caract├иres (ROC) pour convertir vos papiers en documents cherchables.
Les principales fonctionnalit├йs sont :

ul.li: D├йtection automatique de l'orientation des pages

component.name: GetIt
component.summary: Send HTTP requests to API endpoints
Verstuur HTTP reqests naar API endpoints

description.p: GetIt's main focus is to make your life a lot easier when you have to test APIs or use somebody elses API. We know it can be hard to find a great, simple and open source application for this task that's not command line based.
You can send numerous requests to a webserver. You can send RAW post data, form post data, add cookies to your request and add headers to your request.
The response can be viewed either as syntax highlighted code, with JSON even being made readable, as the raw output, which means no syntax highlighting, and view it in a webview.
Features of GetIt include:

ul.li: Sending HTTP requests to API endpoints and display the response of the server
Make JSON response look beautifull automatically

description.p: GetIt's hoofdtaak is om jouw leven gemakkelijker te maken als je API's moet testen of de API van iemand ander gebruikt. Wij weten dat het moeilijk kan zijn om een goede, simpele en ook open source applicatie te vinden voor deze taak die niet gebaseerd is op de command line.
Je kunt verschillende typen requests naar een webserver sturen. Je kunt ruwe post data sturen, form post data, cookiesaan je request toevoegen en verschillende headers aan je request toevoegen.

De response kan worden bekeken als opgemaakte code, waarbij JSON zelfs leesbaar wordt gemaakt, als de rauwe output, wat inhoudt dat de code niet wordt opgemaakt, en je kunt de response in een webview bekijken.
Features van GetIt zijn onder andere:

ul.li: HTTP Requests naar API endpoints versturen en de response van de server weergeven
Code opmaak voor alle response types

description.p: This release fixed/added:

ul.li: Highlight JSON response when Content-Type header isn"t set
